10102.Content: 嗯，这个缺口的切角好整齐，感觉刚好可以插进一把剑

10103.Content: 我来试试...果然，刚好没过剑身，像是个“钥匙孔”。

10202.Content: （远处传来了一声闷响，接着眼前的石门缓缓打开）

10203.Content: 原来这把剑就是开门的钥匙

10301.Content: 还是先把剑拔出来吧，这是我们仅存的武器了

10302.Content: 嗯，我再去四周看看有什么出口

10501.Content: 我是路人NPC看向功能测试台本

10502.Content: 我是路人NPC转向功能测试台本

1000101.Content: 村子可能还是很危险，一定要小心。

1000201.Content: 自投罗网么？简直愚钝得可爱。

10010105.ContentEN: Get some more sleep. I won't leave — I'll be right here when you wake up.
10010105.Subtitle: Get some more sleep. I won't leave — I'll be right here when you wake up.

10010106.ContentEN: It's okay. We should get down the mountain and head to the village.
10010106.Subtitle: It's okay. We should head back. Let's get down the mountain.

10010107.ContentEN: You wanna go back? But there've been roars coming from there for days...
10010107.Subtitle: You wanna go back to the village now? But there've been roars coming from that direction these past few days...

10010108.ContentEN: I was thinking, if we could make it home and grab our weapons—
10010108.Subtitle: I was thinking, if we could make it home and grab our weapons—

10010109.ContentEN: And with your strength, you'll find a way out.
10010109.Subtitle: And with your strength, you'll find a way out.

10010110.ContentEN: No one's going to save us no matter how long we stay here anyway.
10010110.Subtitle: No one's going to save us no matter how long we stay here anyway.

10010114.ContentEN: You're not fully recovered. Are you sure you can do this?
10010114.Subtitle: You're not fully recovered. Are you sure you can do this?

10010115.ContentEN: I'm okay. It's just a few scratches.
10010115.Subtitle: I'm okay. It's just a few scratches.

10010116.ContentEN: Don't push yourself too hard. We still have to save some strength for those Filthoids.
10010116.Subtitle: Don't push yourself too hard. We still have to save some strength for those Filthoids.

10010201.ContentEN: Tell me the truth if you want to live.
10010201.Subtitle: Tell me the truth if you want to live.

10010202.ContentEN: Why are you here, who's with you,
10010202.Subtitle: Why are you here, who's with you,

10010203.ContentEN: and who on earth are you?
10010203.Subtitle: and who on earth are you?

10010301.Content: 我们现在赤手空拳，尽可能避开它们吧。

10010401.ContentEN: Take that sword with you. It might be helpful one day.
10010401.Subtitle: Take that sword with you. It might be helpful one day.

10010402.ContentEN: Keep yourself safe. I'll take care of these Filthoids.
10010402.Subtitle: Keep yourself safe. I'll take care of these Filthoids.

10010501.Content: 拿起剑的时候，熟悉而陌生的记忆涌上来……

10010502.Content: ……已经很久没有像这样战斗过了。

10010701.ContentEN: Ugh, they didn't even leave one single boat.
10010701.Subtitle: Ugh, they didn't leave even one single boat.

10010702.ContentEN: You were at the village when the Filthoids came, weren't you? If it wasn't for coming back for me, you could have escaped with them.
10010702.Subtitle: You were at the village when the Filthoids came, weren't you? If it wasn't for coming back for me, you could have escaped with them.

10010703.ContentEN: Don't be silly. You'd have done the same for me. Let's search along the shore and see if there's any old boats or something.
10010703.Subtitle: Don't be silly. You'd have done the same for me. Let's search along the shore and see if there's any old boats or something.

10010704.Content: 别说傻话。我们先沿着海岸找找有没有废旧的船。

10010801.ContentEN: These are... Someone must have lost them when they ran away.
10010801.Subtitle: Look... Someone must have lost them when they ran away.

10010802.ContentEN: Hmm, take it. It's always good to be well-armed.
10010802.Subtitle: Hmm, let's grab one. It's always good to be well-armed.

10011002.ContentEN: Stay close, {nickname}. If necessary, give out the secret signals.
10011002.Subtitle: Stay close, Phoxhunter. If necessary, give out the secret signals.

10011003.ContentEN: We made them up earlier so as not to alert the Filthoids up the mountain, remember?
10011003.Subtitle: We made them up earlier so as not to alert the beasts up the mountain, remember?

10011005.ContentEN: Alright, a quick check — Two pats on the right shoulder means...?
10011005.Subtitle: Alright, a quick check — Two pats on the right shoulder means...?

10011007.ContentEN: And two taps on the chest?
10011007.Subtitle: And two taps on the chest?

10011011.ContentEN: Good. And the last one — three quick blinks?
10011011.Subtitle: Good. And the last one — three quick blinks?

10011014.ContentEN: ...I'm not interested in that signal, and I won't remember it anyway.
10011014.Subtitle: ...I'm not interested in that signal, and I won't remember it anyway.

10011103.ContentEN: Someone once left that flying ship here.
10011103.Subtitle: Someone once left that flying ship here.

10011201.ContentEN: Listen, thrust your sword right in there.
10011201.Subtitle: Listen, wedge your sword right in there.

10011301.ContentEN: So the key is... this sword?
10011301.Subtitle: So the key is... this sword?

10011302.ContentEN: Yes. Your sword was never meant to hurt.
10011302.Subtitle: Yes. Your sword was not made for slashing.

10011401.ContentEN: Let's head towards the top of the mountain. There used to be an airship there. If it's still around, we might be able to make it out.
10011401.Subtitle: Let's head towards the top of the mountain. There used to be an airship there. If it's still around, we might be able to make it out.

10011502.Content: 还有人在那里……我们得救了吗？

10011601.ContentEN: We've been searching for years. When will the Chief give up this pointless hunt?
10011601.Subtitle: We've been searching for years. When will the chief give up this pointless hunt?

10011604.Subtitle: You're now surrounded by the Hyperborean 13th Legion!

10011607.ContentEN: The Legion... They found their way here...
10011607.Subtitle: The Legion... They found their way here...

10011609.ContentEN: They must be up to something.
10011609.Subtitle: They must be up to something.

10011701.ContentEN: Is this your idea of \"accurate intel,\" Randy? You gave me your word.
10011701.Subtitle: Is this your idea of \"accurate intel,\" Randy? You gave me your word.

10011702.ContentEN:
The soldiers did their best with the Filthoids. These are indeed unforeseen circumstances.\
But we did find something valuable on this island today—
10011702.Subtitle:
The soldiers did their best with the Filthoids. These are indeed unforeseen circumstances.\
But we did find something valuable on this island today—

10011703.ContentEN: Alchemical tools she has used and an airship with a Legion serial number on it.
10011703.Subtitle: Alchemical tools she has used and an airship with a Legion serial number on it.

10011704.ContentEN: You realise we're looking for \"No. 0,\" not this useless junk, right?
10011704.Subtitle: You realise we're looking for \"No. 0,\" not this useless junk, right?

10011705.ContentEN:
We've been searching for over a decade... But our maritime unit intercepted several of the villagers' vessels.\
They might be able to dig up some—
10011705.Subtitle:
We've been searching for over a decade... But our maritime unit intercepted several of the villagers' vessels.\
They might be able to dig up some—

10011902.ContentEN:
The Filthoids attacked you \"for no reason\" after you came here,\
and you managed to open the hidden path \"by chance\"... Is that really your story?
10011902.Subtitle:
The Filthoids attacked you \"for no reason\" after you came here,\
and you managed to open the hidden path \"by chance\"... Is that really your story?

10011903.ContentEN: We're telling the truth! Let her go!
10011903.Subtitle: We're telling the truth! Let her go!

10011905.ContentEN: Chief Sibylle, we've checked her spinal structure and confirmed that...
10011905.Subtitle: Chief Sibylle, we've checked her spine and confirmed it...

10011906.ContentEN: She's the \"No. 0\" we've been looking for.
10011906.Subtitle: She's the \"No. 0\" we've been looking for.

10011908.ContentEN: Fortune has finally smiled upon me.
10011908.Subtitle: Fortune has finally smiled upon me.

10011912.ContentEN: Your power... the power of Resonance...
10011912.Subtitle: Your power... the power of Resonance...

10011913.ContentEN: If you wish to save all this...
10011913.Subtitle: If you wish to save all this...

10012001.ContentEN: Hang in there! I got you...
10012001.Subtitle: Hang in there! I got you...

10012003.ContentEN: Give it up, No. 0. Even the toughest blade has its breaking point.
10012003.Subtitle: Give it up, No. 0. Even the toughest blade has its breaking point.

10012004.ContentEN: Come back with me, and you'll live — so will this kid you care so much about.
10012004.Subtitle: Come back with me, and you'll live — so will this kid you care so much about.

10012008.ContentEN: I'll go back with you, but you have to promise to let {性别:him|her} go.
10012008.Subtitle: I'll go back with you, but you have to promise to let Phoxhunter go.

10012009.ContentEN: Give me your word! Or, you can take two corpses back!
10012009.Subtitle: Give me your word! Or, you can only take two corpses back!

10012010.ContentEN: Perhaps I wasn't clear — This is not a negotiation, it's an order.
10012010.Subtitle: Perhaps I wasn't clear — This is not a negotiation, it's an order.

10012013.ContentEN: Get out of here, and live.
10012013.Subtitle: Get out of here, and live.

10012015.ContentEN: Quick question, {nickname}. The \"three quick blinks\" means—
10012015.Subtitle: Quick question, Phoxhunter. The \"three quick blinks\" means—

10012016.ContentEN: I've got this, Berry. Three quick blinks means...
10012016.Subtitle: I know, I know! I've got this, Berry. Three quick blinks means...

10012017.ContentEN: \"Even if left all alone, you should be brave and live on.\"
10012017.Subtitle: \"Even if left all alone, you should be brave and live on.\"

10012102.ContentEN: No. 0 is not supposed to release all her powers yet. Why...
10012102.Subtitle: No. 0 isn't supposed to release all her powers yet. Why is she...?

10012103.ContentEN: No, that's not her power, it's Resonance.
10012103.Subtitle: No, that's not her power, it's Resonance.

10012104.ContentEN: ...That brat she's trying to protect... That's the new receptacle for the Power of Resonance?
10012104.Subtitle: ...That brat she's protecting... that's the new receptacle for Resonance?

10012105.ContentEN: Its reappearance here and now... What could this possibly mean...?
10012105.Subtitle: It made its appearance again here... What does this truly implies...

10012302.Content: 好多了，只是还有些头晕……

10012401.ContentEN: It seems someone used to live here.
10012401.Subtitle: It seems someone used to live here.

10012402.ContentEN: This was your home, am I right, Berry?
10012402.Subtitle: This was your home, am I right, Berry?

10012404.ContentEN: ...Yes, and no. It was OUR home.
10012404.Subtitle: ...Yes, and no. It was OUR home.

10012405.ContentEN: Our home? But I don't remember a thing.
10012405.Subtitle: Our home? But I don't remember a thing.

10012406.ContentEN: ...It's okay. Maybe it's all for the best. After we make it out, we'll build a new home.
10012406.Subtitle: ...It's okay. Maybe it's all for the best. After we make it out, we'll build a new home.

10012601.Content: 净界岛上的小村，我和贝蕾妮卡一起长大的地方。

10012602.Content: 这些叫做秽兽的怪物究竟从何而来，我们也无从得知；

10012603.Content: 只知道，昔日宁和的村庄，一夜之间变成了这副模样。

10012701.ContentEN: You're back, {nickname}... My other half, my reflection, and my echo.
10012701.Subtitle: You're back, ... My other half, my reflection, and my echo.

10012702.ContentEN: You heard my voice and retrieved the power that belongs to you. The \"Resonance.\"
10012702.Subtitle: You heard my voice and retrieved the power that belongs to you. The \"Resonance.\"

10012703.ContentEN: This power didn't change anything. I fell into the sea and I'll never wake up again. It's all over.
10012703.Subtitle: This power didn't change anything. I fell into the sea and I'll never wake up again. It's all over.

10012704.ContentEN: No, I can see it — your future, our future... it doesn't end here.
10012704.Subtitle: No, I can see it — your future, our future... it doesn't end here.

10012705.ContentEN: Someone will pluck you from the briny waters and lead you to a frozen wilderness, where destiny will pose the ultimate test.
10012705.Subtitle: Someone will pluck you from the briny waters and lead you to a frozen wilderness, where destiny will pose the ultimate test.

10012706.ContentEN: Are you saying... I'm still alive?
10012706.Subtitle: Are you saying... I'm still alive?

10012707.ContentEN: ...The time has come. Let me offer you one last gift.
10012707.Subtitle: ...The time has come. Let me offer you one last gift.

10012709.ContentEN: These sands are our shared memories, bridging the past, present, and future.
10012709.Subtitle: These sands are our shared memories, bridging the past, present, and future.

10012710.ContentEN: Sift through them... and seek out those we may have known, or those we are destined to meet.
10012710.Subtitle: Sift through them... and seek out those we may have known, or those we are destined to meet.

10012711.ContentEN: May they be your strength on your journey.
10012711.Subtitle: May they be your strength on your journey.

10012713.ContentEN: ...{nickname}. Life is like a lonely cruise through the boundless darkness of the night. The river weeps, overflowing its banks, while the thorny thickets on either side stand as a testament to its sorrow.
10012713.Subtitle: ...Phoxhunter. Life is like a lonely cruise through the boundless darkness of the night. The river weeps, overflowing its banks, while the thorny thickets on either side stand as a testament to its sorrow.

10012714.ContentEN: I'll keep watching over you, The One Across the Shore... to see where you're going.
10012714.Subtitle: I'll keep watching over you, The One Across the Shore... to see where you're going.

10012801.ContentEN: This is my first time in Cocytus Province. Is this how the people here show their hospitality?
10012801.Subtitle: This is my first time in Cocytus Province. Is this how the people here show their hospitality?

10012802.ContentEN: I don't want to bother you, I just want to... strike a small \"bargain.\"
10012802.Subtitle: I don't want to bother you, I just want to... strike a small \"bargain.\"

10012803.ContentEN: I'll pay you whatever you want, and all you have to do, well, it will be a piece of cake.
10012803.Subtitle: I'll pay you whatever you want, and all you have to do, well, it will be a piece of cake.

10017901.ContentEN: The ship is at the mountaintop. After a short break, we'll push on.
10017901.Subtitle: The ship is at the mountaintop. After a short break, we'll push on.

10017902.ContentEN: ...Can't believe we'll be saying goodbye to Purgatorio Island soon.
10017902.Subtitle: ...Can't believe we'll be saying goodbye to Purgatorio Island soon.

10017903.ContentEN: ...You creatures just can't give us a break, can you?
10017903.Subtitle: ...You creatures just can't give us a break, can you?

10018201.Content: 那天，在毁灭之前，我睁开双眼。瞳孔所见之景，是“无限”。

10018202.Content: 第一次，我感受到了，我是如此真实地活着。

10018301.Content: 下坠。我本应朝着漆黑的深渊下坠。

10018302.Content: 但，我却感觉自己在晨雾的怀抱里飘浮。

10018303.Content: 周身被冰冷的触感包围，但意外的是，那种冰冷并不令人恐惧。

10018304.Content: 而是一种，奇特的触感……亲切，甚至令人怀念。

10018401.ContentEN: But up until now, there has been no answer. Only endless flowing quicksand covering my vision, and...
10018401.Subtitle: But up until now, there has been no answer. Only endless flowing quicksand covering my vision, and...

10018901.ContentEN: No chance we're leaving by sea. Guess we'll have to count on that thing...
10018901.Subtitle: No chance we're leaving by sea. Guess we'll have to count on that thing...

10018902.ContentEN: Listen, there's actually another \"ship\" on this island, up in the mountain ruins.
10018902.Subtitle: Listen, there's actually another \"ship\" on this island, up in the mountain ruins.

10018904.ContentEN: Yes, a \"ship\" that flies. Now follow me.
10018904.Subtitle: Yes, a \"ship\" that flies. Now follow me.

10019001.ContentEN: The village is in dead silence. I'm afraid they've probably...
10019001.Subtitle: The village is in dead silence. I'm afraid they've probably...

10019003.ContentEN: ...I mean, they've probably scarpered off by boat.
10019003.Subtitle: ...I mean, they've probably scarpered off by boat.

10019004.ContentEN: We should hurry home and get the weapons, and then get to the wharf. It's still dangerous here.
10019004.Subtitle: We should hurry home and get the weapons, and then get to the wharf. It's still dangerous here.

10019005.ContentEN: (We're unarmed right now. We have to avoid those Filthoids as much as possible.)
10019005.Subtitle: (We're unarmed right now. We have to avoid those Filthoids as much as possible.)

10019201.Content: 关于那柄剑……除了它从小就在身边之外，我一无所知。

10019202.Content: 正如我不知道自己从何而来——我没有与贝蕾相遇之前的任何记忆。

10019301.ContentEN: How many of them are there...
10019301.Subtitle: How many of them are there...

10019302.ContentEN: Let's get to the top to shake them off.
10019302.Subtitle: Let's get to the top to shake them off.

10019401.Content: 这是我第一次来科赛托斯省。看来，这里的待客之道颇为独特啊。

10019402.Content: 我没有任何恶意，只是想同你做一笔……小小的交易。

10019403.Content: 我会付给你无法拒绝的报酬，而你要做的，非常简单。

10019502.Content: ？？？：{性别：他|她}和您一样，拥有决定历史轨迹的力量。不要忘记，您的使命。

10019503.Content: ？？？：我会处理。但，现在还不是时候。

10019506.Content: ？？？：“生命是航行在无尽长夜里的孤船。”

10019507.Content: ？？？：“河流泪水满溢，夹岸荆棘丛生。”

10019509.Content: ？？？：“来自彼岸之人，你将驶向何方。”

10025701.ContentEN:
This escape was heralded by that odd dream.\
I've been plagued by similar ones all my life.
10025701.Subtitle:
This escape was heralded by that odd dream.\
I've been plagued by similar ones all my life.

10025702.ContentEN:
But now's not the time for reflection...\
There's something more pressing at the moment—
10025702.Subtitle:
But now's not the time for reflection...\
There's something more pressing at the moment—

10025703.ContentEN:
Berry and I must flee from this isle known as \"Purgatorio Island,\"\
where we spent our childhoods together.
10025703.Subtitle:
Berry and I must flee from this isle known as \"Purgatorio Island\",\
where we spent our childhoods together.

10025704.ContentEN: For the peace we once knew has been torn asunder by the vile claws of Filthoids...
10025704.Subtitle: For the peace we once knew has been torn asunder by the vile claws of Filthoids...

10025802.ContentEN: It seems someone had a fight here with these Filthoids just before we came.
10025802.Subtitle: It seems someone had a fight here with these Filthoids just before we came.

10025803.ContentEN: Could it be one of the villagers... No, we were the first to open that door.
10025803.Subtitle: Could it be one of the villagers... No, we were the first to open that door.

10025804.ContentEN: Anyway, thanks to that person, we don't have to deal with these Filthoids ourselves.
10025804.Subtitle: Anyway, thanks to that person, we don't have to deal with these Filthoids ourselves.

10025805.ContentEN: Whoever it was, they're not to be underestimated. We must be vigilant.
10025805.Subtitle: Whoever it was, they're not to be underestimated. We must be vigilant.

10029301.ContentEN: In my dreams that unfold like a double helix, I've asked myself that question countless times.
10029301.Subtitle: In my dreams that unfold like a double helix, I've asked myself that question countless times.

10100201.ContentEN: Mmm. Alive and not incapacitated, no broken bones then.
10100201.Subtitle: Mmm. Alive and not incapacitated, no broken bones then.

10100202.ContentEN: Who are you...? How do you know my name? Berry, where are we—
10100202.Subtitle: Who are you...? How do you know my name? Berry, where are we—

10100204.ContentEN: (I must find Berry. If it weren't for me, she would've managed to escape from those soldiers...)
10100204.Subtitle: (I must find Berry. If it weren't for me, she would've managed to escape from those soldiers...)

10100206.ContentEN: Hey, are you even listening? Camilla and <H>Snow</> have come all this way to save you! You better come with us to the city right now, or else you'll soon become a snack for some wandering Filthoids!
10100206.Subtitle: Hey, are you even listening? Camilla and Snow have come all this way to save you! You better come with us to the city right now, or else you'll soon become a snack for some wandering Filthoids!

10100208.ContentEN: Got a fright, huh? No worries, you'll be safe in a jiffy — <H>Icelake</> is the largest city in northern Hyperborea!
10100208.Subtitle: Got a fright, huh? No worries, you'll be safe in a jiffy — Icelake is the largest city in northern Hyperborea!

10100209.ContentEN: Hyperborea... I'm in the Hyperborean Empire...?!
10100209.Subtitle: Hyperborea... I'm in the Hyperborean Empire...?!

10100210.ContentEN: Well, yeah... What's the big deal?
10100210.Subtitle: Well, yeah... What's the big deal?

10100211.ContentEN: Do you know this woman called Sibylle? Others refer to her as the \"Chief,\" and she's supposed to be in this country... I need to find her.
10100211.Subtitle: Do you know this woman called Sibylle? Others refer to her as the \"Chief,\" and she's supposed to be in this country... I need to find her.

10100212.ContentEN: Sibylle is a common name, but there's only one that's linked with the title \"Chief.\" You want to find her? How did you lose your mind to the blizzard? I thought Charons are supposed to be resistant to cold temperatures.
10100212.Subtitle: Sibylle is a common name, but there's only one that's linked with the title \"Chief.\" You want to find her? How did you lose your mind to the blizzard? I thought Charons are supposed to be resistant to cold temperatures.

10100213.ContentEN: I'm serious. She might've taken some...thing that's very important to me, so I must find her and get to the bottom of it.
10100213.Subtitle: I'm serious. She might've taken some...thing that's very important to me, so I must find her and get to the bottom of it.

10100214.ContentEN: Espionage, assassination, defiance... With what you've just said, the Imperial soldiers could just arrest you for these three reasons alone. If you really want to find the Chief, I'd advise you not to rush into it.
10100214.Subtitle: Espionage, assassination, defiance... With what you've just said, the Imperial soldiers could just arrest you for these three reasons alone. If you really want to find the Chief, I'd advise you not to rush into it.

10100215.ContentEN: For the last time, if you don't want to end up as Filthoid fodder, come with us.
10100215.Subtitle: For the last time, if you don't want to end up as Filthoid fodder, come with us.

10100216.ContentEN: Thanks for saving my life. But—
10100216.Subtitle: Thanks for saving my life. But—

10100217.ContentEN: You're worried, and suspicious — \"These two strangers must be up to something.\"
10100217.Subtitle: You're worried, and suspicious — \"These two strangers must be up to something.\"

10100219.ContentEN: Then stay here and mull it over by yourself, if you think there's anything about you that's worth anyone else's time.
10100219.Subtitle: Then stay here and mull it over by yourself, if you think there's anything about you that's worth anyone else's time.

10100221.ContentEN: (Right... I have nothing to lose now, what more could they possibly take from me?)
10100221.Subtitle: (Right... I have nothing to lose now, what more could they possibly take from me?)

10100301.ContentEN: You seem to be all bruises and cuts, are you alright?
10100301.Subtitle: You seem to be all bruises and cuts, are you alright?

10100302.ContentEN: I'm fine. The pain's gone now.
10100302.Subtitle: I'm fine. The pain's gone now.

10100303.ContentEN: Something really bad must've happened to you... But no worries!
10100303.Subtitle: Something really bad must've happened to you... But no worries!

10100304.ContentEN: You're under my wing now! Snow will protect you! After all, Snow is—
10100304.Subtitle: You're under my wing now! Snow will protect you! After all, Snow is—

10100305.ContentEN: Woooaaah—!! WWWWWhat is that over there?!
10100305.Subtitle: Woooaaah—!! What is that over there?!

10100401.ContentEN: Seems like someone's had a bit of a mishap, and it's even attracted some Filthoids... Those nasty monsters!
10100401.Subtitle: Seems like someone's had a bit of a mishap, and it's even attracted some beasts... Those nasty monsters!

10100402.ContentEN: Phew, thank goodness we took them down...
10100402.Subtitle: Phew, thank goodness we took them down...

10100403.ContentEN: I'm not afraid! I... I was just worried about that poor driver!
10100403.Subtitle: I'm not afraid! I... I was just worried about that poor driver!

10100404.ContentEN: Well... that was because you seemed so talented, so I decided to give you a simple test...
10100404.Subtitle: Well... that was because you seemed so talented, so I decided to give you a simple test...

10100406.ContentEN: Do you know how far it is from this \"largest city in northern Hyperborea\" to Purgatorio Island?
10100406.Subtitle: Do you know how far it is from this \"largest city in northern Hyperborea\" to Purgatorio Island?

10100407.ContentEN: It's a small island... should be to—
10100407.Subtitle: It's a small island... should be in—

10100408.ContentEN: The south of Hyperborea, under a huge Heaventree, right? It's far, far away, over 1,500 kilometres from here.
10100408.Subtitle: The south of Hyperborea, under a huge Heaventree? It's far, far away, over 1,500 kilometres from here.

10100410.ContentEN: What, did you come from there or are you trying to get there? Eh, don't worry about that now, let's find a safe spot to take a breather first.
10100410.Subtitle: What, did you come from there or are you trying to get there? Eh, don't worry about that now, let's find a safe spot to take a breather first.

10100411.ContentEN: (That far away... so I didn't just drift here.)
10100411.Subtitle: (That far away... so I didn't just drift here.)

10100412.ContentEN: (But who... and why would they bring me here?)
10100412.Subtitle: (But who... and why would they bring me here?)

10100501.ContentEN: The city gate is just up ahead. Follow behind us, we'll get you in!
10100501.Subtitle: The city gate is just up ahead. Follow behind us, we'll get you in!

10100502.ContentEN: And keep your mouth shut. If anything comes up, our almighty Camilla will take care of it!
10100502.Subtitle: And keep your mouth shut. If anything comes up, our almighty Camilla will take care of it!

10100602.ContentEN: Ugh, not another check! Don't even remember Camilla and Snow, huh? Looks like your eyes and your brain aren't working very well.
10100602.Subtitle: Ugh, not another check! Don't even remember Camilla and Snow, huh? Looks like your eyes and your brain aren't working very well.

10100603.ContentEN: Not you, Luno. I was talking to—
10100603.Subtitle: Not you, Luno. I was talking to—

10100604.ContentEN: Oi, one-eye! In such a hurry to visit the Security Bureau for tea, eh?
10100604.Subtitle: Oi, one-eye! In such a hurry to visit the Security Bureau for tea, eh?

10100606.ContentEN: You're not from here, are you? Where are you from? Got your travel permit?
10100606.Subtitle: You're not from here, are you? Where are you from? Got your travel permit?

10100607.ContentEN: Which island? Be specific, there are like a million islands in the South.
10100607.Subtitle: Which island? Be specific, there are like a million islands in the South.

10100608.ContentEN: Never mind, show me your travel permit.
10100608.Subtitle: Never mind, show me your travel permit.

10100610.ContentEN: Ah, yes, this is my cousin's child. They were attacked by Filthoids on their way from Marberg. My cousin died... But this kid miraculously survived.
10100610.Subtitle: Ah, yes, this is my cousin's child. They were attacked by Filthoids on their way from Marberg. My cousin died... But this kid miraculously survived.

10100611.ContentEN: ...{性别:He|She}'s from the south, sent by the Vivar Winery to deliver goods. The bridge was slippery, so the cart overturned, and some Filthoids destroyed this poor thing's cargo and luggage.
10100611.Subtitle: ...{性别:He|She}'s from the south, sent by the Vivar Winery to deliver goods. The bridge was slippery, so the cart overturned, and some Filthoids destroyed this poor thing's cargo and luggage.

10100612.ContentEN: I'll reapply for the travel permit soon, but the child is quite shaken. Please, have mercy on this poor thing, let {性别:him|her} in for a warm meal.
10100612.Subtitle: I'll reapply for the travel permit soon, but the child is quite shaken. Please, have mercy on this poor thing, let {性别:him|her} in for a warm meal.

10100613.ContentEN: {性别:Whoa... aren't you a bit old to be a crybaby, mate? Stop it...|Whoa... why are you crying? Darn it, Chief never told us how to deal with tearful young ladies!}
10100613.Subtitle: {性别:Whoa... aren't you a bit old to be a crybaby, mate? Stop it...|Whoa... why are you crying? Darn it, Chief never told us how to deal with tearful young ladies!}

10100614.ContentEN: This would've been a simple matter in the past, Ms Camilla, but... you know, recently that \"Fork Shakens\" or something is wanted nationwide, so the Chief specifically asked for strict security checks across towns.
10100614.Subtitle: This would've been a simple matter in the past, Ms Camilla, but... you know, recently that \"Fork Shakens\" or something is wanted nationwide, so the Chief specifically asked for strict security checks across towns.

10100615.ContentEN: ...It's the Forsakens. I tell you what — I, Camilla Scarlet, on my honour, assure you that {性别:he|she} has nothing to do with the Forsakens.
10100615.Subtitle: ...It's the Forsakens. I tell you what — I, Camilla Scarlet, on my honour, assure you that {性别:he|she} has nothing to do with the Forsakens.

10100616.ContentEN: Alright, I trust you, Ms Camilla. But remember, keep a close eye on this kid and don't let {性别:him|her} stir up any trouble in town. If the Chief finds out about this, we'll both be in for it.
10100616.Subtitle: Alright, I trust you, Ms Camilla. But remember, keep a close eye on this kid and don't let {性别:him|her} stir up any trouble in town. If the Chief finds out about this, we'll both be in for it.

10100617.ContentEN: Thank you. Next time you come to The Asphodel, it's on the house.
10100617.Subtitle: Thank you very much. Next time you come to The Asphodel, it's on the house.

10100701.ContentEN: Don't cause any trouble in town, you hear me?
10100701.Subtitle: Don't cause any trouble in town, you hear me?

10100801.ContentEN: An excellent performance, I must say.
10100801.Subtitle: An excellent performance, I must say.

10100802.ContentEN: I'd say you are normally an honest kid. Look, your hands are still shaking.
10100802.Subtitle: I'd say you are normally an honest kid. Look, your hands are still shaking.

10100803.ContentEN: It's alright. You'll get used to these tricks of survival in no time in a place like this.
10100803.Subtitle: It's alright. You'll get used to these tricks of survival in no time in a place like this.

10100804.ContentEN: Alright, now that I've brought you in, the <H>deal</> is fulfilled — I should go back to my tavern. Stay out of trouble for me, alright?
10100804.Subtitle: Alright, now that I've brought you in, the deal is fulfilled — I should go back to my tavern. Stay out of trouble for me, alright?

10100805.ContentEN: Wait a minute! I'm still quite confused.
10100805.Subtitle: Wait a minute! I'm still quite confused.

10100806.ContentEN: Then make it quick. Time is money for a merchant.
10100806.Subtitle: Then make it quick. Time is money for a merchant.

10100807.ContentEN: Yep! Just yesterday, in the pitch-black windy evening, a fiend cloaked in white light infiltrated Camilla's tavern and threatened her—
10100807.Subtitle: Yep! Just yesterday, in a pitch-black windy evening, a fiend cloaked in white light infiltrated Camilla's tavern and threatened her—

10100809.ContentEN: Well... a hooded man in a white cloak struck a deal with Camilla to find you and bring you into town.
10100809.Subtitle: Fine... a hooded man in a white cloak struck a deal with Camilla to find you and bring you into town.

10100810.ContentEN: Do you remember what this man looked like?
10100810.Subtitle: Do you remember what this man looked like?

10100811.ContentEN: He was covered head to toe, quite a mysterious figure — you don't know him either?
10100811.Subtitle: He was covered head to toe, quite a mysterious figure — you don't know him either?

10100813.ContentEN: How curious. Some enigmatic benefactor from nowhere is willing to spend a fortune to save a stranger but doesn't want to reveal his identity or intention.
10100813.Subtitle: How curious. Some enigmatic benefactor from nowhere is willing to spend a fortune to save a stranger but doesn't want to reveal his identity or intention.

10100814.ContentEN: Someone will pluck you from the briny waters and lead you to a frozen wilderness, where destiny will pose the ultimate test.
10100814.Subtitle: Fate has arranged for a pair of hands to pluck you from the brinish water and guide you to the next desolate land. There, you shall awaken anew.

10100815.ContentEN: (...Could it have been the person from my dreams who orchestrated my rescue? But to what end have I been brought here?)
10100815.Subtitle: (...Could it have been the person from my dreams who orchestrated my rescue? But to what end have I been brought here?)

10100816.ContentEN: Snow just told you, didn't she? It's leagues away. The southbound train requires a hefty fare, not to mention travel costs... you'd need several thousand silver coins.
10100816.Subtitle: Snow just told you, didn't she? It's leagues away. The southbound train requires a hefty fare, not to mention travel costs... you'd need several thousand silver coins.

10100817.ContentEN: Even if you'd rather beg your way across the Hyperborean plains, you'd still need to somehow deal with the inspections in every town you pass. Next time, you might not be so lucky—
10100817.Subtitle: Even if you'd rather beg your way across the Hyperborean plains, you'd still need to somehow deal with the inspections in every town you pass. Next time, you might not be so lucky—

10100818.ContentEN: For all you know, you might well find yourself languishing in prison.
10100818.Subtitle: For all you know, you might well find yourself languishing in a prison of some city.

10100819.ContentEN: (Hmm... right, going all the way back is no picnic. I must first get some money and, as that soldier mentioned, a \"travel permit.\")
10100819.Subtitle: (Hmm... right, going all the way back is no picnic. I must first get some money and, as that soldier mentioned, a \"travel permit.\")

10100820.ContentEN: The 13th Legion is directly under the Emperor's command, with bases in every province, so Sibylle could be in any part of Hyperborea.
10100820.Subtitle: The 13th Legion is directly under the Emperor's command, with bases in every province, so Sibylle could be in any part of Hyperborea.

10100821.ContentEN: The most likely place, though, is the colossal steel bastion in Dismania, the imperial capital city, where you can find the Empire's finest soldiers and an arsenal of every type of conceivable and inconceivable armaments.
10100821.Subtitle: The most likely place, though, is the colossal steel bastion in the imperial capital, aka Dismania, where you can find the Empire's finest soldiers and an arsenal of every type of conceivable and inconceivable armaments.

10100822.ContentEN: If Hyperborea is a roaring chariot, that place is its engine, its fiery core — if you want to give it a try, go ahead. You're neither the first nor the last madcap I've seen.
10100822.Subtitle: Hyperborea is a roaring chariot, and that place is its engine, its fiery core — if you want to give it a try, go ahead. You're neither the first nor the last madcap I've seen.

10100823.ContentEN: (So, what I'm facing isn't just Sibylle but the Empire behind her. Do I stand a chance? Not for now, at least... I need a plan B.)
10100823.Subtitle: (So, what I'm facing isn't just Sibylle but the Empire behind her. Do I stand a chance? Not for now, at least... I need a plan b.)

10100824.ContentEN: Let's call it a day. I've been out so long, The Asphodel might be in quite disarray by now.
10100824.Subtitle: Let's call it a day. I've been out so long, The Asphodel might be in quite disarray by now.

10100826.ContentEN: Try and survive on your own.
10100826.Subtitle: Try and survive on your own.

10100827.ContentEN: If you can't even do that, then don't ever again mention any mad talk about confronting Sibylle to get your stuff back.
10100827.Subtitle: If you can't even do that, then don't ever again mention any mad talk about confronting Sibylle to get your stuff back.

10100828.ContentEN: ...Look, there's an inn up north called the Hypnos' House that might take in someone with a sketchy backstory like you.
10100828.Subtitle: ...There's an inn up north called the Hypnos' House that might take in someone with a sketchy backstory like you.

10100830.ContentEN: Where else would take in a Charon without a travel permit but a place that is so creepy even the soldiers didn't want to search?
10100830.Subtitle: Where else but the place that is so creepy even the soldiers didn't want to search would take in a Charon without a travel permit?

10100832.ContentEN: Umm... Alright! Seeing you so lonely and lost, I'll take you to this Hypnos' House to see what's what!
10100832.Subtitle: Umm... Alright! Seeing you so lonely and lost, I'll take you to this Hypnos' House to see what's what!

10100901.ContentEN: What exactly did you mean by \"haunted house\"?
10100901.Subtitle: What exactly did you mean by \"haunted house\"?

10100902.ContentEN: I heard about it from the guests at The Asphodel. There's always someone complaining—
10100902.Subtitle: I heard about it from the guests at The Asphodel. There's always someone complaining—

10100903.ContentEN: Like, even though it's such a big inn, the doors are always shut tight every day, turning away any travellers from outside the town...
10100903.Subtitle: Like, even though it's such a big inn, the doors are always shut tight every day, turning away any travellers from outside the town...

10100904.ContentEN: Or how the lodgers seem to never ever leave, and sometimes, there's this really weird smell drifting from the inside of the house...
10100904.Subtitle: Or how the lodgers seem to never ever leave, and sometimes, there's this really weird smell drifting from the inside of the house...

10100905.ContentEN: And how the innkeeper's face is colder than the waters of Lamenting Lake... It's as if he's not running an inn, but a coffin shop!
10100905.Subtitle: And how the innkeeper's face is colder than the waters of Lamenting Lake... It's as if he's not running an inn, but a coffin shop!

10100906.ContentEN: It doesn't sound too bad. I thought it was crammed with Filthoids and Sibylles.
10100906.Subtitle: Oh, it doesn't sound too bad. I thought it was crammed with Filthoids and Sibylles.

10100907.ContentEN: But, if they don't welcome outsiders, I doubt if I can...
10100907.Subtitle: But, if they don't welcome outsiders, I doubt if I can...

10100908.ContentEN: Still, it seems Ms Camilla Scarlet holds some sway here. Hmm... perhaps I could leverage her influence a little bit.
10100908.Subtitle: Still, it seems Ms Camilla Scarlet holds some sway here. Hmm... perhaps I could leverage her influence a little bit.

10100909.ContentEN: Nah, you can use Snow's name. From now on, you're under my wing, my little minion!
10100909.Subtitle: Nah, you can use Snow's name. From now on, you're under my wing, my little minion!

10100911.ContentEN: It's what they call someone in those stories who's the favourite lackey of the awesome Demon King!
10100911.Subtitle: It's what they call someone in those stories who's the favourite lackey of the awesome Demon King!

10100912.ContentEN: Among all the Luno in the world, why else would little ol' Snow have these nifty horns, if not to be a Demon King one day? It's totally my destiny!
10100912.Subtitle: Among all the Luno in the world, why else would little ol' Snow have these nifty horns, if not to be a Demon King one day? It's totally my destiny!

10100913.ContentEN: And it was those mysterious voices that brought me to you, so you must be the minion sent by destiny!
10100913.Subtitle: And it was those mysterious voices that brought me to you, so you must be the minion sent by destiny!

10100914.ContentEN: Soooo~ I've made up my mind— with all my wisdom, I'm gonna guide you down the right path!
10100914.Subtitle: Soooo~ I've made up my mind — with all my wisdom, I'm gonna guide you down the right path!

10100916.ContentEN: (\"<H>The Lunarians</> are generally friendly towards humans\"... The books weren't lying.)
10100916.Subtitle: (\"The Lunarians are generally friendly towards humans\"... the books weren't lying.)

10100917.ContentEN: The inn's just up north! C'mon, fol—low—me!
10100917.Subtitle: The inn's just up north! C'mon, fol—low—me!

10100918.ContentEN: (...It's just that this one seems a tad too friendly.)
10100918.Subtitle: (...It's just that this one seems a tad too friendly.)

10101001.ContentEN: Here we are! You wait here!
10101001.Subtitle: Here we are! You wait here!

10101102.ContentEN: Um, ahem! I am the Pure-White Redeemer ☆ Demon King of Light. Listen well, this person...
10101102.Subtitle: Um, ahem! I am the Pure-White Redeemer ☆ Demon King of Light. Listen well, this person...

10101201.ContentEN: Ms Camilla Scarlet told me to come to this place. I was hoping to stay here for a few days, would that be possible?
10101201.Subtitle: Ms Camilla Scarlet told me to come to this place. I was hoping to stay here for a few days, would that be possible?

10101205.ContentEN: ...That woman's misplaced compassion knows no bounds.
10101205.Subtitle: ...That woman's misplaced compassion knows no bounds.

10101208.ContentEN: The price you're willing to pay.
10101208.Subtitle: The price you're willing to pay.

10101213.ContentEN: Yo-You're so rude! A real disgrace to Icelake!
10101213.Subtitle: Yo-You're so rude! A real disgrace to Icelake!

10101303.ContentEN: I just tidied up the house again, and it's all set... Ah!
10101303.Subtitle: I just tidied up the house again, and it's all set... Oopsie!

10101305.ContentEN: Uh! I got a little dizzy and didn't see the step, thank you.
10101305.Subtitle: Uh! I got a little dizzy and didn't see the step, thank you.

10101402.ContentEN: Just a penniless outsider looking for a place to stay, I was about to kick {性别:him|her} out.
10101402.Subtitle: Just a penniless outsider looking for a place to stay, I was about to kick {性别:him|her} out.

10101403.ContentEN: An outsider? But... if you kick {性别:him|her} out, won't {性别:he|she} be homeless?
10101403.Subtitle: An outsider? But... if you kick {性别:him|her} out, won't {性别:he|she} be homeless?

10101405.ContentEN: But... the house is still unsold anyway, lending it to {性别:him|her} for one night wouldn't hurt, right? {性别:He|She} can pay you back when {性别:he|she} can, that way we get a little extra cash for basically nothing.
10101405.Subtitle: But... the house is still unsold anyway, lending it to {性别:him|her} for one night wouldn't hurt, right? {性别:He|She} can pay you back when {性别:he|she} can, that way we get a little extra cash for basically nothing.

10101406.ContentEN: If you keep being so cold to everyone, you'll never find a buyer for that place.
10101406.Subtitle: If you keep being so cold to everyone, you'll never find a buyer for that place.

10101409.ContentEN: But just for one night. Come morning, you must go wherever you're supposed to.
10101409.Subtitle: But just for one night. Come morning, you must go wherever you're supposed to.

10101501.ContentEN: The house is to the south, follow me!
10101501.Subtitle: The house is up south, follow me!

10101601.ContentEN: This room has just been cleaned up. You can stay here tonight.
10101601.Subtitle: This room has just been cleaned up. You can stay here tonight.

10101603.ContentEN: Don't be upset, Mr Henrik isn't really that greedy. It's just we've been quite strapped for cash lately, otherwise he wouldn't consider selling his old house to make ends meet.
10101603.Subtitle: Don't be upset, Mr Henrik isn't really that greedy. It's just we've been quite strapped for cash lately, otherwise he wouldn't consider selling his old house to make ends meet.

10101604.ContentEN: It's been neglected for years, but after a good clean, it's not half bad, right? At least it keeps out the chill!
10101604.Subtitle: It's been neglected for years, but after a good clean, it's not half bad, right? At least it keeps out the chill!

10101605.ContentEN: Oh, I haven't introduced myself. I'm Psyche, a lodger at the Hypnos' House. And sometimes I help Mr Henrik out.
10101605.Subtitle: Oh, I haven't introduced myself. I'm Psyche, a lodger at the Hypnos' House. And sometimes I help Mr Henrik around.

10101606.ContentEN: {nickname}... That's quite an uncommon name in this city.
10101606.Subtitle: ... That's quite an uncommon name in this city.

10101607.ContentEN: Mr Henrik mentioned you're not a local. Where are you from? Your outfit is a new sight for me.
10101607.Subtitle: Mr Henrik mentioned you're not a local. Where are you from? Your outfit is quite unfamiliar to me.

10101608.ContentEN: A small island, far, far to the south.
10101608.Subtitle: A small island, far, far to the south.

10101609.ContentEN: The South — I know it! It's a place with four seasons, including spring! And an island... you must have seen the \"ocean.\" I've heard it's even bigger than a hundred Lamenting Lakes put together...
10101609.Subtitle: The South — I know it! It's a place with four seasons, including spring! And an island... you must have seen the \"ocean.\" I've heard it's even bigger than a hundred Lamenting Lakes put together...

10101611.ContentEN: O-Of course not! We luno folks aren't as fragile as you... We don't get hungry so easily.
10101611.Subtitle: O-Of course not! We luno folks aren't as fragile as you... We don't get hungry so easily.

10101612.ContentEN: ...Are you hungry? I'll get you something to eat. Be right back!
10101612.Subtitle: ...Are you hungry? I'll get you something to eat. Be right back!

10101613.ContentEN: Who'd have thought such a rude and gloomy innkeeper would have such a nice and helpful kid working for him...
10101613.Subtitle: Who'd have thought such a rude and gloomy innkeeper would have such a nice and helpful kid working for him...

10101614.ContentEN: Thanks to her, we've finally found a place to stay. Let's rest a bit — I'm quite tired too!
10101614.Subtitle: Thanks to her, we've finally found a place to stay. Let's rest a bit — I'm quite tired too!

10101701.ContentEN: (So much has happened... Weird dreams, that mysterious man in a white cloak, Sibylle, and \"No. 0\"... They all seem to be connected somehow, but I can't figure it out.)
10101701.Subtitle: (So much has happened... Weird dreams, that mysterious man in a white cloak, Sibylle, and \"No. 0\"... They all seem to be connected somehow, but I can't figure it out.)

10101702.ContentEN: (The only thing I'm certain of is that I've lost Berry...)
10101702.Subtitle: (The only thing I'm certain of is that I've lost touch with Berry...)

10101703.ContentEN: (...If she's managed to escape, she'd surely try everything to find me... Of course, I can't rule out the worst-case scenario that Sibylle has taken her to the Legion.)
10101703.Subtitle: (...If she's managed to escape, she'd surely try everything to find me... Of course, I can't rule out the worst-case scenario that Sibylle has taken her to the Legion.)

10101704.ContentEN: (The silver lining is, it seemed that Sibylle <H>needed</> Berry for some reason, so she probably wouldn't harm her.)
10101704.Subtitle: (The silver lining is, it seemed that Sibylle needed Berry for some reason, so she probably wouldn't harm her.)

10101705.ContentEN: (...Anyway, I need to scrape together some money in Icelake, get a travel permit, and then plan for my next move.)
10101705.Subtitle: (...Anyway, I need to scrape together some money in Icelake, get a travel permit, and then plan for my next move.)

10101802.ContentEN: You must be starving. Here's some freshly baked bread.
10101802.Subtitle: You must be starving. Here's some freshly baked bread.

10101807.ContentEN: I'm fine. Just so hungry that I accidentally bit my tongue. It hurts, so...
10101807.Subtitle: I'm fine. Just so hungry that I accidentally bit my tongue. It hurts, so...

10101808.ContentEN: Then you better eat some bread and wash it down with warm milk, that'll make you feel better — be careful, don't bite your tongue again.
10101808.Subtitle: Then you better eat some bread and wash it down with some warm milk, that'll make you feel better — be careful, don't bite your tongue again.

10101812.ContentEN: I can feel it. Even though you're trying to put on a smile, you're not happy.
10101812.Subtitle: I can feel it. Even though you're trying to put on a smile, you're not happy.

10101813.ContentEN: I'm a bit curious about what you've been through, but Mr Henrik told me not to pry into our guests' pasts.
10101813.Subtitle: I'm a bit curious about what you've been through, but Mr Henrik told me not to pry into our guests' pasts.

10101814.ContentEN: Anyway... you can take a good rest here, and think about what to do next.
10101814.Subtitle: Anyway... you can take a good rest here, and think about what to do next.

10101901.ContentEN: Psyche, I need to ask you something.
10101901.Subtitle: Psyche, I need to ask you something.

10101902.ContentEN: I need some money. Is there any place in the city where an outsider might find work without too many questions asked about their past?
10101902.Subtitle: I need some money. Is there any place in the city where an outsider might find work without too many questions asked about their past?

10101904.ContentEN: Most people here work in the factories... Um, but they all ask to see a travel permit... Well, there's perhaps one place you could try—
10101904.Subtitle: Most people here work in the factories... um, but they all ask to see a travel permit... Well, there's perhaps one place you could try—

10101905.ContentEN: Ms Camilla Scarlet's tavern, <H>The Asphodel</>. You can take up commissions with handsome rewards there.
10101905.Subtitle: Ms Camilla Scarlet's tavern, The Asphodel. You can take up commissions with handsome rewards there.

10101906.ContentEN: But, those commissions are often quite dangerous... You might have to go to places even the local Escort would avoid, and you might encounter some wandering Filthoids...
10101906.Subtitle: But, those commissions are often quite dangerous... you might have to go to places even the local Escort would avoid, and you might encounter some wandering Filthoids...

10101907.ContentEN: Camilla Scarlet? I met her today. Though I had no idea that her tavern also runs this sort of business.
10101907.Subtitle: Camilla Scarlet? I've met this lady once. Though I had no idea that her tavern also runs this sort of business.

10101908.ContentEN: It's okay, I can handle it. Can you take me there?
10101908.Subtitle: It's okay, I can handle it. Can you take me there?

10102001.ContentEN: Huh? After all this running around, you're going back to Camilla?
10102001.Subtitle: Huh? After all this running around, you're going back to Camilla?

10102002.ContentEN: Then count Snow in! Snow's more than familiar with that place.
10102002.Subtitle: Then count Snow in! Snow's more than familiar with that place.

10102102.ContentEN: Are you deaf? Show me your... travel permit!
10102102.Subtitle: Are you deaf? Show me your... travel permit!

10102103.ContentEN: Sorry, sir, I'm a bit slow at this age, please bear with me for a moment...
10102103.Subtitle: Sorry, sir, I'm a bit slow at this age, please bear with me for a moment...

10102105.ContentEN: Huh...? Oh, is this you in the photo... you old codger?
10102105.Subtitle: Huh...? Oh, is this you in the photo... you old codger?

10102107.ContentEN: How come it looks more like a mongrel to me, haha, hahaha!
10102107.Subtitle: How come it looks more like a mongrel to me, haha, hahaha!

10102108.ContentEN: Oi, why don't you give us a bark, huh?
10102108.Subtitle: Oi, why don't you give us a bark, huh?

10102202.ContentEN: What are you looking at, you little twerp?
10102202.Subtitle: What are you looking at, you little twerp?

10102203.ContentEN: Stay out of trouble for me, alright?
10102203.Subtitle: Stay out of trouble for me, alright?

10102206.ContentEN: What do you think you're doing?!
10102206.Subtitle: What do you think you're doing?!

10102402.ContentEN: There's something important you should know.
10102402.Subtitle: There's something important you should know.

10102403.ContentEN: If you're from somewhere afar, remember, never anger the <H>humans</>.
10102403.Subtitle: If you're from outside Hyperborea, remember, never anger the humans.

10102404.ContentEN: The \"humans\"? You mean those without horns... What's so special about them?
10102404.Subtitle: The \"humans\"...? What's so special about them?

10102405.ContentEN: Or is it that, <H>WE</> are the special ones?
10102405.Subtitle: Or is it that, WE are the special ones?

10102406.ContentEN: Yes. Here in Hyperborea, we, the <H>Charons</>, with our distinctive horns and spines, are different from humans. They even call us...
10102406.Subtitle: Yes. Here in Hyperborea, we, the Charons, with our unique looks, are different from humans. They even call us...

10102408.ContentEN: Ugh, speaking of which, Snow is super mad!
10102408.Subtitle: Ugh, speaking of which, Snow is super mad!

10102409.ContentEN: Whenever those humans talk about stuff like \"demon's children\" and \"magic,\" they always give such dirty looks... just like when Camilla sees a drunken brawl in The Asphodel. But it's actually the \"demon's children\" who are being bullied by them!
10102409.Subtitle: Whenever those humans talk about stuff like \"demon's children\" and \"magic,\" they always give such dirty looks... just like when Camilla sees a drunken brawl in The Asphodel. But it's actually the \"demon's children\" who are being bullied by them!

10102412.ContentEN: But the fact remains, we are unwelcome here. So, be extra careful when you deal with humans.
10102412.Subtitle: But the fact remains, we are unwelcome here. So, be extra careful when you deal with humans.

10102413.ContentEN: That soldier back there, even for such a cruel crime, will only be locked up for a few days.
10102413.Subtitle: That soldier back there, even for such a cruel crime, will only be locked up for a few days.

10102414.ContentEN: We've seen stuff like this many, many times... until everyone gets so used to it. Such things are commonplace in this place—
10102414.Subtitle: We've seen stuff like this many, many times... until everyone gets so used to it. Such things are commonplace in this place—

10102415.ContentEN: They are just as ordinary as the fact that Charons aren't allowed to enter the inner city of Icelake or leave the Empire. As ordinary as flowers withering, lakes freezing over, and snow melting in the hearth.
10102415.Subtitle: They are just as ordinary as the fact that Charons aren't allowed to enter the inner city of Icelake or leave the Empire, that flowers would wither, lakes would freeze, and snow would melt in the hearth.

10102416.ContentEN: (...This makes returning to Purgatorio Island even more challenging.)
10102416.Subtitle: (...This makes returning to Purgatorio Island even more challenging.)

10102418.ContentEN: The humans of Hyperborea believe that the Charons who wield \"magic\" are evil sorcerers, the greatest threat to their peaceful life.
10102418.Subtitle: The humans of Hyperborea believe that the Charons who wield \"magic\" are evil sorcerers, the greatest threat to their peaceful life.

10102419.ContentEN: But you can't always just suck it! Why not use your magic on them, and BOOM! Make them cry like babies! ...Ugh, seriously, it makes me so mad!
10102419.Subtitle: But you can't always just suck it! Why not use your magic on them, and BOOM! Make them cry like babies! ...Ugh, seriously, it makes me so mad!

10102420.ContentEN: For most people, the only important thing in life is to survive. We don't want to die, so we have to struggle disgracefully to live.
10102420.Subtitle: For most people, the only important thing in life is to survive. We fear a dignified death, so we have to struggle disgracefully to live.

10102421.ContentEN: Stopping you back there was indeed out of my cowardice, but... I can't let you get killed like that... especially on your first day here.
10102421.Subtitle: Stopping you back there was indeed out of my cowardice, but... I can't let you get killed like that on your first day here.

10102422.ContentEN: You did the right thing... Ms Camilla vouched for me so I could get into the city. I can't just go mess with the wrong people and get her in trouble.
10102422.Subtitle: You did the right thing... Ms Camilla vouched for me so I could get into the city. I can't just go mess with the wrong people and get her in trouble.

10102424.ContentEN: The Asphodel is just up ahead, let's go.
10102424.Subtitle: The Asphodel is just up ahead, let's go.

10102501.ContentEN: ...And then, out of nowhere, he ambushed me and pinched the cash I'd just gotten. That rotter, doesn't even spare us scavengers! That money was for several families' upkeep in the slums!
10102501.Subtitle:
...And then, out of nowhere, he ambushed me and pinched the cash I'd just gotten. That rotter, doesn't even spare us scavengers!\
That money was for several families' upkeep in the slums!

10102502.ContentEN: Without that bag of coins, all the young and old will have to tighten their belts even more next month. Ugh... I have no idea where the thief has run off to, I need someone to help me nab him.
10102502.Subtitle: Without that bag of coins, all the young and old will have to tighten their belts even more next month. Ugh... I've no idea where the thief has run off to, I need someone to help me nab him.

10102503.ContentEN: Shouldn't this be something for the Security Bureau to handle?
10102503.Subtitle: Shouldn't this be something for the Security Bureau to handle?

10102504.ContentEN: Well, by the time the Security Bureau bothers with us Charons, the ice in Lamenting Lake would've melted away!
10102504.Subtitle: Well, by the time the Security Bureau bothers with us Charons, the ice in Lamenting Lake would've melted away!

10102505.ContentEN: Please, Ms Camilla, the kindest and most beautiful lady in Icelake, could you maybe ask some of the Phoxhunters here to lend a hand... Just one tiny favour! Pretty please!
10102505.Subtitle:
Please, Ms Camilla, the kindest and most beautiful lady in Icelake, could you maybe ask some of the Phoxhunters here to\
lend a hand... Just one tiny favour! Pretty please!

10102506.ContentEN: Save it. You should know that nothing asked for here comes without a price.
10102506.Subtitle: Save it. You should know that nothing asked for here comes without a price.

10102507.ContentEN: Well then, can you maybe... give me a discount... or I could offer you something else! How does it go again—
10102507.Subtitle: Well then, can you maybe... give me a discount... or I could offer you something else! How does it go again—

10102508.ContentEN: \"Information is as good as gold\"! Right, I deal with all the rubbish bins in Icelake, so how about this — if I stumble upon any useful info, you'll be the first to know.
10102508.Subtitle:
\"Information is as good as gold\"! Right, I deal with all the rubbish bins in Icelake, so how about this —\
if I stumble upon any useful info, you'll be the first to know.

10102601.ContentEN: It's you. And you're... the little girl from the Frey's? Psyche, isn't it?
10102601.Subtitle: Oh, it's you. And you're... the little girl from the Frey's? Psyche, isn't it?

10102602.ContentEN: Yes, Ms Camilla. I'm staying at the Hypnos' House for now.
10102602.Subtitle: Yes, Ms Camilla. I'm staying at the Hypnos' House for now.

10102604.ContentEN: ...I'm here with a friend. {性别:He|She} is looking for a job and wants to become a Phoxhunter.
10102604.Subtitle: ...I'm here with a friend. {性别:He|She} is looking for a job and wants to become a Phoxhunter.

10102605.ContentEN: Then you came to the right place! There's a commission for Phoxhunters right now—
10102605.Subtitle: Then you came to the right place! There's a commission for Phoxhunters right now—

10102608.ContentEN: Already made friends... You're quite a charmer, aren't you? As for Phoxhunters—
10102608.Subtitle:
Already made friends... you're quite a charmer, aren't you?\
As for Phoxhunters—

10102609.ContentEN: Let's get one thing straight — this isn't child's play, nor an easy gig. It's TRUE that in this place, no one would probe into your past or background, but the rewards always come with risks.
10102609.Subtitle:
Let's get one thing straight — this isn't child's play, nor an easy gig. It's false that in this place,\
no one would probe into your past or background, but the rewards always come with risks.

10102610.ContentEN: You don't look tough, though your courage is admirable.
10102610.Subtitle: You don't look tough, though your courage is admirable.

10102611.ContentEN: You're indeed stronger than the average Charon — I've seen you in a fight. But brute strength isn't enough to qualify you to be a Phoxhunter. You need to prove that you're capable of dealing with all possible contingencies and a very mixed group of clients.
10102611.Subtitle:
You're indeed stronger than the average Charons — I've seen you in a fight. But brute strength isn't enough to\
qualify you to be a Phoxhunter. You need to prove that you're capable of dealing with\
all possible contingencies and a very mixed group of clients.

10102612.ContentEN: It just so happens that a chance for that came in just now.
10102612.Subtitle: It just so happens that a chance for that came just now.

10102614.ContentEN: Snow heard that someone swiped this lady's money.
10102614.Subtitle: Snow heard that someone swiped this lady's money bag.

10102701.ContentEN: She seems quite distressed; I can lend a hand too so we can get it back sooner.
10102701.Subtitle: She seems quite distressed; I can lend a hand too so we can get it back sooner.

10102702.ContentEN: No, this is a simple test just for a prospective Phoxhunter. If you don't have the chops for it, becoming a Phoxhunter would kill you.
10102702.Subtitle: No, this is a simple test just for a prospective Phoxhunter. If you don't have the chops for it, becoming a Phoxhunter would kill you.

10102801.ContentEN: You'd really help me out? Aww... thank you!
10102801.Subtitle: You'd really help me out? Aww... thank you! You're like the {性别:brother|sister} I never had!

10102802.ContentEN: That scoundrel headed west. But you know, Icelake is a maze of streets, so I can't be sure where he might have gone. Let's look for some clues first!
10102802.Subtitle:
That scoundrel headed toward the north. But, you know, Icelake is like a huge maze, so I'm not sure where he's got to.\
Let's split up and have a look around.

10103001.ContentEN: It's surprisingly roomy down here! And much warmer than above ground — like a secret little kingdom.
10103001.Subtitle: It's pretty roomy down here, even a bit warmer than above the ground...

10103002.ContentEN: Chase away those critters and get rid of the smell, then you could pitch a tent and practically live here!
10103002.Subtitle: Wow, it's reeeaaally big, like a secret little kingdom! One could live here without paying a penny!

10103003.ContentEN: Right! Whoo, {nickname}, you should live here — it's rent-free!

10103004.ContentEN: Let's turf these critters out, seize their land, and I'll crown myself the Demon King! I'd appoint you as...
10103004.Subtitle: Let's turf these people out, seize their land, and I'll be the demon king here! I'll appoint you as...

10103005.ContentEN: \"The Valiant Cyclopean Warrior, the Cold Lord of Icelake, the Inaugural Duke of the Sewers\"!
10103005.Subtitle: \"The Valiant Cyclopean Warrior, the Cold Lord of Icelake, the Inaugural Duke of the Sewers\"!

10103006.ContentEN: (That title's a bit of a mouthful and could use a polish...)
10103006.Subtitle: (That title's a bit of a mouthful, could use a polish. And dealing with the stench here should be no picnic...)

10103007.ContentEN: (Hold on — why am I even considering this?)
10103007.Subtitle: (Hold on, why am I even seriously thinking this through?)

10103103.ContentEN: I thought that scavenger girl was a pushover. Didn't expect her to call for backup...
10103103.Subtitle: I thought that scavenger girl was a pushover, didn't expect she's got backup...

10103104.Subtitle: But to think just the two of you can actually get me?

10103201.ContentEN: That's for underestimating Snow's minion! Now you know what we've got!
10103201.Subtitle: That's for underestimating Snow's minion! Now you know what we've got!

10103203.ContentEN: Alright, alright, here's your money bag! I haven't had a decent meal in days, so I got desperate... I'm sorry!
10103203.Subtitle: Tsk... If I hadn't been starved all day, I'd never have touched this bloody thing, let alone lost to you!

10103204.ContentEN: Oh, you're starving? Guess what, so is everyone in the slums! And you didn't seem so sorry when you snatched the money bag from me!
10103204.Subtitle: Hunger doesn't justify preying on others.

10103205.ContentEN: Mm... How about this: You threw a few punches at me, so now I'm gonna hit you with my shovel a few times! Then we call it even, and you can leave.
10103205.Subtitle: What you stole wasn't just a money bag, it was a lifeline for many.

10103206.Subtitle: Ms Camilla? Did you follow us here to help...

10103207.Subtitle: You've come all this way to Icelake, it'd be a shame to meet your maker in this sorry spot on your first day.

10103208.ContentEN: Watch out, Margie! He's got something in his hand!
10103208.Subtitle: Tsk, who's this then, some big shot? Ah, just a tavern-keeping old hen. What're you gonna do about it? Hand me over to the Security Bureau? Do you really think those high-ups give a d*mn about Charons...

10103211.ContentEN: (Something just knocked the dagger away... is that a dinner knife?)

10103212.ContentEN: Remember, sometimes a beast baring its belly isn't showing weakness — it might be baiting a trap. Drop your guard, and you'll get bitten.

10103213.ContentEN: Like the wild, the city's teeming with beasts like that. Margie, be wary of undue mercy or trust. You too, {nickname}.

10103215.ContentEN: Ms Camilla? Did you come all this way to back us up?

10103216.ContentEN: Since you've come all this way to Icelake, it'd be a shame to meet your maker in this sorry spot on your first day, wouldn't it?

10103217.ContentEN: Tsk, I thought some big shot came, turns out it's just a tavern-keeping old hen. What are you gonna do about it? Call the guards? Do you really think those high-ups give a d*mn about Charons...

10103301.ContentEN: We'll handle you \"our way\" — teach you a few life lessons your presumably absent mother never did.
10103301.Subtitle: We'll handle you \"our way\" — teach you a few life lessons your presumably absent mother never did.

10103302.ContentEN: Don't you dare bring my mum into this...! Let go of me! You nasty hag!
10103302.Subtitle: Don't you dare bring my mum into this...! Let go of me! You nasty hag!

10103303.ContentEN: Camilla grips the young man's wrist with surprising strength — you can even hear the bones of his forearm cracking.
10103303.Subtitle: Camilla grips the young man's wrist with surprising strength — you can even hear the bones of his forearm cracking.

10103304.ContentEN: But then, Camilla gasps sharply and stumbles back, her eyes fixed on the young man's wrist.
10103304.Subtitle: But then, Camilla gasps sharply and stumbles back, her eyes fixed on the young man's wrist.

10103305.ContentEN: His sleeve, torn in the scuffle, reveals a deep, black mark etched into his skin. The mark looks so sinister that one word comes to mind — \"demon.\"
10103305.Subtitle: His sleeve, torn in the scuffle, reveals a deep, black mark etched into his skin. The mark looks so sinister that one word comes to mind — \"demon.\"

10103401.ContentEN: Take him to the Security Bureau, straight to Chief Damian. This is out of our hands now.
10103401.Subtitle: Take him to the Security Bureau. This has escalated beyond our control.

10103403.ContentEN: Please, I...I surrender, p...please don't take me there! I'll do anything!
10103403.Subtitle: Please, I, I surrender, p—please don't take me there!

10103404.ContentEN: I...I'll leave Icelake for good! Please let me go, I'm begging you!

10103405.ContentEN: Ms Camilla, what's wrong with him?

10103406.Subtitle: Are you playing dumb or you really don't know? If you're not pretending, I almost envy such ignorance.

10103407.ContentEN: He's much more dangerous than he looks.
10103407.Subtitle: It's an incurable blight, the root of the suffering of all Charons in Hyperborea.

10103408.ContentEN: ...Anyway, Margie got her money back, and you've proved yourself, {nickname}.
10103408.Subtitle: I don't quite follow.

10103409.ContentEN: If you're still set on becoming a Phoxhunter, meet me at The Asphodel.
10103409.Subtitle: I'll hand the money bag over to the client. If you're still set on becoming a Phoxhunter, find me in The Asphodel.

10103410.ContentEN: Please — just let me go! Please!

10103501.ContentEN: Hmm, that was weird... Why did Ms Camilla suddenly freak out like that? She's usually so cool-headed.
10103501.Subtitle: No, please... I'm begging you! Don't send me there—

10103502.ContentEN: And that thief too — shaking like a leaf all of a sudden. Is the Security Bureau really that scary?
10103502.Subtitle: He seemed terrified. I wonder what's in store for him at the Security Bureau.

10103503.ContentEN: Looks like he's in for a tough time. All I wanted was to get my money bag back and maybe teach him a lesson — I didn't expect all this.
10103503.Subtitle: Mmm, they'll probably give him a really harsh telling-off. But more importantly, I must commend you.

10103504.ContentEN: Oh, I almost forgot — here's your reward!
10103504.Subtitle: Heehee, you were on fire, my little minion! That brash thing, and yet we put him in his place!

10103505.ContentEN: Thank you so much! You're a lifesaver, my {性别:brother from another mother|sister from another mister}!
10103505.Subtitle: A little correction — it wasn't \"we\", you were hiding behind me the whole time.

10103506.ContentEN: Well, I gotta go divvy up these coins. I usually do my \"shopping\" all over Icelake. If you need me, just drop my name in the slums, and they'll help you find me.

10103507.ContentEN: Alright, let's go find Camilla, little minion!

10103601.ContentEN: The Asphodel is just to the south.
10103601.Subtitle: The Asphodel is just to the south.

10103602.ContentEN: Come on! Snow will be waiting for you in the square!
10103602.Subtitle: Come on! Snow will be waiting for you in the square!

10103701.ContentEN: Over here, all the commissions for Phoxhunters are listed on this board!
10103701.Subtitle: Over here, all the commissions for Phoxhunters are listed on this board!

10103801.ContentEN: Ah, hi Snow! Lending a hand to Phoxhunters again? What is it this time —Nabbed a few hundred bandits, thwarted a dozen dastardly schemes?
10103801.Subtitle:
Ah, hi Snow! Lending a hand to the Phoxhunters again? What is it this time —\
Nabbed a few hundred bandits, thwarted a dozen dastardly schemes?

10103802.ContentEN: Today I'm keeping it low-key, just nabbed a petty thief.
10103802.Subtitle: Today I'm keeping it low-key, just nabbed a petty thief.

10103803.ContentEN: Just one? That sounds almost believable, I've got to see this.
10103803.Subtitle: Just one? That sounds almost believable, I've got to see this.

10103804.ContentEN: I've never fibbed before! Come here, my little minion. This is Mr Wells, the most hard-working Phoxhunter around here.
10103804.Subtitle: I've never fibbed before! Come here, my little minion. This is Mr Wells, the most hard-working Phoxhunter around here.

10103806.ContentEN: So it was you? Looking all neat and tidy, who'd have thought you had it in you?
10103806.Subtitle: So it was you? Looking all neat and tidy, who'd have thought you had it in you?

10103807.ContentEN: Thanks, it was just a small thing.
10103807.Subtitle: Thanks, it was just a small thing.

10103808.ContentEN: A small thing? Let me tell you, it's all these small things that have turned Icelake into what it is now. If it was something big, Icelake would be turned upside down.
10103808.Subtitle:
A small thing? Let me tell you, it's all these small things that have turned Icelake into what it is now. If it was something big,\
Icelake would be turned upside down.

10103809.ContentEN: Then I should try harder, learn from professionals like you—
10103809.Subtitle: Then I should try harder, learn from professionals like you—

10103810.ContentEN: Learn from me? Give me a break! Take a good long think and figure out why you ended up on this path, this is what you should do.
10103810.Subtitle: Learn from me? You flatter me! Take a good long think and figure out why you ended up on this path, this is what you should do.

10103812.ContentEN: Who doesn't? I've got folks owing me a fortune! Being short's one thing, but I've never stooped to thieving or robbing.
10103812.Subtitle: Who doesn't? I've got folks owing me a fortune! Being short's one thing, but I've never stooped to thieving or robbing.

10103813.ContentEN: {nickname}, you're back! Everything okay? Did you catch that thief?
10103813.Subtitle: ! You're back.

10103814.ContentEN: It was a piece of cake! My little minion and I gave that bad thief a good thrashing — he ended up crying and begging for mercy!

10103815.ContentEN: Huh, so you're the one who nabbed the thief? I thought Snow called you \"minion\" because you got caught by her... But then again, who in their right mind would get caught by Snow... What was I thinking!?
10103815.Subtitle:
Huh, so you're the one who nabbed the thief? I thought Snow was calling you \"minion\" 'cause you were pinched by her...\
But then, who in their right mind would get caught by Snow... What was I thinking!

10103816.ContentEN: {性别:He|She} was the witness of my deeds! You had it all wrong! You've made a fool of yourself this time, haven't you? Serves you right for being so preachy all the time!
10103816.Subtitle:
{性别:He|She} was the witness of my deeds! You had it all wrong! Made a fool of yourself this time, haven't you?\
Serves you right for being so preachy all the time!

10103817.ContentEN: Sorry for what I've just said... Care for a drink? Just let Camilla know — it's on me. Consider it an apology.
10103817.Subtitle: Sorry, sorry... fancy a drink? Just let Camilla know, it's on me. Consider it an apology.

10103901.ContentEN: That's great! Your first commission went smoother than I expected.
10103901.Subtitle: That's great! Your first commission went smoother than I expected.

10103902.ContentEN: Go tell Camilla what drink you want, it's on me.
10103902.Subtitle: Go tell Camilla what drink you want, it's on me.

10104001.ContentEN: Your first gig was quite slick, and you got on with Wells. Your career as a Phoxhunter is off to a good start.
10104001.Subtitle: Your first gig was quite slick, and you got on with Wells. Your career as a Phoxhunter is off to a good start.

10104002.ContentEN: Here, a hot drink to warm you up. I was going to treat you to one, but since Wells has offered, we'll put it on his tab.
10104002.Subtitle: Here, a hot drink to warm you up. I was going to treat you to one, but since Wells has offered, we'll put it on his tab.

10104003.ContentEN: Right, I did mistake this {性别:lad|lass} for a thief, it's the least I can do.
10104003.Subtitle: Right, I did mistake this {性别:lad|lass} for a thief, it's the least I can do.

10104004.ContentEN: Oh, and I can also catch {性别:him|her} up on our line of work. To be honest, it's been pretty tough lately, any commission worth a jot has to be fought for.
10104004.Subtitle:
Oh, and I can also catch {性别:him|her} up on our line of work. To be honest, it's been pretty tough lately,\
any commission worth a jot has to be fought for.

10104005.ContentEN: I just had a gander at today's jobs, and they're all thankless. Except for that hot potato...
10104005.Subtitle: I just had a gander at today's jobs, and they're all thankless. Except for that hot potato...

10104006.ContentEN: A right bother of a job, finding some daft stone — eh, no point in telling you, even us old hands don't dare touch it, let alone a newbie like you.
10104006.Subtitle:
A right bother of a job, finding some daft stone — eh, no point in telling you, even us old hands don't dare touch it,\
let alone a newbie like you.

10104007.ContentEN: It's looking for a rare mineral called <H>Crystallo of Stella</> in the old Glevum Pit. The client is <H>Henrik Ethelred</> — Yes, the very same Henrik you know.
10104007.Subtitle:
It's looking for a rare mineral called Crystallo of Stella in the old Glevum Pit. The client is Henrik Ethelred—\
Yes, the very same Henrik you know.

10104008.ContentEN: Glevum Pit is now a den for Filthoids. A few Phoxhunters tried their luck, hoping to find some Phoxene scraps there, but not a soul came back.
10104008.Subtitle:
Glevum Pit is now a den for Filthoids. A few Phoxhunters tried their luck, hoping to find some Phoxene scraps there,\
but not a soul came back.

10104009.ContentEN: So, even with Henrik dangling 5,000 silver coins, no Phoxhunter's taken the bite.
10104009.Subtitle: So, even with Henrik dangling 5,000 silver coins, no Phoxhunter's bitten by the end of the day.

10104010.ContentEN: Phoxhunters are born adventurers, but we're not reckless fools! The stone's very existence aside... Who knows if Henrik can even cough up the cash?
10104010.Subtitle:
Phoxhunters are born adventurers, but we're not reckless fools! The stone's very existence aside...\
Who knows if Henrik can even cough up the cash?

10104011.ContentEN: Everyone knows he's recently gone bankrupt, even looking to sell off the family house. Is he planning to gamble it all on trading Crystallo? ...Wait a minute, Crystallo trading's been banned for years, how's he planning to unload it?
10104011.Subtitle: Everyone knows he's recently gone bankrupt, even looking to sell off the family house. Is he planning to gamble it all on trading Crystallo? ...Wait a minute, Crystallo trading's been banned for years, how's he planning to unload it?

10104013.ContentEN: Ms Camilla, how much are those tickets to the South you mentioned earlier?
10104013.Subtitle: Ms Camilla, how much are those tickets to the South you mentioned earlier?

10104014.ContentEN: About the same price. Interested in taking on the commission?
10104014.Subtitle: About the same price. Interested in taking on the commission?

10104016.ContentEN: You serious? Kid, I'm not joking — this is no child's play!
10104016.Subtitle: You serious? Kid, I'm not joking with you — this isn't child's play!

10104017.ContentEN: Thank you, I get it. But Ms Camilla...
10104017.Subtitle: Thank you, I get it. But Ms Camilla...

10104018.ContentEN: You once told me — if I can't even handle this, how will I ever find my... lost treasure?
10104018.Subtitle: You once told me — if I can't handle this, how am I supposed to find my family?
