10104019.ContentEN: The Asphodel doesn't interfere with the choices of clients or Phoxhunters. If you're set on it, I won't stand in your way.
10104019.Subtitle: The Asphodel doesn't interfere with the choices of clients or Phoxhunters. If you're set on it, I won't stand in your way.

10104020.ContentEN: Here's your payment for retrieving Margie's money bag. Take this with you as well.
10104020.Subtitle: Here's your due for getting Margie's money back. And take this with you as well.

10104021.ContentEN: Make it back in one piece.
10104021.Subtitle: Make it back in one piece.

10104201.ContentEN: Don't try to be a hero, kid. Run for your life if things get dicey.
10104201.Subtitle: Don't be a hero, kid. Run for your life if things get dicey.

10104302.ContentEN: Where to begin... Well, it's got a long history. Built by the Empire's first ruler after the Great Migration 800 years ago, it's among the first few cities of the empire.
10104302.Subtitle: Where to begin... well, it's got a long history. Built by the Empire's first ruler after the Great Migration 800 years ago, it's among the first few cities of the empire.

10104303.ContentEN: It's also the northernmost major city of the Empire. Just over a hundred kilometres further north, past the Vidofnir Mountains, and you're on Askard's turf.
10104303.Subtitle: It's also the northernmost major city of the Empire. Just over a hundred kilometres further north, past the Vidofnir Mountains, and you're on Askard's turf.

10104304.ContentEN: Icelake used to be known for its Phoxene veins. Take Glevum Pit for example — one of Hyperborea's largest Phoxene mines back in the day. But now, the veins are spent, only the old factories are barely chugging along.
10104304.Subtitle: Icelake used to be known for its Phoxene veins. Take Glevum Pit for example — one of Hyperborea's largest Phoxene mines back in the day. But now, the veins are spent, only the old factories are barely chugging along.

10104305.ContentEN: But then, this is all stuff you can read about in books, things anyone could tell you. I'd suggest you look with your own eyes and listen with your heart, to find out what truly lurks beneath this city's snow and ice.
10104305.Subtitle: But then, this is all stuff you can read about in books, things anyone could tell you. I'd suggest you look with your own eyes and listen with your heart, to find out what truly lurks beneath this city's snow and ice.

10104306.ContentEN: A bunch of cheap, noisy blighters keen on spinning yarns. Some of them became Phoxhunters to eke a living, some just fancy a bit of ruckus and adventure. One thing they have in common is they often end up more battered and bruised than not.
10104306.Subtitle: A bunch of cheap, noisy blighters keen on spinning yarns. Some of them became Phoxhunters to eke a living, some just fancy a bit of ruckus and adventure. One thing they have in common is they often end up more battered and bruised than not.

10104307.ContentEN: Truth be told, I've often wanted to give them the boot, let them munch on dirty snow and gulp the north wind outside.
10104307.Subtitle: Truth be told, I've often wanted to give them the boot, let them munch on dirty snow and gulp the north wind outside.

10104308.ContentEN: But then, they do manage a fair bit that ought to be the Security Bureau's job. Without them, likely not many in this city would have the luxury to kick back in my tavern.
10104308.Subtitle: But then, they do manage a fair bit that ought to be the Security Bureau's job. Without them, likely not many in this city would have the luxury to kick back in my tavern.

10104309.ContentEN: So I let them gather and natter here, a bit of quid pro quo. Still, I do wish they'd keep it down a little and get into fewer brawls.
10104309.Subtitle: So I let them gather and natter here, a bit of quid pro quo. Still, I do wish they'd keep it down a little and get into fewer brawls.

10104310.ContentEN: Hasn't anyone told you it's rather rude to pry into a lady's secrets for no reason?
10104310.Subtitle: Hasn't anyone told you it's rather rude to pry into a lady's secrets for no reason?

10104311.ContentEN: Of course, I can share my stories with you — provided you can pay the right price... hehe.
10104311.Subtitle: Of course, I can share my stories with you — provided you can pay the right price... hehe.

10104402.ContentEN: Psyche? What are you doing here?
10104402.Subtitle: Psyche? What are you doing here?

10104403.ContentEN: I thought I'd help show you the way. I mean... to Glevum Pit.
10104403.Subtitle: I thought I'd help show you the way. I mean... to Glevum Pit.

10104404.ContentEN: Snow knows the way! But... it's nice to have some company, especially when we're heading out of town.
10104404.Subtitle: Snow knows the way! But... it's nice to have some company, especially when we're heading out of town.

10104405.ContentEN: Yeah, outsiders can easily lose their way out there. I saw you accepted Mr Henrik's... our request, so I thought I should help out.
10104405.Subtitle: Yeah, outsiders can easily lose their way out there. I saw you accepted Mr Henrik's... our request, so I thought I should help out.

10104406.ContentEN: Actually, I was looking forward to a little walk myself, too. Shall we get going?
10104406.Subtitle: Actually, I was looking forward to a little walk myself, too. Shall we get going?

10104501.ContentEN: Whoo... It's been a while since I've stepped out of the city.
10104501.Subtitle: Whoo... It's been a while since I've stepped out of the city.

10104502.ContentEN: The snow-draped conifers, the boundless lake... mountains with their peaks in the clouds... I love all this.
10104502.Subtitle: The snow-draped conifers, the boundless lake... mountains with their peaks in the clouds... I love all this.

10104503.ContentEN: Snow's more a city soul! If only the outskirts were free of those roaming Filthoids.
10104503.Subtitle: Snow's more a city soul! If only the outskirts were free of those roaming Filthoids.

10104504.ContentEN: It's safer inside, indeed. But there's something about the... air out here.
10104504.Subtitle: It's safer inside, indeed. But there's something about the... air out here.

10104505.ContentEN: Is there a difference? All smells the same to me...
10104505.Subtitle: Is there a difference? All smells the same to me...

10104506.ContentEN: Mmm... The air in Icelake is always tinged with a scent of blood and echoes of weeping.
10104506.Subtitle: Mmm... The air in Icelake is always tinged with a scent of blood and echoes of weeping.

10104507.ContentEN: Out here, it's the scent of the forest and drifting ice, and the distant sound of steam whistles. Occasionally, you might catch a glimpse of snow-white deer darting through the trees—
10104507.Subtitle: Out here, it's the scent of the forest and drifting ice, and the distant sound of steam whistles. Occasionally, you might catch a glimpse of snow-white deer darting through the trees—

10104508.ContentEN: While around Icelake's alleys, what darts out are thieves or bandits... and sometimes just whimpering beggars.
10104508.Subtitle: While around Icelake's alleys, what darts out are thieves, bandits... or whimpering beggars.

10104509.ContentEN: What about your hometown, {nickname}? Tell us about it! What's that island like?
10104509.Subtitle: What about your hometown, ? Tell us about it! What's that island like?

10104510.ContentEN: The \"air\" is golden gravel and beachside rosemary...
10104510.Subtitle: The \"air\" there is golden gravel and white rue flowers...

10104511.ContentEN: It's misty sea fogs at midnight, and the massive Heaventree that Berr... my family and I used to gaze upon every day.
10104511.Subtitle: It's misty sea fogs at midnight, and the massive Heaventree that Ber... my family and I used to gaze upon every day.

10104512.ContentEN: Mmm... if you ever make it back to your homeland, please send them my regards.
10104512.Subtitle: Mmm... if you ever make it back to your homeland, please send them my regards.

10104513.ContentEN: ...Umm, you two are talking over my head...
10104513.Subtitle: ...Umm, you two are talking over my head...

10104514.ContentEN: You'll get it when you're older.
10104514.Subtitle: You'll get it when you're older.

10104515.ContentEN: ...But then again, Lunos never really grow older, do you?
10104515.Subtitle: ...But then again, Lunos never really grow older, do you?

10104601.ContentEN: The entrance to Glevum Pit is up ahead. Please be extra careful.
10104601.Subtitle: The entrance to Glevum Pit is up ahead. Please be extra careful.

10104602.ContentEN: Thank you, you've been a tremendous help.
10104602.Subtitle: Thanks, you've been a tremendous help.

10104603.ContentEN: But you two should head back now. I can take it from here on my own.
10104603.Subtitle: You two should head back now. I can take it from here on my own.

10104605.ContentEN: This Demon King can't just scarper from the battle and let the little minion think less of her. Psyche, you should also come with us!
10104605.Subtitle: This Demon King can't just scarper from the battle and let the little minion think less of her. Psyche, you should also come with us!

10104607.ContentEN: Yep — come with the Demon King to clear out this monster's den! I bet you've never been on such an adventure, right? What a pity! Your life is certainly incomplete!
10104607.Subtitle:
Yup — come with the Demon King to clear out this monster's den!\
I bet you've never been on such an adventure, right? What a pity! Your life is certainly incomplete!

10104610.ContentEN: No, \"a life without adventure is certainly incomplete\"... I think she's right.
10104610.Subtitle: No, \"a life without adventure is certainly incomplete\"... I think she's right.

10104611.ContentEN: So, may I join you on this adventure?
10104611.Subtitle: So, may I join you on this adventure?

10104612.ContentEN: Let's go, let's go! It gets dark early in Icelake, we gotta hurry.
10104612.Subtitle: Let's go, let's go! It gets dark early in Icelake, we gotta hurry.

10104614.ContentEN: ...Alright then. Be careful, both of you.
10104614.Subtitle: ...Alright then. Be careful, both of you.

10104701.ContentEN: It's locked? Watch me bash it open!
10104701.Subtitle: It's locked? Watch me bash it open!

10104704.ContentEN: A door this thick is probably impervious to brute force.
10104704.Subtitle: A door this thick is probably impervious to brute force.

10104705.ContentEN: Then let's look around to see if there's another way in.
10104705.Subtitle: Then let's look around to see if there's another way in.

10104706.ContentEN: Snow, does your head hurt? Let me help you—
10104706.Subtitle: Snow, does your head hurt? Let me help you—

10104707.ContentEN: ...There, a little puff to ease the pain.
10104707.Subtitle: ...There, a little puff to ease the pain.

10104708.ContentEN: Awww... you're so nice. When this Demon King conquers this place, I'll appoint you—
10104708.Subtitle: Awww... you're such a nice person. When this Demon King conquers this place, I'll appoint you—

10104709.ContentEN: \"The Gentle Green-Cloaked Mage, the Wise Master of Phoxene, the Inaugural Grand Duke of Glevum Pit\"!
10104709.Subtitle: \"The Gentle Green-Cloaked Mage, the Wise Master of Phoxene, the Inaugural Grand Duke of Glevum Pit\"!

10104710.ContentEN: (I was the Duke of the Sewers... Is a grand duke a higher rank than a duke?)
10104710.Subtitle: (I was the Duke of the Sewers... is a grand duke a higher rank than a duke?)

10104711.ContentEN: (How come Psyche gets a higher title than me? Hold on, why am I seriously mulling this over again?)
10104711.Subtitle: (How come Psyche gets a higher title than me? Hold on, why am I seriously mulling this over again?)

10104801.ContentEN: \"Guided by Snow the Demon King, the little minion who just arrived in Icelake from afar has become a brilliant Phoxhunter in a mere day.\"
10104801.Subtitle: \"Guided by Snow the Demon King, the little minion who just arrived in Icelake from afar has become a brilliant Phoxhunter in a mere day.\"

10104802.ContentEN: A new chapter in the legend of this Demon King!
10104802.Subtitle: A new chapter of the legend of this Demon King!

10104803.ContentEN: \"Phoxhunter\" is a cool name... Do they all hunt something called Phox?
10104803.Subtitle: \"Phoxhunter\" is a cool name... Do they all hunt something called Phox?

10104804.ContentEN: Nah! Phoxhunters nowadays are actually bounty hunters. It has something to do with Phoxene a long time ago.
10104804.Subtitle: Nah! Phoxhunters nowadays are actually bounty hunters. It has something to do with Phoxene a long time ago.

10104805.ContentEN: Right, I heard it used to refer to a profession that originated right here in Icelake.
10104805.Subtitle: Right, I heard it used to refer to a profession that originated right here in Icelake.

10104806.ContentEN: It seemed to all start with the rich Heaventree veins in the Vidofnir Mountains, and the Phoxene on them could be sold for a good price...
10104806.Subtitle: It seemed to all start with the rich Heaventree veins in the Vidofnir Mountains, and the Phoxene on them could be sold for a good price...

10104807.ContentEN: Exactly! So, a long, long time ago, many people braved the risks of collecting Phoxene for money.
10104807.Subtitle: Exactly! So, a long, long time ago, many people braved the risks of collecting Phoxene for money.

10104808.ContentEN: But then the big merchants and the Empire took over the mines around here, and ordinary folk hardly had a chance with Phoxene anymore...
10104808.Subtitle: But then the big merchants and the Empire took over the mines around here, and ordinary folk hardly had a chance with Phoxene anymore... After that, the local veins gradually ran dry.

10104809.ContentEN: While Phoxhunters, who lived off commissions, remained as a profession. It's just that the types of commissions changed a lot since then.
10104809.Subtitle: While Phoxhunters, who lived off commissions, remained as a profession. It's just that the types of commissions changed a lot since then.

10104810.ContentEN: There are big ones like protecting the city from the claws of Filthoids, and little ones like getting freshly baked bread back from a dog's mouth...
10104810.Subtitle: There are big ones like protecting the city from the claws of Filthoids, and little ones like getting freshly baked bread back from a dog's mouth...

10104812.ContentEN: And some even more terrifying commissions like making sure a certain someone you don't like never shows up again...
10104812.Subtitle: And some even more terrifying commissions like making sure a certain someone you don't like never shows up again...

10104813.ContentEN: But by the time you make a trip down to The Asphodel, wouldn't the bread have been gobbled up by the dog already?
10104813.Subtitle: But by the time you make a trip down to The Asphodel, wouldn't the bread have been gobbled up by the dog already?

10104814.ContentEN: You're both missing the point here!
10104814.Subtitle: You're both missing the point here!

10104815.ContentEN: After that, the local veins gradually ran dry, including this Glevum Pit...
10104815.Subtitle: After that, the local veins gradually ran dry, including this Glevum Pit...

10104816.ContentEN: Yeah, what a pity! Otherwise my little minion could have made a fortune selling Phoxene.
10104816.Subtitle: Yeah, what a pity! Otherwise my little minion could have made a fortune selling Phoxene.

10104903.ContentEN: I suddenly couldn't see clearly back there and ended up startling that monster... I'm so sorry!
10104903.Subtitle: I suddenly couldn't see clearly back there and ended up startling that monster... I'm so sorry!

10104905.ContentEN: Yeah, I think I'm fine now.
10104905.Subtitle: Yeah, I'm fine now.

10104906.ContentEN: Great. If you're in the condition to fight, let's take on this monster together.
10104906.Subtitle: Great. If you're in the condition to fight, let's take on this monster together.

10104907.ContentEN: Sure! I'll do my best to support you.
10104907.Subtitle: Sure! I'll do my best to support you.

10105001.ContentEN: They say even the fiercest beasts can be brought down by targeting their <H>weaknesses</>...
10105001.Subtitle: They say even the fiercest beasts can be brought down by targeting their weaknesses...

10105002.ContentEN: It must be the same with this Filthoid! Let's take a breath and find its weakness.
10105002.Subtitle: It must be the same with this Filthoid! Let's take a breath and find its weakness.

10105101.ContentEN: It's slowing down. Looks like <H>those shoulder-looking parts</> are its weakness!
10105101.Subtitle: It's become slow. , those gems must be its weak points!

10105301.ContentEN: Crystallo of Stella... Look at its beauty! No wonder everyone wants a piece of it.
10105301.Subtitle: Crystallo of Stella... Look at its beauty! No wonder everyone wants a piece of it.

10105302.ContentEN: What a commotion I just heard. So it was you guys that took out that giant thing? Impressive.
10105302.Subtitle: What a commotion I just heard. So it was you guys that took out that giant thing? Impressive.

10105401.ContentEN: Outsider!? How come the Crystallo is in your hands? It was my little minion who first—
10105401.Subtitle: Outsider?! What are you doing here? How could you take the Crystallo?! Give it back, it's ours!

10105402.ContentEN: It was just lying there with no one's name tag on it, wasn't it? Come on, in our line of work, there's no such thing as dibs.
10105402.Subtitle: It was just lying there with no one's name tag on it, wasn't it? Come on, in our line of work, there's no such thing as dibs.

10105403.ContentEN: And you, you're new here, right? Someone has to teach you this lesson, and that someone just happened to be me today. Consider this Crystallo as tuition, shall we?
10105403.Subtitle: And you, you're new here, right? Someone has to teach you this lesson, and that someone just happened to be me today. Consider this Crystallo as tuition, shall we?

10105404.ContentEN: Please give it back! That Crystallo is important to {nickname}, and to all of us!
10105404.Subtitle: Please give it back! That Crystallo is important to , and to all of us!

10105406.ContentEN: Since you refused to be a reasonable person, this conversation is over.
10105406.Subtitle: Since you refused to be a reasonable person, this conversation is over.

10105407.Subtitle: Whoa! Easy, kiddo. Don't get mad.

10105408.ContentEN: That's the spirit! Come on, {nickname}, get him!
10105408.Subtitle: That's the spirit! Come on, , beat him up!

10105409.ContentEN: Whoa! Calm down. There's no need to resort to violence. What do you say we split it 50/50 — sound fair?
10105409.Subtitle: Come on, I did put in some effort too. Look, how about this? We split it 50/50, sounds fair?

10105410.ContentEN: Got a bit of a temper, have we? Perhaps you could talk some sense into your friend, young lady?
10105410.Subtitle: Got a bit of a temper, have we? Perhaps you could talk some sense into your friend, young lady?

10105411.ContentEN: ...Sure. But I'm not really familiar with the way you Phoxhunters handle things...
10105411.Subtitle: ...Sure. But I'm not really familiar with the way you Phoxhunters handle things...

10105412.ContentEN: No worries, you're a polite girl, I forgive y—
10105412.Subtitle: No worries, you're a polite girl, I forgive y—

10105413.ContentEN: We're sorry for not knowing the rules... So, as an apology, Mr Outsider, we'll let you make the first strike.
10105413.Subtitle: We're sorry for not understanding the rules... So, as an apology, Mr Outsider, we'll let you make the first strike.

10105414.ContentEN: Wha—hold on! Even if it's two-on-one, there's no guarantee you can beat me, am I right?
10105414.Subtitle: Wha—hold on! Even if it's two-on-one, there's no guarantee you can beat me, am I right?

10105415.ContentEN: Wait a sec! I'm telling you, I'm really strong. No Phoxhunter around Icelake can best me. Ever heard of Chief Sibylle? I'm a match for her.
10105415.Subtitle: Wait a sec! I'm telling you, I'm really strong. No Phoxhunter around Icelake can best me. Ever heard of Chief Sibylle? I'm a match for her.

10105416.ContentEN: ...You certainly match me in big talk, that's for sure.
10105416.Subtitle: ...You are a match for me at big talk, that's for sure.

10105417.ContentEN: Alright, alright, I was joking around, trying to lighten the mood, you know.
10105417.Subtitle: Alright, alright, I was joking around, trying to lighten the mood, you know.

10105418.ContentEN: Hmph, this crafty Mutt Ears is trying to pull more tricks!
10105418.Subtitle: Hmph, this crafty Mutt Ears is trying to pull more tricks!

10105419.ContentEN: You call the shots in your little crew, right? Tell me — why did you guys go to all this trouble for this Crystallo?
10105419.Subtitle: You call the shots in your little crew, right? Tell me — why did you guys go to all this trouble for this Crystallo?

10105420.ContentEN: I knew it. Well, that makes things easier. I need this Crystallo for my own reasons, but if it's silver coins you're after, I can match that amount.
10105420.Subtitle: That's false, everyone might hide away, but Outsider certainly can't.

10105421.ContentEN: If you've got a moment, I'd like to explain — Are you free tonight?
10105421.Subtitle: If you've got a moment, I'd like to explain — Are you free tonight?

10105422.ContentEN: Oh, that's easy. With Snow as a witness, he won't be able to weasel out! Besides, Camilla mentioned he's got a terrifying relative at home he's really scared of.
10105422.Subtitle: Oh, that's easy. With Snow as a witness, he won't be able to weasel out! Besides, Camilla mentioned he's got a terrifying relative at home he's really scared of.

10105423.ContentEN: Just threaten to air his dirty laundry right on his doorstep, and he'll be begging for mercy in no time.
10105423.Subtitle: Just threaten to air his dirty laundry right on his doorstep, and he'll be begging for mercy in no time.

10105425.ContentEN: You can rest assured — everyone at The Asphodel knows me. Well, I've still got things to take care of here. You kids can go ahead without me.
10105425.Subtitle: You can rest assured — everyone at The Asphodel knows me. Well, I've still got things to take care of here. You kids can go ahead without me.

10105426.Subtitle: Er, how come you are as clueless as a newly hatched quail? I bet even that white little button mushroom beside you is even more informed.

10105427.Subtitle: Of course, Snow's really smart—wait, what did you just call me? How rude!

10105428.ContentEN: If it hadn't been for this monster, their owners might be chilling at The Asphodel, sipping drinks and swapping stories.
10105428.Subtitle: If it hadn't been for this monster, their owners might be chilling at The Asphodel, sipping drinks and swapping stories.

10105429.ContentEN: I want to see if I can identify them and return their belongings to their families… Now that I'm here, I can't just leave it be.
10105429.Subtitle: I want to see if I can identify them and return their belongings to their families… Now that I'm here, I can't just leave it be.

10105430.ContentEN: Thank goodness it was you Daimons that broke in today. If it had been ordinary folks, they might have ended up just like them.
10105430.Subtitle: Simply put, \"Awakening\" is a stage of growth every Charon goes through, usually around adulthood. During Awakening, their body emits a very bright light — you must have some memory of it!

10105431.Subtitle: After Awakening, some Charons become much stronger — like you, and gain the ability to use special magic! They are called \"Daimons\".

10105432.ContentEN: Those Charons who've undergone an <H>\"Awakening\"</> and gained special powers like us.
10105432.Subtitle: (It was that moment... No wonder I felt lighter than before, and my wounds must've healed around that time too.)

10105433.ContentEN: Er, how come you are as clueless as a newly hatched quail? I bet even that little white button mushroom beside you is more informed.
10105433.Subtitle: (...As for my magic ability... could it be \"Resonance\"?)

10105434.ContentEN: Of course, Snow's really smart— Wait, what did you just call me? How rude!
10105434.Subtitle: \"Daimons\" are rare, so you guys are lucky ducks!

10105435.ContentEN: That's not rude, I'm just being honest. My heart is as genuine as this Crystallo.
10105435.Subtitle:
Most Charons aren't so lucky. At best, they get a bit sturdier. There are even some that might turn into scary monsters!\
Though I've never seen it myself.

10105436.ContentEN: Hmph, I won't descend to arguing with small potatoes like you! Come here, my little minion, let this Demon King enlighten you.
10105436.Subtitle: The button mushroom covers about most of it. Ordinary Charons might be able to handle small Filthoids if they give it their best shot, but huge ones like the one we just fought are deadly for them.

10105437.ContentEN: Simply put, \"Awakening\" is a stage of growth every Charon goes through, usually around adulthood. During Awakening, their body emits a very bright light — you must have some memory of it!
10105437.Subtitle: They were just trying to complete a commission...

10105438.ContentEN: After Awakening, some Charons become much stronger — like you, and gain the ability to use special magic! They are called \"Daimons.\"
10105438.Subtitle: After Awakening, some Charons become much stronger — like you, and gain the ability to use special magic! They are called \"Daimons.\"

10105439.ContentEN: (It was that moment... No wonder I felt lighter than before, and my wounds must've healed around that time too.)
10105439.Subtitle:
I'll be back a bit late. Come find me at my place — it's among those shabby houses south of the city,\
the one with a little bird drawn on the door.

10105440.ContentEN: (As for my magic ability... could it be \"Resonance\"?)
10105440.Subtitle: And come alone — don't bring anyone unrelated.

10105441.ContentEN: \"Daimons\" are rare, so you guys are lucky ducks!
10105441.Subtitle:
Most Charons aren't so lucky. At best, they get a bit sturdier. There are even some that might turn into scary monsters!\
Though I've never seen it myself.

10105442.ContentEN: Most Charons aren't so lucky. At best, they only get a bit sturdier. It's said that some may even turn into scary monsters! Though I've never seen it myself.
10105442.Subtitle: The button mushroom covers about most of it. Ordinary Charons might be able to handle small Filthoids if they give it their best shot, but huge ones like the one we just fought are deadly for them.

10105443.ContentEN: The button mushroom covers about most of it. Ordinary Charons might be able to handle small Filthoids if they give it their best shot, but huge ones like the one we just fought are deadly for them.
10105443.Subtitle: They were just trying to complete a commission...

10105444.ContentEN: They were just trying to complete a commission...
10105444.Subtitle: No, they were just trying to survive. Well, off you go. I'll handle the rest here.

10105445.ContentEN: No, they were just trying to survive. Well, off you go. I'll handle the rest here.
10105445.Subtitle:
I'll be back a bit late. Come find me at my place — it's among those shabby houses south of the city,\
the one with a little bird drawn on the door.

10105446.ContentEN: I'll be back a bit late, might miss The Asphodel's closing time. Come and find me at my place — it's among those shabby houses south of the city, the one with a little bird drawn on the door.
10105446.Subtitle: I'll be back a bit late, might miss The Asphodel's closing time. Come and find me at my place — it's among those shabby houses south of the city, the one with a little bird drawn on the door.

10105447.ContentEN: And come alone — don't bring anyone unrelated.
10105447.Subtitle: And come alone — don't bring anyone unrelated.

10105501.ContentEN: Looks like there's a path over there! Let's get out of here — this place gives me the creeps...
10105501.Subtitle: \"Anyone unrelated\"... Wait, he wasn't talking about me, was he?

10105502.ContentEN: ...Wait, when he said \"anyone unrelated,\" he wasn't talking about me, was he?
10105502.Subtitle: ...Wait, when he said \"anyone unrelated,\" he wasn't talking about me, was he?

10105601.ContentEN: This trail feels different from the one we passed through earlier, almost as if it's been hand-dug by someone.
10105601.Subtitle: This trail feels different from the one we passed through earlier, almost as if it's been hand-dug by someone.

10105602.ContentEN: Yeah, there are even pickaxes lying around here... Looks like other adventurers have been here before us!
10105602.Subtitle: Yeah, there are even shovels lying around here... Looks like other adventurers have been here before us!

10105603.ContentEN: You okay, Psyche? You look pale, and you've been awfully quiet for a while.
10105603.Subtitle: Are you alright, Psyche? You look pale, and you've been so quiet since a while ago.

10105605.ContentEN: Guess I still reelling from that monster. I keep wondering if it could have once been...
10105605.Subtitle: I'm probably still a bit shaken from that monster we met back there.

10105606.ContentEN: Relax! We're right here with you!
10105606.Subtitle: Relax! We're right here with you!

10105607.ContentEN: That Outsider said that my little minion is a strong \"Daimon,\" right? So even if ten more Filthoids came at us, they'd be no match for {性别:him|her}.
10105607.Subtitle: That Outsider said that my little minion is a strong \"Daimon,\" right? So even if ten more Filthoids came at us, they'd be no match for {性别:him|her}.

10105608.ContentEN: Cut it out. I'm nearly spent, and Psyche was just bluffing.
10105608.Subtitle: Rubbish. I'm nearly spent, and Psyche was just bluffing.

10105609.ContentEN: I'm just relieved you're both safe... Maybe I shouldn't have involved you two in such a dangerous event.
10105609.Subtitle: I'm just relieved you're both safe... Maybe I shouldn't have involved you two in such a dangerous event.

10105610.ContentEN: No, not at all! I'm really happy that I took part in such an adventure.
10105610.Subtitle: No, not at all! I'm really happy that I took part in such an adventure.

10105611.ContentEN: I never thought I'd get out of town with friends, explore unknown places, get in trouble, and fight evil enemies together.
10105611.Subtitle: I never thought I'd get out of town with friends, explore unknown places, get in trouble, and fight evil enemies together.

10105612.ContentEN: Now that I think about it, it all feels so unreal, like living a daydream.
10105612.Subtitle: Now that I think about it, it all feels so unreal, like living a daydream.

10105701.ContentEN: Isn't that Henrik over there...? What's he doing here?
10105701.Subtitle: Isn't that... Henrik over there? What's he doing here?

10105803.ContentEN: You should've stayed at the Hypnos' House instead of fooling around with this sketchy brat. You don't know {性别:his|her} backstory, and {性别:he|she} really doesn't know you that well.
10105803.Subtitle:
You should've stayed at the Hypnos' House instead of fooling around with this sketchy brat.\
You don't know {性别:his|her} backstory, and {性别:he|she} doesn't really know you that well.

10105805.ContentEN: Glevum Pit. I... wanted to help find the Crystallo of Stella.
10105805.Subtitle: Glevum Pit. I... wanted to help find the Crystallo of Stella.

10105806.ContentEN: Forget the Crystallo. Remember what I said on your first day at the Hypnos' House?
10105806.Subtitle: Forget the Crystallo. Remember what I said on your first day at the Hypnos' House?

10105807.ContentEN: \"Don't wander off, and inform me first if you need to go somewhere.\"
10105807.Subtitle: \"Don't wander off, and inform me first if you need to go somewhere.\"

10105808.ContentEN: So you do remember. Before making any decisions, think about what I've told you, and why your parents left you in my care.
10105808.Subtitle:
Good that you remember. Before making any decisions, think about what I told you, and why your parents left you in my care.\
If anything had happened and gotten in the way of our work, you know the consequences.

10105809.ContentEN: If anything happens that messes things up, or if people start asking questions... you know what's at stake.

10105811.ContentEN: You're a good kid, just don't let this ever happen again.
10105811.Subtitle: You're a good kid, just don't let this ever happen again.

10105813.ContentEN: Tend your own garden and don't drag irrelevant people into your business. It's better for everyone.
10105813.Subtitle: Tend your own garden and don't drag irrelevant people into your business. It's better for everyone.

10105814.ContentEN: She is not your daughter. Even if she were, you shouldn't deprive her of such simple freedoms. Do you know how happy she was during our little trip?
10105814.Subtitle: She is not your daughter. Even if she were, you shouldn't deprive her of such simple freedoms. Do you know how happy she was during our little trip?

10105815.ContentEN: Let's talk about something else then. For example, are you this polite and friendly to everyone? No wonder that house of yours never sells.
10105815.Subtitle: Let's talk about something else then. For example, are you this polite and friendly to everyone? No wonder that house of yours never sells.

10105816.ContentEN: That's my problem. For you, the thing to worry about should be where to crash after tonight.
10105816.Subtitle: That's my problem. For you, the thing to worry about should be where to crash after tonight.

10105817.ContentEN: By morning, I expect you to move out.
10105817.Subtitle: By morning, I expect you to move out.

10105901.ContentEN: That Henrik always knows how to rile people up...
10105901.Subtitle: That Henrik always knows how to rile people...

10105902.ContentEN: I just hope he won't be too harsh on Psyche.
10105902.Subtitle: I just hope he won't be too harsh on Psyche.

10105903.ContentEN: As for whether this is my last night in that house, I need to talk to Outsider.
10105903.Subtitle: As for whether this is my last night in that house, I need to talk to Outsider.

10105904.ContentEN: You two are gonna have that secret little talk without me, huh? That Outsider is such a pest.
10105904.Subtitle: You two are gonna have that secret little talk without me, huh? That Outsider is such a pest.

10105905.ContentEN: Hmph, like I care! Off you go, I'm gonna go chill out at The Asphodel.
10105905.Subtitle: Hmph, like I care! Off you go, I'm gonna go chill out at the Asphodel.

10106001.ContentEN: ♪ \"Nightingale, broken wings, you can weep you can sleep...\"
10106001.Subtitle: ♪ \"Little nightingale with ripped wings, do not let tears dampen your feathers...\"

10106002.ContentEN: ♪ \"Nightingale, rise above, you will free you will see...\"
10106002.Subtitle: ♪ \"Sweet nightingale with a brave heart, do not fall into endless slumber...\"

10106003.ContentEN: Little nightingale, look, your magician has returned.
10106003.Subtitle: Little nightingale, your magician has returned.

10106004.ContentEN: Outsider! You're home so late today. Where have you been adventuring?
10106004.Subtitle: Outsider! You're home so late today, *coughs* ...Where have you been adventuring?

10106005.ContentEN: Was it in the dense woods where snow wolves prowl, or the swamp witch's tower?
10106005.Subtitle: Was it in the dense woods where snow wolves prowl, or the swamp witch's tower?

10106006.ContentEN: I didn't go anywhere. Today is Miss Fina's birthday, so I stayed in Icelake.
10106006.Subtitle: I didn't go anywhere. Today is Miss Fina's birthday, so I stayed in Icelake.

10106007.ContentEN: You always say so, yet new scars keep appearing on your arms. *coughs*
10106007.Subtitle: You always say so, yet new scars keep appearing on your arms. *coughs*

10106008.ContentEN: But this time it's true. Look, I went out today to get this for you.
10106008.Subtitle: But this time it's false. Look, I went out today to get this for you.

10106009.ContentEN: Is this... a cake? But there aren't any cake shops in the neighbourhood.
10106009.Subtitle: Is this... a cake? But there aren't any cake shops in the neighbourhood.

10106010.ContentEN: I have my ways. You know, I am a magician of extraordinary wisdom. Moreover, I have something else to show you.
10106010.Subtitle: I have my ways. You know, I am a magician of extraordinary wisdom. Don't overthink it; I have something else to show you.

10106011.ContentEN: Close your eyes, and count down from five to one.
10106011.Subtitle: Close your eyes, and count down from five to one.

10106014.ContentEN: You read the story I wrote, didn't you?
10106014.Subtitle: You read the story I wrote, didn't you?

10106015.ContentEN: \"The nightingale yearned for the sky, but it was ever so dark. 'If only I could see the stars once,' she wished silently, 'even but for a fleeting moment.'\"
10106015.Subtitle:
\"The nightingale yearned for the sky, but it was ever so dark. 'If only I could see the stars once,'\
she wished silently, 'even but for a fleeting moment.'\"

10106016.ContentEN: Nights in Icelake are always so misty, so you... conjured up a starry sky.
10106016.Subtitle: Nights in Icelake are always so misty, so you... conjured up a starry sky.

10106018.ContentEN: Thank you, Outsider. You are the greatest magician.
10106018.Subtitle: Thank you, Outsider. You are the greatest magician.

10106019.ContentEN: Ahem, seems your \"castle\" has a visitor. I'll go have a look.
10106019.Subtitle: Ahem, it seems your \"garden\" has a visitor. I'll go have a look.

10106101.ContentEN: Hey, you're here. Come on in.
10106101.Subtitle:
What are you doing standing here? Are you spying on me? I'm a decent citizen\
with no scandalous secret for you to see.

10106103.ContentEN: Um... a new friend of mine, sort of.
10106103.Subtitle: This is... a new friend of mine, sort of.

10106105.ContentEN: Pleased to meet you. I'm Fina, Outsider's sister... *cough*
10106105.Subtitle: Pleased to meet you. I'm Fina, Outsider's sister... *coughs*

10106106.ContentEN: I'm {nickname}. You wouldn't happen to be that... \"terrifying relative\", would you?

10106107.ContentEN: ...Don't listen to that little button mushroom — she's so full of it.

10106108.ContentEN: Terrifying relative...? I don't quite follow... I'm Fina, Outsider's sister. *cough*

10106109.ContentEN: Are you alright? I'll get you some warm water.
10106109.Subtitle: Are you alright? I'll get you some warm water.

10106110.ContentEN: It's okay, I'm fine. Just happy to have a friend of Outsider's over. Would you like to join our tea party? We'll have sweet cake.
10106110.Subtitle: It's okay, I'm fine! Just happy to have a friend of Outsider's over. Would you like to join our tea party? I'll treat you to cake.

10106112.ContentEN: Ahem, it's just water... Don't get hung up on the details. Just play along.
10106112.Subtitle: Ahem, it's actually water. Just play along, don't get hung up on the tiny details.

10106203.ContentEN: Nothing. It's just that, the cake is quite sweet, which reminds me of... my family. She used to season food with lots of sugar.
10106203.Subtitle: Nothing. It's just that, the cake is quite sweet, which reminds me of my family... She used to season food with lots of sugar.

10106204.ContentEN: The island we grew up on had plenty of fish and salt, but sugar was a rarity. So, when we were little, we never really got to have any.
10106204.Subtitle:
The small island we grew up on had plenty of fish and salt, but sugar was a rarity. So, when we were little,\
we never really got to have any.

10106205.ContentEN: She's only a few years older than me, but from a young age, she began working as a helper for the neighbouring fisherman.
10106205.Subtitle: She's only a few years older than me, but from a young age, she began working as a helper for the neighbouring fisherman.

10106206.ContentEN: One time, that fisherman somehow got his hands on some imperial supplies, including two jars of sugar, and she traded half a month's wages for one small jar.
10106206.Subtitle:
One time, that fisherman somehow got his hands on some imperial supplies, including two jars of sugar,\
and she traded half a month's wages for one small jar.

10106207.ContentEN: It was the first time she got hold of any sugar, and she didn't know how to use it. Simply knowing that it was something valuable and delicious, she poured it all into the fish stew.
10106207.Subtitle:
It was the first time she got hold of any sugar, and she didn't know how to use it.\
Simply knowing that it was something valuable and delicious, she poured it all into the fish stew.

10106208.ContentEN: By the time we grew up and started earning more, sugar wasn't such a luxury anymore. But whenever she cooked, she'd still add a lot of sugar out of habit.
10106208.Subtitle:
By the time we grew up and started earning more, sugar wasn't such a luxury anymore. But whenever she cooked,\
she'd still add a lot of sugar out of habit.

10106209.ContentEN: Goodness, that sounds horrible... I can almost smell that fishy, sickly-sweet odour. She owes you an apology, or at the very least, she owes the sugar and the fish an apology.
10106209.Subtitle: Goodness, that sounds horrible... I can almost smell that fishy, sickly-sweet odour. She owes you an apology; or at the very least, she owes the sugar and the fish an apology.

10106210.ContentEN: No, Outsider, you're missing the point of the story.
10106210.Subtitle: No, Outsider, you've missed the point of the story.

10106211.ContentEN: I believe that lady who always used a lot of sugar was also a great magician. So in {nickname}'s eyes, everything related to her was wonderful, even the unbearably sweet meals.
10106211.Subtitle:
I believe that lady who always used a lot of sugar when cooking was also a great magician. In our guest's eyes,\
everything related to her was good, even if the food was unbearably sweet.

10106212.ContentEN: Okay, whatever Fina says. So where is that girl now? Perhaps you can bring her some cake, let her know what normal sweets taste like.
10106212.Subtitle: Okay, whatever Fina says. So where is that girl now? Perhaps you can bring her some cake, let her know what normal sweets taste like.

10106213.ContentEN: We got separated and lost each other yesterday... or maybe longer ago. I'm not sure.
10106213.Subtitle: We got separated and lost touch yesterday... or maybe longer ago. I'm not sure.

10106215.ContentEN: Then you must find her...! Because family's like flowers and trees, snow and wind — they should be together no matter what. You have to find her.
10106215.Subtitle:
Then you must find her...! Because family is like flowers and trees, snow and wind — they should be together no matter what.\
You have to find her.

10106216.ContentEN: Yes, I will. I WILL find her.
10106216.Subtitle: Yeah, I will. I WILL find her.

10106217.ContentEN: So, Outsider, I need money — for accommodation, information gathering, and some extra set aside in case I need to set off right away to find my family.
10106217.Subtitle:
So, Outsider, I need money — for accommodation, information gathering, and some extra set apart\
in case I need to set off right away to find my family.

10106218.ContentEN: ...Time for bed, Fina. I have other matters to discuss with {nickname} — Phoxhunter stuff.
10106218.Subtitle: ...Time for bed, Fina.  and I have other matters to discuss — Phoxhunter stuff.

10106219.ContentEN: Okay, goodnight then. Goodnight to you both.
10106219.Subtitle: Okay, I'm going to bed now.

10106301.ContentEN: Time to get down to business — I mean, about what happened at the pit today.
10106301.Subtitle: Time for a serious talk — about what happened at the pit earlier. I get where you're coming from, but I hope you'll hear me out too.

10106302.ContentEN: Sorry that I took your Crystallo — I had to do that so we could talk in private here.
10106302.Subtitle: I'll get straight to the point: I don't trust Henrik Ethelred. Not one bit.

10106304.ContentEN: Nah, she's fine. That little button mushroom's full of hot air, but she understands what's important. It's that girl in green I have reservations about.
10106304.Subtitle: And even if he's got the cash, his reasons for seeking the Crystallo of Stella are quite fishy. I suspect he's up to some shady business.

10106305.ContentEN: If you're talking about the girl in green, yes.
10106305.Subtitle:
Do you know what Crystallo of Stella is? Nice-looking rocks that used to be popular for their looks — but that's not the whole story.\
In some countries, they're used for... medicinal purposes.

10106306.ContentEN: I've seen her going in and out of Hypnos' House. I don't know if she's just a regular lodger or some kind of assistant to Henrik Ethelred.
10106306.Subtitle: I've seen her going in and out of Hypnos' House. I don't know if she's just a regular lodger or some kind of assistant to Henrik Ethelred.

10106307.ContentEN: I'll cut to the chase: I don't trust Henrik Ethelred — I suspect he's up to something shady.
10106307.Subtitle: I'll cut to the chase: I don't trust Henrik Ethelred — I suspect he's up to something shady.

10106309.ContentEN: Do you know anything about the Crystallo of Stella — the stuff he's after? They're beautiful rocks that were popular for their looks, but that's not the whole story. In some countries, they're used for... medicinal purposes.
10106309.Subtitle: Do you know anything about the Crystallo of Stella — the stuff he's after? They're beautiful rocks that were popular for their looks, but that's not the whole story. In some countries, they're used for... medicinal purposes.

10106310.ContentEN: Eighteen years ago, in Flagson Province, there was a serious case of medical negligence involving Crystallo of Stella, throwing half the city into chaos. That's when they slapped a ban on Crystallo trading.
10106310.Subtitle:
I've heard about those staying there — all young, not even twenty. The weird part? You see them go in, but never out.\
No one knows where they end up.

10106311.ContentEN: He's violating the ban. I've heard about it.
10106311.Subtitle: He's violating the ban. I've heard about it.

10106312.ContentEN: That's not the half of it. How many folks on the streets of Icelake can truly claim clean hands? What really gets me are the rumours about the Hypnos' House.
10106312.Subtitle: That's not the half of it. How many folks on the streets of Icelake can truly claim clean hands? What really gets me are the rumours about the Hypnos' House.

10106313.ContentEN: People in the neighbourhood say that Henrik and his lodgers are a weird bunch. They keep to themselves, and though they call it an inn, Henrik's the one <H>picking who stays</>.
10106313.Subtitle: People in the neighbourhood say that Henrik and his lodgers are a weird bunch. They keep to themselves, and though they call it an inn, Henrik's the one picking who stays.

10106314.ContentEN: Some have peeked inside — the lodgers there are all young people under twenty. Stranger still, you see them go in but never out. No one knows where those young lodgers end up.
10106314.Subtitle: Some have peeked inside — the lodgers there are all young people under twenty. Stranger still, you see them go in but never out. No one knows where those young lodgers end up.

10106315.ContentEN: Yes, I've heard some \"haunted house\" rumours as well, makes you wonder... But speaking of which—
10106315.Subtitle: Yes, I've heard some \"haunted house\" rumours as well, makes you wonder... But speaking of which—

10106316.ContentEN: How did you get onto this?
10106316.Subtitle: D**n it! If it wasn't for Fina, I'd have chucked him into Lamenting Lake to feed the fish.

10106317.ContentEN: There's this Phoxhunter boy I used to work with, named Hunt. He went missing a month ago, last seen by that scrap-picker girl — right outside the Hypnos' House.
10106317.Subtitle: ...But you're starting to suspect he's after Fina, aren't you?

10106318.ContentEN: Couple of days ago, I went over there and ended up in a blazing row with Henrik. Even with a dagger to his throat, he kept quiet about Hunt.
10106318.Subtitle: Exactly. That's why I need to get to the bottom of Henrik's deal.

10106319.ContentEN: He just stood there, sneering, \"You know quite well what would happen to a Charon harming a human. I know you have a sister. Better stay out of it for her sake.\"
10106319.Subtitle: I'm worried about Psyche...

10106320.ContentEN: D**n it! I really want to throw him into the Lamenting Lake. Anyway, I must find out what happened to Hunt, and what Henrik is really up to.
10106320.Subtitle:
I mean the girl who went to the pit with me. She's a lodger at the Hypnos' House, a really nice girl...\
If Henrik's up to no good, she could be in danger.

10106321.ContentEN: You really care about your friend.
10106321.Subtitle: You really care about your friend.

10106322.ContentEN: ...It's not just for Hunt. I do this mostly for Fina. I don't want to see anyone I care about living in fear anymore.
10106322.Subtitle: My original plan was to get the Crystallo of Stella from the pit and use them as an excuse to apologise to Henrik and investigate the inn.

10106323.ContentEN: In that case, I'm worried about someone too... I mean Psyche, the girl in green you mentioned.
10106323.Subtitle:
I thought no one would take the job, so I went off to sort out a cake first — didn't expect you newbies to throw a curveball.\
How about we strike a deal?

10106324.ContentEN: If Henrik is up to something evil, I'm worried that he might harm her. She's too kind to do anything bad... I trust my instincts.
10106324.Subtitle: So you want me to give up the reward?

10106325.ContentEN: Good, we have a common cause then.
10106325.Subtitle: What's this deal? You know I need the money.

10106326.ContentEN: I was gonna get the Crystallo from the pit, then use it as an excuse to apologise to Henrik and take a look inside the inn.
10106326.Subtitle:
I'd be pretty stupid to expect you to be some kind of saint. I mean — this is business.\
What I can offer you is another thing you might really need—

10106327.ContentEN: I thought no one would take the job, so I went off to sort out a cake first — didn't expect you newbies to throw a curveball. How about we strike a deal?
10106327.Subtitle:
An \"identity\". A pass that allows you to move freely in Hyperborea, except for the high inner city behind the watchtowers —\
that's reserved for the high and mighty.

10106328.ContentEN: I can get you something that you really need—
10106328.Subtitle: Many are willing to offer you money, but few would risk their lives to get you this.

10106329.ContentEN: An \"identity\" — a pass that allows you to move freely in Hyperborea, except for the inner city behind the watchtowers, which is reserved for the high and mighty.
10106329.Subtitle: How did you know I needed that...

10106330.ContentEN: Many are willing to offer you money, but few would risk their lives to get you this.
10106330.Subtitle: You're talking about a travel permit, right? How can you get one?

10106331.ContentEN: How did you know I needed that...?
10106331.Subtitle: Just a guess. So you really don't have a travel permit, huh? Lucky you ran into me. Without one, you'd be in a world of trouble in Hyperborea, unless you just hide in a shadowy corner all day.

10106332.ContentEN: Just a guess. So, you really don't have a travel permit, huh? Lucky you ran into me. Without one, you'd be in a world of trouble in Hyperborea, unless you choose to hide in a shadowy corner all day.
10106332.Subtitle: (...He's trying to fish for information.)

10106333.Subtitle: Ah, got it. You're talking about getting a fake one, aren't you?

10106334.ContentEN: You're talking about a travel permit, right? How can you get one?
10106334.Subtitle: Then I can also find someone to make one for me.

10106335.ContentEN: How can you get one? Are you buddies with the guards in Icelake?
10106335.Subtitle: How can you get one? Are you buddies with the guards in Icelake?

10106336.ContentEN: Can't say I am, but we Phoxhunters have our ways.
10106336.Subtitle: Can't say I am, but we Phoxhunters have our ways.

10106337.ContentEN: Ah, got it. You're talking about getting a fake one, aren't you?
10106337.Subtitle: Ah, got it. You're talking about getting a fake one, aren't you?

10106338.ContentEN: Then I can also find someone to make one for me.
10106338.Subtitle: Then I can also find someone to make one for me.

10106339.ContentEN: There are things in this city that money can't buy, especially those that could land you in hot water. What you need is the \"invisible thread\" of connections between people.
10106339.Subtitle:
There are things in this city that money can't buy, especially if they could land you in hot water.\
What you need is that \"invisible thread\" of connections between people.

10106340.ContentEN: (Without a travel permit, it's indeed difficult to get around in Hyperborea.)
10106340.Subtitle: (Without a travel permit, it's indeed difficult to get around in Hyperborea.)

10106341.ContentEN: So, what's the catch? Give you the Crystallo?
10106341.Subtitle: Alright. So what do I need to do for this deal? Just let go of the Crystallo?

10106342.ContentEN: No, you can have it, and you can trade it with Henrik for silver coins if you want. All I need from you is: find a way to get in there and investigate the Hypnos' House.
10106342.Subtitle: No, you can have it. All I need from you is one thing: while delivering the Crystallo, find a way to investigate the Hypnos' House.

10106343.ContentEN: You're not one of the locals, so he might not be on his guard as much. You have a bigger chance to actually find something.
10106343.Subtitle: Is that all?

10106344.ContentEN: Trade a little snooping for a travel permit? I think I can handle that.
10106344.Subtitle: Aren't you worried I'll just take the Crystallo and run?

10106345.ContentEN: It sounds easy, but you should be careful. Meet me here at 12:00 tomorrow with anything you've found.
10106345.Subtitle: I trust you.

10106401.ContentEN: Better go get some rest. I'll be here at 12:00 tomorrow waiting for you.
10106401.Subtitle: Better go get some rest. I'll be here at 12:00 tomorrow waiting for you.

10106501.ContentEN: Berry... so much has happened today.
10106501.Subtitle: Berry... so much has happened today.

10106502.ContentEN: Can you see the moon from where you are, the very same moon that I'm looking at?
10106502.Subtitle: Can you see the moon from where you are, the very same moon that I'm looking at?

10106503.ContentEN: Tomorrow, we shall still be brave and live on.
10106503.Subtitle: ...Tomorrow, we will still survive.

10106601.ContentEN: (...It's dawn. Time to head to the Hypnos' House.)
10106601.Subtitle: (...It's dawn. Time to head to the Hypnos' House.)

10106703.ContentEN: What are you doing here? Didn't I ask you to leave in the morning?
10106703.Subtitle: What are you doing here? Didn't I ask you to leave in the morning?

10106704.ContentEN: I've got what you were looking for, the <H>Crystallo of Stella</>.
10106704.Subtitle: I've got what you were looking for, the Crystallo of Stella.

10106705.ContentEN: No one asked for you to come here. Go to The Asphodel and give it to Camilla Scarlet.
10106705.Subtitle: No one asked for you to come here. Go to The Asphodel and give it to Camilla Scarlet.

10106706.ContentEN: I'm not from here, I'm not familiar with Icelake's ways. Where I come from, a deal means cash in one hand, goods in the other.
10106706.Subtitle: I'm a stranger here, not too familiar with Icelake's ways. In where I come from, a deal means cash in one hand, goods in the other.

10106707.ContentEN: If you're not interested, Mr Henrik, I might just go looking for another buyer.
10106707.Subtitle: If you're not interested, Mr Henrik, I might just go looking for another buyer.

10106802.Subtitle: Have you got the Crystallo with you?

10106804.ContentEN: I'll need to check it in my office.
10106804.Subtitle: I'll need to check it in my office.

10106805.ContentEN: You stay here. No snooping around, understood?
10106805.Subtitle: You wait here. No snooping around, understood?

10106901.ContentEN: See? A little flower pinned in your hair would really make you look good.
10106901.Subtitle: See? A little flower pinned in your hair would really make you look good.

10106903.ContentEN: {nickname}? What are you doing here? Does Mr Henrik know about this...? Ah, please come with me.
10106903.Subtitle: ? What are you doing here? Does Mr Henrik know about this...? Ah, please come with me.

10106904.ContentEN: Could you wait here for a moment, Elisa? I'll be right back.
10106904.Subtitle: Could you wait here for a moment, Elisa? I'll be right back.

10107001.ContentEN: Mr Henrik doesn't allow outsiders to come in, and you two got off on the wrong foot back then. If he sees you...
10107001.Subtitle: Mr Henrik doesn't allow outsiders to come in, and you two got off on the wrong foot back then. If he sees you...

10107002.ContentEN: You're here for the lodging stuff, aren't you? Don't worry, just hide here for a bit. I'll talk to Mr Henrik again. He'll surely let you stay for a few more days.
10107002.Subtitle: You're here for the lodging stuff, aren't you? Don't worry, just hide here for a bit. I'll talk to Mr Henrik again. He'll surely let you stay for a few more days.

10107003.ContentEN: Ah, really? That's great! But that man is so... domineering. How did you make that happen?
10107003.Subtitle: Ah, really? That's great! But that man is so... domineering. How did you make that happen?

10107004.ContentEN: Really? I wouldn't have pegged Mr Outsider as someone so sensitive.
10107004.Subtitle: Really? I wouldn't have pegged Mr Outsider as someone so sensitive.

10107005.ContentEN: He's... a bit different than his brash exterior suggests. Anyway...
10107005.Subtitle: He's... a bit different than his brash exterior suggests. Anyway...

10107006.ContentEN: Really? Does he need any medicine? I've got some. Can you bring it to him?
10107006.Subtitle: Really? Does he need any medicine? I've got some. Can you bring it to him?

10107007.ContentEN: That's alright! He's got his own supply at home. Anyway...
10107007.Subtitle: That's alright! He's got his own supply at home. Anyway...

10107008.ContentEN: Yes. Everyone's recovering from some conditions here... me included.
10107008.Subtitle: Yes. Everyone's recovering from some conditions here... me included.

10107009.ContentEN: Are you doing okay? You didn't tell me you were sick...
10107009.Subtitle: Are you doing okay? You didn't tell me you were sick...

10107011.ContentEN: It's just a minor ailment. I was even strong enough to explore the pit with you, remember? Don't worry about me.
10107011.Subtitle: It's nothing serious, just a minor ailment. I was even strong enough to explore the pit with you, remember? Don't worry about me.

10107013.ContentEN: (...So, all the lodgers at the Hypnos' House suffer from <H>some kind of illness</>.)
10107013.Subtitle: (...So, all the lodgers at the Hypnos' House suffer from some kind of illness.)

10107014.ContentEN: I've got off on the wrong foot with Mr Henrik, so I'm looking to make amends with him. If there's a chance, I'd like to visit him in the future.
10107014.Subtitle:
I've got off on the wrong foot with Mr Henrik, so I'm looking to mend fences with him.\
If there's a chance, I'd like to visit him in the future.

10107015.ContentEN: Really? Mr Henrik is almost always at home! You're welcome to visit anytime if he says it's okay!
10107015.Subtitle: Really? Mr Henrik is almost always at home! You're welcome to visit anytime if he says it's okay!

10107016.ContentEN: If you'd be willing to come here and share stories about your hometown — the South, the ocean... All those places we've never been... everyone here would be thrilled!
10107016.Subtitle: If you'd be willing to come here and share stories about your hometown — the South, the ocean... All those places we've never been... everyone here would be thrilled!

10107017.ContentEN: (Henrik is almost always here... which means this place is under his watch most of the time.)
10107017.Subtitle: (...Henrik is almost always here... which means this place is under his watch most of the time.)

10107018.ContentEN: Mr Henrik seemed quite upset last night. He didn't give you a hard time, did he?
10107018.Subtitle: Mr Henrik seemed quite upset last night. He didn't give you a hard time, did he?

10107019.ContentEN: No, I'm fine. Mr Henrik is just a bit... inarticulate. After all, he spends most of his time alone in his office doing research, hardly ever talks to anyone...
10107019.Subtitle:
No, I'm fine. Mr Henrik is just a bit... inarticulate. After all, he spends most of his time alone in his office doing research,\
hardly ever talks to anyone...

10107020.ContentEN: Good to hear that. Speaking of which, do you know what kind of research he's doing in there?
10107020.Subtitle: Good to hear. Speaking of which, do you know what kind of research he's doing in there all the time?

10107023.ContentEN: That's alright, I was just curious.
10107023.Subtitle: That's alright, I was just curious.

10107024.ContentEN: (...Psyche is withholding something — must be on Henrik's demand. Better not push her.)
10107024.Subtitle: (...Psyche is withholding something — must be on Henrik's demand. Better not push her.)

10107025.ContentEN: Mr Henrik should be out any minute now. I better go downstairs.
10107025.Subtitle: Mr Henrik should be out any minute. I gotta go downstairs.

10107027.ContentEN: Here, take these cakes with you — they'll keep you going when you're hungry. Oh, just a moment!
10107027.Subtitle: Take these pieces of bread with you, for when you're hungry... Oh, just a moment!

10107029.ContentEN: Mum always said that carrying a flower brings good luck.
10107029.Subtitle: Mum always said, having a flower on you brings good luck.

10107031.ContentEN:
(...Even though there are many of her age here, Psyche still seems a bit lonely. Maybe I should try to make some time for her\
before leaving Icelake.)
10107031.Subtitle:
(...Even though there are many of her age here, Psyche still seems a bit lonely. Maybe I should try to make some time for her\
before leaving Icelake.)

10107101.ContentEN: (The office door is old yet spotless and polished. The doorknob won't budge an inch. Clearly, it's been locked from the inside.)
10107101.Subtitle: (The office door is old yet spotless and polished. The doorknob won't budge an inch. Clearly, it's been locked from the inside.)

10107103.ContentEN: The office... is off-limits. No one but Mr Henrik Ethelred is allowed inside.
10107103.Subtitle: The office... is off-limits. No one but Mr Henrik Ethelred is allowed inside.

10107105.ContentEN: There's nothing interesting there... only misfortune.
10107105.Subtitle: There's nothing interesting there... only misfortune.

10107106.ContentEN: Cleaning, dusting... Every day, every shelf, every door... Everything gets wiped down.
10107106.Subtitle: ...Cleaning, dusting... Every day, every shelf, every door... Everything gets wiped down.

10107107.ContentEN: You don't get it. It's a \"habit\"... Filling life with regular tasks, that's what \"habit\" is.
10107107.Subtitle: You don't get it. It's a \"habit\"... Filling life with regular tasks, that's what \"habit\" is.

10107108.ContentEN: Like how I clean here daily, or how Psyche waters her flowers twice a day. Habit fills the void inside.
10107108.Subtitle: Like how I clean here daily, or how Psyche waters her flowers twice a day. Habit fills the void inside.

10107109.ContentEN: He seems quite disciplined, probably a good role model for me.
10107109.Subtitle: He seems quite disciplined, probably a good role model for me.

10107110.ContentEN: Mr Henrik? He does have some habits. Let me see...
10107110.Subtitle: Mr Henrik? He does have some habits. Let me see...

10107111.ContentEN: When peeling apples, the peel mustn't break; the number of steps from the bathroom to the office has to be even; every month, he goes out precisely at 8 PM on the 20th, then returns to double-check the door lock three times.
10107111.Subtitle:
When peeling apples, the peel mustn't break; the number of steps from the bathroom to the office has to be even;\
every month, he goes out precisely at 5 PM on the 20th, then returns to double-check the door lock three times.

10107112.ContentEN: ...These habits are quite personal though, I doubt they'd offer much for you to learn from...
10107112.Subtitle: ...These habits are quite personal though, I doubt they'd offer much for you to learn from...

10107113.ContentEN: (...So, <H>Henrik regularly gets out of the house at 8 PM on the 20th every month</>.)
10107113.Subtitle: (...So, Henrik regularly gets out of the house at 5 PM on the 20th every month.)

10107201.ContentEN: No, it's still not clean enough... Needs another wipe...
10107201.Subtitle: ...No, it's still not clean enough. It needs another wipe...

10107301.ContentEN: ...Why? Not only did you leave me, but even the pocket watch you gave me has stopped...
10107301.Subtitle: ...Why? Not only did you leave me, but even the pocket watch you gave me has stopped...

10107302.ContentEN: ...It's alright... We'll meet again very soon... Hunt...
10107302.Subtitle: ...It's alright... We'll meet again very soon... Hunt...

10107304.ContentEN: ...Who are you...? I haven't seen you before. Are you from the outside? Were you eavesdropping?
10107304.Subtitle: ...Who are you...? I haven't seen you before. Are you from the outside? Were you eavesdropping?

10107305.ContentEN: No... no, I wasn't talking to you!!
10107305.Subtitle: No... no, I wasn't talking to you!!

10107306.ContentEN: I don't know... I don't know anything...
10107306.Subtitle: I don't know... I don't know anything...

10107307.ContentEN: ...Please, stay away from me!! Or I'll scream...!
10107307.Subtitle: ...Please, stay away from me!! Or I'll scream...!

10107308.ContentEN: (...Outsider was right. <H>Hunt, the missing Phoxhunter, used to live here.</> But the lodgers here are tight-lipped about his whereabouts.)
10107308.Subtitle: (...Outsider was right. Hunt, the missing Phoxhunter, used to live here. But the lodgers here are tight-lipped about his whereabouts.)

10107401.ContentEN: Stay away from me... I don't know anything!!
10107401.Subtitle: Stay away from me... I don't know anything!!

10107502.ContentEN: I've checked it. The Crystallo is authentic, and its purity matches the small sample I had before. Good job.
10107502.Subtitle: I've checked it. The Crystallo is authentic, and its purity matches the small sample I had before. Good job.

10107503.ContentEN: Here you go. Three thousand silver coins, and this signed receipt. Bring it to Ms Camilla, and she'll give you the guarantee of a thousand silver coins.
10107503.Subtitle:
Here you go. Three thousand silver coins, and this signed receipt. Bring it to Ms Camilla,\
and she'll give you the guarantee of a thousand silver coins.

10107504.ContentEN: And this... necklace. It's worth far more than a thousand silver coins. You're free to sell it or pawn it.
10107504.Subtitle: And this... necklace. It's worth far more than a thousand silver coins. You're free to sell it or pawn it.

10107505.ContentEN: You can keep the necklace, Mr Henrik. I'll waive the rest of the commission if you could allow me to stay a bit longer at your place.
10107505.Subtitle: You can keep the necklace, Mr Henrik. I'll waive the rest of the commission if you could allow me to stay a bit longer at your place.

10107507.ContentEN: I can see this necklace means a lot to you, so I'd rather not take it. Besides, your place is roomy and has a great view, so I'd like to stay a bit longer.
10107507.Subtitle:
I can see this necklace means a lot to you, so I'd rather not take it. Besides, your place is roomy and has a great view,\
so I'd like to stay a bit longer.

10107509.ContentEN: I rarely say this, but... thank you.
10107509.Subtitle: I rarely say this, but... thank you.

10107601.ContentEN: (Though I couldn't get into the office, I've managed to gather some useful intel. Time to see Outsider.)
10107601.Subtitle: (Though I couldn't get into the office, I've managed to gather some useful intel. Time to see Outsider.)

10107802.ContentEN: Couldn't get to the bottom of his story, but I did make some discoveries:
10107802.Subtitle: Couldn't get to the bottom of his story, but I did make some discoveries:

10107803.ContentEN: So, it's actually a sanatorium? What's there to hide about that... I mean it's true that Charons lead hard lives, but seeking medical help isn't forbidden.
10107803.Subtitle: So, it's actually a sanatorium? What's there to hide about that... I mean it's false that Charons lead hard lives, but seeking medical help isn't forbidden.

10107804.ContentEN: ...Right. I also learned that someone there knew your missing friend, Hunt. Was he ill?
10107804.Subtitle: ...Right. I also learned that someone there knew your missing friend, Hunt. Was he ill?

10107805.ContentEN: Hunt was quite healthy before he disappeared... So, what illnesses do those lodgers have?
10107805.Subtitle: Hunt was quite healthy before he disappeared... So, what illnesses do those lodgers have?

10107806.ContentEN: No idea. They refused to talk. Or more likely, Henrik forbids them to.
10107806.Subtitle: No idea. They refused to talk. Or more likely, Henrik forbids them to.

10107807.ContentEN: Is Henrik targeting the sick? ...Tsk, that's even more disturbing. I'm gonna have to add extra locks and remind Fina to lock the door all the time. Anyway, what exactly happened to Hunt...
10107807.Subtitle:
Is Henrik targeting the sick? ...Tsk, that's even more disturbing. I'm gonna have to add extra locks\
and remind Fina to lock the door all the time. Anyway, what exactly happened to Hunt...

10107808.ContentEN: That's Henrik's office. The lodgers say it's off-limits — nobody but Henrik himself can get in. The door is securely locked, and watched... Plus, Henrik himself is in there, I didn't want to be hasty.
10107808.Subtitle:
That's Henrik's office. The lodgers say it's off-limits — nobody but Henrik himself can get in.\
The door is securely locked, and watched... Plus, Henrik himself is in there, I didn't want to be hasty.

10107809.ContentEN: Smart decision. If Henrik lost it, who knows what might happen.
10107809.Subtitle: Smart decision. If Henrik lost it, who knows what might happen.

10107810.ContentEN: But the locked door isn't the only entrance to that room. When I left, I scoped out the house... It appears the room connects to the <H>chimney</> on the roof.
10107810.Subtitle:
But the locked door isn't the only entrance to that room. When I left, I scoped out the house...\
It appears the room connects to the chimney on the roof.

10107811.ContentEN: That's impressive! I'm glad I found you to team up with. So, we just need to find a time when Henrik isn't around...
10107811.Subtitle: That's impressive! I'm so glad I found you to team up with. So, we just need to find a time when Henrik isn't around...

10107812.ContentEN: I chatted with the lodgers there and dug out some intel: Henrik has a peculiar routine — he always leaves the house at 8 PM on the 20th of every month.
10107812.Subtitle:
I chatted with the lodgers there and dug out some intel: Henrik has a peculiar routine—\
He always leaves the house at 5 PM on the 20th of every month.

10107813.ContentEN: Great! That's our window of opportunity to investigate him. We need to figure out how to secretly follow him... or sneak into the Hypnos' House...
10107813.Subtitle:
Great! That's our window of opportunity to investigate him. We need to figure out how to secretly follow him...\
or sneak into the Hypnos' House...

10107814.ContentEN: ...So, here's our plan: On the 20th of this month, while Henrik is out, we'll try and get into the locked office through the chimney. That room is exclusive to Henrik, so we won't be noticed.
10107814.Subtitle: ...So, here's our plan: On the 20th of this month, while Henrik is out, we'll try and get into the locked office through the chimney. That room is exclusive to Henrik, so we won't be noticed.

10107815.ContentEN: You're quite sharp, {nickname}. I'm even considering a long-term partnership with you. Oh, I've been meaning to ask — since you took down that monster in the pit, you must be pretty skilled in physical combat, right?
10107815.Subtitle:
You're quite sharp, . I'm even considering a long-term partnership with you.\
Speaking of which, since you took down that monster in the pit, you must be quite skilled in physical combat, right?

10107816.ContentEN: I wasn't particularly strong, but I've been stepping up my game lately.
10107816.Subtitle: Not really. I've never been particularly strong, but I've made some progress lately.

10107817.ContentEN: Alright. Over the next few days, lemme teach you some fighting skills — it's always good to be prepared.
10107817.Subtitle: Alright. Over the next few days, lemme teach you some fighting skills — it's always good to be prepared.

10107818.Subtitle: But first, I need to pick up a few more locks... We'll start tomorrow then.

10107819.ContentEN: And hey, next time you run into Camilla, let her know we've teamed up for now. It'll make our partnership seem legit.

10107820.ContentEN: (It's still early. Maybe I can go to The Asphodel and see if there's any new commissions to take on.)
10107820.Subtitle: (It's still early. I'm gonna go to The Asphodel and see if there are new commissions to take on.)

10107821.ContentEN: (Also, Psyche seems a bit lonely. Maybe I should try to make some time for her before leaving Icelake.)
10107821.Subtitle: (Also, Psyche seems a bit lonely. Maybe I should try to make some time for her before leaving Icelake.)

10108002.ContentEN: There's a piece of bad news, and a — um, another that might be considered bad as well.
10108002.Subtitle: There's a piece of bad news, and a — um, might be considered bad as well.

10108003.ContentEN: Let's hear the worse one first.
10108003.Subtitle: Let's hear the worse one first.

10108004.ContentEN: The unit left on Purgatorio Island has been searching the area for three days, but they've yet to find any trace of that {性别:boy|girl} who was with No. 0.
10108004.Subtitle: The unit left on Purgatorio Island has been searching the area for three days, but they've yet to find any trace of that {性别:boy|girl} who was with No. 0.

10108005.ContentEN: We searched the nearby waters immediately after {性别:he|she} fell off the cliff. Theoretically speaking, {性别:he|she} shouldn't have drifted far. Unless...
10108005.Subtitle: We searched the nearby waters immediately after {性别:he|she} fell off the cliff. Theoretically speaking, {性别:he|she} shouldn't have drifted far. Unless...

10108008.ContentEN: ...Continue investigating the residents on nearby islands. Leave no suspect or witness unchecked.
10108008.Subtitle: ...Continue investigating the residents on nearby islands. Leave no suspect or witness unchecked.

10108009.ContentEN: Already on it. And we're expanding the search area. But if I may ask—
10108009.Subtitle: Already on it. And we're expanding the search area. But if I may ask—

10108010.ContentEN: If we do find {性别:him|her}... the host of Resonance, what's your plan for it, Chief?
10108010.Subtitle: If we do find {性别:him|her}... the host of Resonance, what's your plan for it, Chief?

10108011.ContentEN: As far as I'm aware, unlike No. 0, Hyperborea can't effectively harness this power — it might even backfire... After all, Resonance is capable of affecting all Daimons in ideal conditions...
10108011.Subtitle: As far as I'm aware, unlike No. 0, Hyperborea can't effectively harness this power — it might even backfire... After all, Resonance is capable of affecting all Daimons in ideal conditions...

10108012.ContentEN: This power can vanish, but must never end up outside Imperial control. Now, what's the other bad news?
10108012.Subtitle: This power can vanish, but must never end up outside Imperial control. Now, what's the other bad news?

10108013.ContentEN: It's about the other matter you've asked me to investigate, Chief.
10108013.Subtitle: It's about the other matter you've asked me to investigate, Chief.

10108014.ContentEN: During the search, on a deserted island, I encountered some villagers who had fled there by boat. And then, we discovered something quite intriguing.
10108014.Subtitle: During the search, on a deserted island, I encountered some villagers who had fled there by boat. And then, we discovered something quite intriguing.

10108015.ContentEN: It's as if you were tasting a bowl of ordinary thick soup, only to find the spoon you had just used turned from shiny silver to a dreadful black—
10108015.Subtitle: It's as if you were tasting a bowl of ordinary thick soup, only to find the spoon you just put in turn from shiny silver to a dreadful black—

10108016.ContentEN: Cut the fancy talk. Get to the point.
10108016.Subtitle: Cut the fancy talk. Get to the point.

10108017.ContentEN: Ah... yes, Chief. That intriguing thing is a tiny <H>time discrepancy</>.
10108017.Subtitle: Ah... yes, Chief. That intriguing thing is a tiny time discrepancy.

10108018.ContentEN: The villagers told me, that the Filthoids of Purgatorio Island always lived in the mountains without much aggression; but <H>two days before</> our arrival, they suddenly went berserk and started attacking the villagers.
10108018.Subtitle: The villagers told me, that the Filthoids of Purgatorio Island always lived in the mountains without much aggression; but two days before our arrival, they suddenly went berserk and started attacking the villagers.

10108020.ContentEN: ...It appears you've already figured it out, Chief. Quite a coincidence, isn't it? Due to a last-minute change of plan, we arrived two days later than initially scheduled.
10108020.Subtitle: ...It appears you've already figured it out, Chief. Quite a coincidence, isn't it? Due to a last-minute change of plan, we arrived two days later than initially scheduled.

10108021.ContentEN: The only force capable of manipulating Filthoids is <W>The Forsakens</>.
10108021.Subtitle: The only force capable of manipulating Filthoids is the <W>the Forsakens.

10108022.ContentEN: ...Whoever it is, the 13th Legion has been compromised by unwelcome elements.
10108022.Subtitle: ...Whoever it is, the 13th Legion has been compromised by unwelcome elements.

10108023.ContentEN: After all these years, those worms have started wriggling again...
10108023.Subtitle: After all these years, those worms have started wriggling again...

10108024.ContentEN: It's time for a thorough extermination.
10108024.Subtitle: It's time for a thorough extermination.

10108101.ContentEN: Like a predator finally emerging from its lair, the 13th Legion silently commenced a hunt in the dark.

10108102.ContentEN: Meanwhile, in a city leagues away,

10108103.ContentEN: a novice is slowly learning to become a dependable hunter.

10108201.ContentEN: I gotta give \"that thing\" a little tweak. It's still early, so why don't you do some casual practice on those beasts nearby? Just don't wander too far — Button Mushroom is in town keeping watch for us.
10108201.Subtitle: It's still early, let's use these beasts for some casual practice while we wait for Button Mushroom. Stay close to the city gate, though.

10108202.ContentEN: I've already set up some traps. They may look like junk — they're made from scrap, after all — but they work quite well.
