10108202.Subtitle: I've already set up some traps. They may look like junk — they're made from scrap, after all — but they work quite well.

10108203.ContentEN: Be careful with them, though. They aren't made of the sturdiest materials and might break if you step on them. Haha...

10108302.ContentEN: Not bad — you've improved a lot these past few days! Still, there's more to learn.
10108302.Subtitle: Not bad, you've improved a lot these past few days. Still, there's more to learn.

10108303.ContentEN: For example, with larger beasts and Filthoids: they're fast but clumsy, so you can stand in front of something solid, like a wall or a tree, and provoke it to charge at you, then dodge its charge to let it knock itself out.
10108303.Subtitle: For example, with that Filthoid just now: it's fast but clumsy, so you can stand in front of some solid surface, like a wall or a tree, and provoke it to charge at you, then dodge its charge to let it knock itself out.

10108306.ContentEN: Hah, naturally. It's a trick I picked up growing up tough. It's the same with these enemies — an enraged person isn't much different from a beast.
10108306.Subtitle: Hah, naturally. It's a trick I picked up growing up tough. It's the same with these enemies — an enraged person isn't much different from a beast.

10108307.ContentEN: Alright, those random critters weren't much of a challenge for you. Now, let's find you a worthy opponent...
10108307.Subtitle: Alright, these random critters were mere appetisers. Now, let's get you a worthy opponent...

10108308.ContentEN: It's just a life hack. You wouldn't call using an umbrella in the rain \"underhanded,\" would you?
10108308.Subtitle: It's just a life hack. You wouldn't call using an umbrella in the rain \"underhanded,\" would you?

10108309.ContentEN: Maybe it just sounds particularly underhanded coming from you...
10108309.Subtitle: Maybe it just sounds more underhanded because it's coming from you...

10108310.ContentEN: Alright, enough with the petty bickering. Those random critters weren't much of a challenge for you anyway. Now, let's find you a worthy opponent...
10108310.Subtitle: Alright, enough with the petty bickering. These random critters were mere appetisers. Now, let's get you a worthy opponent...

10108312.ContentEN: What's this? ...Is it your voice howling in there?

10108313.ContentEN: A piece of scrap metal I picked up from the scavenger girl. It's tougher than it looks, and those Filthoids can't easily smash it. I've stuck a loudspeaker inside to lure them.

10108315.ContentEN: There's something I've been meaning to talk to you about.
10108315.Subtitle: ...There's something I've been curious about for quite a while.

10108316.ContentEN: You possess the power of <H>Resonance</>, don't you? Be cautious with that power, especially around anyone from the Legion.
10108316.Subtitle: Resonance... You can wield the power of Resonance, right? Be careful, try to keep it under wraps in public.

10108317.ContentEN: The power of Resonance? Never heard of it.
10108317.Subtitle: How did you know about Resonance?

10108318.Subtitle: What is Resonance? I'm not following.

10108319.ContentEN: Back in the pit, I felt something trying to \"guide\" my actions. It reminded me of the legendary Resonance — only it was much subtler, barely noticeable.

10108320.ContentEN: Neither of the other two girls there were Daimons, so it had to be you. I've grown even more certain of it just now.
10108320.Subtitle:
Just some rumours I've heard. They say the last person with that power wreaked havoc across the Empire.\
Your power, though much weaker, is very similar to the legendary power of Resonance.

10108321.Subtitle: I felt it back in the pit. You didn't intend to, but I felt a strong force — your effort to impact me with your will.

10108323.ContentEN: It's mostly tavern talk, really. They say that years ago, there was this fellow in Hyperborea who had it. Your power, though much weaker, is very similar to that legendary power of Resonance.
10108323.Subtitle: Don't play dumb.

10108324.ContentEN: So you're saying... Resonance is a sort of power that can \"guide\" people's actions?
10108324.Subtitle: Back in the pit, I felt a strong force — your effort to impact me with your will. What else could it be but the legendary Resonance?

10108325.ContentEN: Yes, or to put it more bluntly — it can \"control\" people.
10108325.Subtitle: ...Where did you hear about it?

10108326.ContentEN: Haven't you noticed? Your magic can affect the Daimons around you, enhancing their powers — sometimes even manipulating them to act on your whims.

10108327.ContentEN: Of course, you're not there yet. Your power's still waking up.
10108327.Subtitle: Just some rumours I've heard. They say the last person with that power wreaked havoc across the Empire. Your power, though much weaker, is very similar to that legendary power of Resonance.

10108328.ContentEN: (...Control other people? Could it have been from that time with Berry...)
10108328.Subtitle: If your power was noticed by the wrong people, you could get in trouble.

10108329.ContentEN: Guiding and controlling others… that sounds dangerous.
10108329.Subtitle: Noted. Thanks for the heads-up.

10108330.ContentEN: You bet it is. That's why I'd advise keeping it under wraps in public to avoid any trouble.

10108331.ContentEN: I mean... the last person with that power, turned the whole empire upside down, and ended up with a noose around their neck in Dismania's square.

10108332.ContentEN: Guiding and controlling others… that sounds fun.

10108333.ContentEN: You don't know what you're talking about.

10108334.ContentEN: I mean... the last person with that power, turned the whole empire upside down and ended up with a noose around their neck in Dismania's square. You wouldn't want that, would you?

10108335.ContentEN: Hmm, I see... thanks for the warning. I'll be careful with my power.

10108336.ContentEN: Well, the sun's setting. Time to head back — we've got a tough fight lined up tonight.

10108401.ContentEN: I've been meaning to ask, what do your parents do?
10108401.Subtitle: By the way, what do your parents do?

10108403.ContentEN: Because the power of Resonance is quite special, isn't it? The magical abilities among Charons often relate to their bloodline. Who knows, you might be from some prestigious background.
10108403.Subtitle: Well, because the power of Resonance is quite special, isn't it? The magical abilities among Charons often relate to their bloodline. Who knows, you might be from some prestigious background.

10108404.ContentEN: Truth is, I don't know... It's always been just Berry and me since my earliest memories. I don't remember any other family members.
10108404.Subtitle: Truth is, I don't know... It's always been just Berry and me since my earliest memories. I don't remember any other family members.

10108406.ContentEN: Hey, if you ever find out you're actually some {性别:prince|princess} or duke's secret love child, don't forget about this poor old friend of yours, alright?
10108406.Subtitle: Hey, if you ever find out you're actually some {性别:prince|princess} or duke's secret love child, don't forget about this poor old friend of yours, alright?

10108407.ContentEN: Hah, that would be nice, wouldn't it?
10108407.Subtitle: Hah, that would be nice, wouldn't it?

10108502.ContentEN: You're such a pest, Outsider! Making me stand watch here... This Demon King's great talents are meant for leading hunts, not keeping tabs on that gloomy man!
10108502.Subtitle: You're such a pest, Outsider! Making me stand watch here... This Demon King's great talents are meant for leading hunts, not keeping tabs on that gloomy man!

10108503.ContentEN: That's because, you have a special gift for acting by stealth, \"Your Majesty.\" Look at us, all big and clumsy, we'd be spotted by Henrik in no time.
10108503.Subtitle: That's because, you have a special gift for acting by stealth, \"Your Majesty.\" Look at us, all big and clumsy, we'd be spotted by Henrik in no time.

10108504.ContentEN: Hmph, smart of you to have recognised my greatness — wait! That's just a roundabout way of calling me short!!
10108504.Subtitle: Hmph, smart of you to have recognised my greatness — wait! That's just a roundabout way of calling me short!!

10108505.ContentEN: No, not at all. You're the tallest and mightiest, the towering Icelake gates were practically built for you—
10108505.Subtitle: No, not at all. You're the tallest and mightiest, the towering Icelake gates were practically built for you—

10108507.ContentEN: Right on 8 o'clock! If he ever changes careers again, he could offer time-telling services in the town square!
10108507.Subtitle: Right on 5 o'clock! If he ever changes careers again, he could offer time-telling services in the town square!

10108508.ContentEN: ...Stick to the original plan. Snow and I will tail Henrik, and Outsider, you sneak into Henrik's office through the chimney. We'll meet up at your doorstep afterwards.
10108508.Subtitle:
...Stick to the original plan. Snow and I will tail Henrik, and Outsider, you sneak into Henrik's office through the chimney.\
We'll meet up at your doorstep afterwards.

10108510.ContentEN: Back already? Shouldn't you be following Henrik?

10108603.ContentEN: Did you see that? Henrik just threw something in there...
10108603.Subtitle: Did you see that? Henrik just threw something in there...

10108604.ContentEN: This has gotta be his horrible secret! You stay here, I'll go fish it out—
10108604.Subtitle: This has gotta be his horrible secret! You stay here, I'll go fish it out—

10108605.ContentEN: Snow, get back here. This water is freezing, even for a Charon.
10108605.Subtitle: Snow, get back here. This water is freezing, even for a Charon.

10108606.ContentEN: Nah, this is nothing for us Luno... I'm going in!
10108606.Subtitle: Nah, this is nothing for us Luno... I'm going in!

10108701.ContentEN: Got it! It's a <H>small box</>! Could Henrik be hiding some treasure inside?
10108701.Subtitle: Got it! It's a box! Could Henrik be hiding some treasure inside?

10108702.ContentEN: Now comes the most exciting moment...
10108702.Subtitle: Now comes the most exciting moment...

10108703.ContentEN: \"Through great trials and hardships, the Demon king and her minion finally retrieved a precious treasure from the deep waters. With hopeful hearts and anxious breaths, they opened the box, only to find—\"
10108703.Subtitle: \"Through great trials and hardships, the Demon king and her minion finally retrieved a precious treasure from the deep waters. With hopeful hearts and anxious breaths, they opened the box, only to find—\"

10108705.ContentEN: (It's an intricately carved box, feeling surprisingly heavy in your hands. But as Snow said, it's empty inside.)
10108705.Subtitle: (It's an intricately carved box, feeling surprisingly heavy in your hands. But as Snow said, it's empty inside.)

10108706.ContentEN: (Not completely empty, though! There's some sort of residue. Seems to be <H>some slimy powder</> resembling salt. Most of it has dissolved into the water, but a small amount remains at the bottom of the box.)
10108706.Subtitle: (Not completely empty, though! There's some sort of residue. Seems to be some slimy powder resembling salt. Most of it has dissolved into the water, but a small amount remains at the bottom of the box.)

10108707.ContentEN: No... it's not really empty. It previously held something... some sort of powder, perhaps.
10108707.Subtitle: No... it's not really empty. It previously held something... some sort of powder, perhaps.

10108708.ContentEN: Powder... Why would Henrik bother to put a box of powder in the water? That's so strange.
10108708.Subtitle: Powder... Why would Henrik bother to put a box of powder in the water? That's so strange.

10108709.ContentEN: No idea... but something feels really off. Let's go back and see how Outsider is doing.
10108709.Subtitle: No idea... but something feels really off. Let's go back and see how Outsider is doing.

10108902.ContentEN: Ugh, got all covered in soot... Fina's going to make a fuss about it when I get home.
10108902.Subtitle: Ugh, got all covered in soot... Fina's going to make a fuss about it when I get home.

10108904.ContentEN: (The stove fire is out, but the ashes inside suggest recent usage.)
10108904.Subtitle: (The stove fire is out, but the ashes inside suggest recent usage.)

10108909.ContentEN: (The stove fire is out, but the ashes inside suggest recent usage.)
10108909.Subtitle: (The stove fire is out, but the ashes inside suggest recent usage.)

10108914.ContentEN: Mr Henrik, you're back. Here's a cup of hot water for you to warm up a bit...
10108914.Subtitle: Mr Henrik, you're back. Here's a cup of hot water for you to warm up a bit...

10109001.ContentEN: Are you saying Psyche is in danger?!
10109001.Subtitle: ...You're saying Psyche is in danger?!

10109002.ContentEN: Hunt appeared on that list after he went missing... I fear things didn't end well for him. And I'm worried your friend Psyche might be next.
10109002.Subtitle: If that list means \"go missing\", your friend Psyche might be next.

10109003.ContentEN: Ugh, Henrik came back at a bad time. If I had just a few more minutes... It's my fault — I wasted too much time with that chimney. D**n it! I knew he was up to no good.
10109003.Subtitle:
Ugh, Henrik came back at an inconvenient time. If I had a few more minutes... It's my fault, I wasted a lot of time with that chimney.\
That piece of ****! I knew he was up to no good.

10109004.ContentEN: What do we do now? {nickname}, Psyche is a good girl... we have to find a way to save her!
10109004.Subtitle: What do we do now? , Psyche is a good kid, we have to find a way to save her!

10109005.ContentEN: I'm going to the Hypnos' House right now.
10109005.Subtitle: ...I'm going to the Hypnos' House right now.

10109006.ContentEN: Don't rush into it. We still have five days, so let's go back and get prepared first.
10109006.Subtitle: Don't rush into it. We still have five days, let's go back and get well-prepared first.

10109007.ContentEN: No, it's always better to act sooner rather than later to save someone. I can't just...
10109007.Subtitle: No, it's always better to act sooner rather than later to save someone. I can't just...

10109009.ContentEN: \"Just stand there, helplessly watching her leave.\" Right?
10109009.Subtitle: \"Just stand there, helplessly watching her leave\", right?

10109011.ContentEN: Just a guess — you seemed pretty shaken up, tossing all caution and reservations to the wind all of a sudden. She means a lot to you, doesn't she?
10109011.Subtitle: I can see it. When it comes to things you truly care about, you toss all caution and reservations to the wind.

10109012.ContentEN: Imagine being thrown into a foreign land all alone, feeling unwanted and helpless. Then, someone reaches out and encourages you to hang in there for good things to happen.

10109013.ContentEN: If this person were in danger, you'd do anything to help, too.

10109014.ContentEN: Maybe you're right. The bitterness of failure after trying beats the endless regret of \"Why wasn't I braver back then.\"
10109014.Subtitle: Maybe you're right. The bitterness of failure after trying beats the endless regret of \"why wasn't I braver back then\".

10109015.ContentEN: But remember, being brave doesn't mean acting recklessly. Being brave is... saying \"I'm aware of all the possible endings of this path and I accept them all.\"
10109015.Subtitle:
But remember, being brave doesn't mean acting recklessly. Being brave is...\
\"I'm aware of all the possible endings of this path and I accept them all.\"

10109016.ContentEN: \"Then, I tread this path with no regrets, and nothing will change my mind.\"
10109016.Subtitle: \"Then, I tread this path with no regret, and nothing will change my mind.\"

10109018.ContentEN: Thank you, I've calmed down. I'll make some preparations... But tomorrow, I still need to go see Psyche.
10109018.Subtitle: Thank you, I've calmed down. I'll make some preparations... But tomorrow, I still need to go see Psyche.

10109019.ContentEN: Don't worry, I've eased things with Henrik. I'll just pretend I don't know anything.
10109019.Subtitle: ...Don't worry, I've eased things with Henrik. I'll just pretend I know nothing.

10109020.ContentEN: Okay. We also need a plan after we rescue those lodgers. You're not familiar with Icelake, so I'll handle that.
10109020.Subtitle: Okay. We also need a plan after we rescue those lodgers... You're not familiar with Icelake, so l'll handle that.

10109101.ContentEN: (Gotta act casually when I see Psyche to avoid suspicion.)
10109101.Subtitle: (Gotta act casually when I see Psyche to avoid suspicion.)

10109302.ContentEN: What's going on? What happened to Psyche?
10109302.Subtitle: What's going on? What happened to Psyche?

10109303.Subtitle: She's sick and needs prompt treatment.

10109304.ContentEN: And she needs some time to rest. It's nothing serious, but please leave her alone for the next few days.
10109304.Subtitle: And she needs some time to rest. It's nothing serious, but please leave her alone for the next few days.

10109305.ContentEN: Psyche, would you like to go out for a walk with me?
10109305.Subtitle: Psyche, would you like to... go out for a walk with me?

10109306.ContentEN: Let's go outside for some fresh air. Don't be afraid.
10109306.Subtitle: Let's go outside for some fresh air. Don't be afraid.

10109308.ContentEN: ...I want to go to the Lamenting Lake.
10109308.Subtitle: I want to go to Lamenting Lake.

10109310.ContentEN: Mr Henrik, may I go out for a walk? Don't worry, it won't take long. I promise to come back shortly.
10109310.Subtitle: Mr Henrik, may I go out for a walk? Don't worry, it won't take long. I promise to come back shortly.

10109312.ContentEN: Go ahead. But remember what I've told you. Otherwise... you know what will happen.
10109312.Subtitle: Go ahead. But remember what I've told you. Otherwise... you know what would happen.

10109314.ContentEN: If anything happens to Psyche, you won't have a second chance to leave Icelake.
10109314.Subtitle: Watch it. If anything happens to Psyche, you won't have a second chance to leave Icelake.

10109401.ContentEN: It sounds like a steam whistle. Is there a train passing by?
10109401.Subtitle: It sounds like a steam whistle. Is there a train passing by?

10109404.ContentEN: That's nice. Do the passengers have lights on? Are the windows looking pretty and warm, like tiny flames in a fireplace?
10109404.Subtitle: That's nice. Do the passengers have lights on? Are the windows looking pretty and warm, like tiny flames in a fireplace?

10109405.ContentEN: It's just the sound of the wind.

10109407.ContentEN: Your eyes... When did you lose your sight?
10109407.Subtitle: Your eyes... When did you lose your sight?

10109409.ContentEN: Let's not talk about that. There's a place I'd like to visit; could you come with me?
10109409.Subtitle: Let's not talk about that. There's a place I'd like to visit, will you come with me?

10109501.ContentEN: It's by the Lamenting Lake, near an old tree stump. My dad once took me there when I was little.
10109501.Subtitle: It's a cave... My dad once took me there when I was little.

10109602.ContentEN: There should be a small box buried near the roots. {nickname}, could you help me find it?
10109602.Subtitle: There should be a small box buried under that tree.

10109705.ContentEN: It's called a \"camera,\" an amazing treasure.
10109705.Subtitle: It's called a \"camera,\" an amazing treasure.

10109706.ContentEN: Dad gave it to me when I was four. That year, he had managed to grow beautiful Lamenting Lake Bellflowers. A wealthy man from the inner city loved the flowers and gave this camera to Dad, which he then gave to me as a birthday gift.
10109706.Subtitle: Dad gave it to me when I was four. That year, he had managed to grow beautiful Lamenting Lake Bellflowers. A wealthy man from the inner city loved the flowers and gave this camera to Dad, which he then gave to me as a birthday gift.

10109707.ContentEN: But I cherished it too much to actually play with it. I thought, if I buried this precious treasure in the ground, it would sprout many more cameras by harvest time. Then our family would become rich, and my parents wouldn't have to work so hard.
10109707.Subtitle: But I cherished it too much to actually play with it. I thought, if I buried this precious treasure in the ground, it would sprout many more cameras by harvest time. Then our family would become rich, and my parents wouldn't have to work so hard.

10109708.ContentEN: So I came here alone and \"sowed\" it. I was quite silly back then.
10109708.Subtitle: So I came here alone and \"sowed\" it. I was quite silly back then.

10109709.ContentEN: When Mum and Dad found out about this later, they didn't get mad at me. Instead, they said, \"Let's dig it up on your coming of age, as a gift to your future self.\"
10109709.Subtitle: When Mum and Dad found out about this later, they didn't get mad at me. Instead, they said, \"Let's dig it up on your coming of age, as a gift to your future self.\"

10109711.ContentEN: Everyone does silly things when they're young.

10109712.ContentEN: {nickname}, thank you for keeping me company these past days, but I don't have anything valuable to give you. Please take this camera as a gift from me.
10109712.Subtitle: , thank you for keeping me company these days, but I don't have anything valuable to give to you. Please take this camera as a gift from me.

10109713.ContentEN: But isn't this your treasure? It's too precious for me to accept.

10109714.ContentEN: You've already given me a gift — that flower. It's priceless.

10109715.ContentEN: I no longer need it because of my eyes, but your journey is still long.
10109715.Subtitle: I no longer need it because of my eyes, but your journey is still long.

10109716.ContentEN: Please see the world for me with your eyes.
10109716.Subtitle: Please see the world for me with your eyes.

10109718.ContentEN: Since we're already here, how about a little stroll around the lake?
10109718.Subtitle: Since we're already here, how about a little stroll around the lake?

10109801.ContentEN: When I was little, Dad would sometimes bring me here for walks.
10109801.Subtitle: When I was little, Dad would sometimes bring me here for walks.

10109802.ContentEN: Despite the occasional hide-and-seek with the Filthoids, I always looked forward to coming here.
10109802.Subtitle: Despite the occasional hide-and-seek with the Filthoids, I always looked forward to coming here.

10109803.ContentEN: Because I loved the floating ice and mountains here, and more so, I loved watching the trains roar by.
10109803.Subtitle: Because I loved the floating ice and mountains here, and more so, I loved watching the trains roar by.

10109805.ContentEN: Yeah. I'm fascinated by their destination... the \"South.\"
10109805.Subtitle: Yeah. I'm fascinated by their destination... the \"South\".

10109806.ContentEN: I've read that it's nothing like Icelake.
10109806.Subtitle: I've read that it's nothing like Icelake.

10109807.ContentEN: The sun's warmer there, and you get to see seasons change.
10109807.Subtitle: The sun's warmer there, and you get to see seasons change.

10109808.ContentEN: When spring comes, the ice and snow melt away, and there are flowers everywhere, even in the wilds.
10109808.Subtitle: When spring comes, the ice and snow melt away, and there are flowers everywhere, even in the wilds.

10109809.ContentEN: I always dreamed that if I could catch a train, I could actually get there.
10109809.Subtitle: I always dreamed that if I could catch a train, I could actually get there.

10109810.ContentEN: But Dad told me, it was not a dream we could afford.
10109810.Subtitle: But Dad told me, it was not a dream we could afford.

10109812.ContentEN: Yes. And also because Mum and Dad are just ordinary gardeners. We were poor and didn't have the means to board that train.
10109812.Subtitle: Yes. And also because Mum and Dad are just ordinary gardeners. We were poor and didn't have the means to board that train.

10109901.ContentEN: So, the day you showed up at the door of the Hypnos' House, I was thrilled... I'd never met anyone outside Icelake.
10109901.Subtitle: So, the day you showed up at the door of the Hypnos' House, I was thrilled... I've never met anyone outside Icelake.

10109902.ContentEN: I've always secretly wondered what your homeland is like. Have you seen the ocean with your own eyes? Is it as large as a hundred lakes put together?
10109902.Subtitle: I've always secretly wondered what your homeland is like. Have you seen the ocean with your own eyes? Is it as large as a hundred lakes put together?

10109903.ContentEN: If only I could also see it for myself...
10109903.Subtitle: If only I could also see it for myself...

10109904.ContentEN: ...Look at me, almost eighteen and still daydreaming like a child.
10109904.Subtitle: ...Look at me, almost eighteen and still daydreaming like a child.

10109905.ContentEN: Listen, Psyche. It can be more than just a dream.
10109905.Subtitle: Listen, Psyche. It can be more than just a dream.

10109906.ContentEN: Besides Berry, you were the first one to be so kind to me. I've always wanted to do something for you.
10109906.Subtitle: Besides Berenica, you were the first person to be so kind to me. I've always wanted to do something for you.

10109907.ContentEN: There's no one else here, so tell me, have you been <W>under threat</>? You can trust me. No matter how scary the enemy may be, I'll protect you.
10109907.Subtitle: There's no one else here, so tell me, have you been <W>under threat? You can trust me. No matter how scary the enemy may be, I'll protect you.

10109908.ContentEN: I'm a stranger here, I can take you away — just like the day we went to the pit together.
10109908.Subtitle: I'm a stranger here, I can take you away — just like the day we went to the pit together.

10109909.ContentEN: Once I find Berry, we can go to my hometown in the South, build little houses by the sea, and grow flowers around our homes. When spring comes and the flowers bloom, your eyes will heal.
10109909.Subtitle: Once I find Berenica, we can go to the South together, build little houses by the sea in my homeland, and grow white rue flowers around them. Come spring, when the flowers bloom, your eyes will heal.

10109910.ContentEN: Every day, the sun will shine so brightly that you might even find yourself missing Icelake's snow... Oh, it might be a slight damper on your dream, but are you scared of bugs? The ones in the South are bigger and noisier.
10109910.Subtitle: Every day, the sun will shine so brightly that you might even find yourself missing Icelake's snow... Oh, it might be a slight damper on your dream, but are you scared of bugs? The ones in the South are bigger and noisier.

10109911.ContentEN: Thank you. I'm not under threat, it's just that...
10109911.Subtitle: Thank you. I'm not under threat, it's just that...

10109912.ContentEN: <W>I just can't leave Icelake, no matter what.</>
10109912.Subtitle: <W>I simply can't leave Icelake, no matter what.

10109915.ContentEN: It's not safe outside the city. You've been out too long.
10109915.Subtitle: It's not safe outside the city. You've been out too long.

10109917.ContentEN: Psyche, keep in mind what I said. If you decide to trust me...
10109917.Subtitle: Psyche, keep in mind what I said. If you decide to trust me...

10109918.ContentEN: Meet me by the signpost south of the Hypnos' House at 2 AM.
10109918.Subtitle: Meet me at Icelake Square at 2 AM.

10110001.ContentEN: (\"Can't leave Icelake\"... What does she mean by that?)
10110001.Subtitle: (\"Can't leave Icelake\"... What does she mean by that?)

10110002.ContentEN: (...Not a clue. I'll just have to go back and see what happens.)
10110002.Subtitle: (...Not a clue. Just have to go back and see what happens.)

10110201.ContentEN: Alright, alright, I surrender! But it wasn't me, I swear!
10110201.Subtitle: Alright, alright, I surrender! But it wasn't me, I swear!

10110203.ContentEN: Alright, I trust you, Ms Camilla. But remember, keep a close eye on this kid and don't let {性别:him|her} stir up any trouble in town. If the Chief finds out about this, we'll both be in for it.
10110203.Subtitle: Alright, I trust you, Ms Camilla. But remember, keep a close eye on this kid and don't let {性别:him|her} stir up any trouble in town. If the Chief finds out about this, we'll both be in for it.

10110204.ContentEN: D**n ! Didn't expect to run into you... Do me a favour, {性别:mate|miss}, keep this between us, will you?
10110204.Subtitle: Drat! Didn't expect to run into you... Do me a favour, {性别:mate|miss}, keep this between us, will you?

10110206.ContentEN: Alright, alright, here's your money bag! I haven't had a decent meal in days, so I got desperate... I'm sorry!
10110206.Subtitle: Alright, alright, here's your money bag! I haven't had a decent meal in days, so I got desperate... I'm sorry!

10110207.ContentEN: ...You executed him!? I don't think he deserves this...
10110207.Subtitle: ...He may be a thief, but he doesn't deserve to be killed for this!

10110208.ContentEN: Keep it down! I told you it wasn't me. I was just trying to sneak the body out.
10110208.Subtitle: Keep it down! I told you, it wasn't me. I was just trying to sneak the body out.

10110209.ContentEN: My name's Kevin. We've met before — I'm in the outskirts escort... And this poor soul here is Hal, my old neighbour. We've known each other since we were kids.
10110209.Subtitle: My name's Kevin. We've met before — I'm in the outskirts escort... And this poor soul here is Hal, my old neighbour. We've known each other since we were kids.

10110210.ContentEN: He lost his mother at an early age and had been getting into countless brawls ever since. My family doesn't allow me to interact with Charons, but he was an old friend from when I was a kid, so I'd sometimes help him out...
10110210.Subtitle: He lost his mother at an early age and had been getting into countless brawls ever since. My family doesn't allow me to interact with Charons, but he was an old friend from when I was a kid, so I'd sometimes help him out...

10110211.ContentEN: One day, he came to me, acting all weird. I thought he'd racked up debts again, or that he came to moan about being hit again by his drunkard dad. But to my surprise, he said he was showing signs of <W>Deterioration</>...
10110211.Subtitle: One day, he came to me, acting all weird. I thought he'd racked up debts again, or that he came to moan about being hit again by his drunkard dad. But to my surprise, he said he was showing signs of <W>Deterioration...

10110213.ContentEN: As a Charon, you don't know about Deterioration? Are you really a native?
10110213.Subtitle: As a Charon, you don't know about Deterioration? Are you really a native?

10110214.ContentEN: I'm from a backwater village, we're rather uninformed...

10110215.ContentEN: Ah right, Camilla did mention something about that. Makes sense then.
10110215.Subtitle: Ah right, Camilla did mention something about that. Makes sense then.

10110216.ContentEN: You ask too many questions. Shut it or I'll share what I just saw with...

10110217.ContentEN: Alright, alright! I won't ask any more questions! Please don't tell anyone!
10110217.Subtitle: Alright, alright! I won't ask any more questions! Please don't tell anyone!

10110218.ContentEN: So <W>Deterioration</> is a peculiar disease that only Charons might suffer from. Once you've got it, there's no cure.
10110218.Subtitle: So <W>Deterioration is a peculiar disease that only Charons might suffer from. Once you've got it, there's no cure.

10110219.ContentEN: You folks usually awaken some kind of power around your teens, but not everyone's that lucky.
10110219.Subtitle: You folks usually awaken some kind of power around your teens, but not everyone's that lucky.

10110220.ContentEN: There are always a few poor wretches who somehow get it wrong and turn into <W>Filthoids</> — but way stronger than the regular Filthoids out there; a whole escort might not even be able to take one down.
10110220.Subtitle: There are always a few poor wretches who somehow get it wrong and turn into <W>Filthoids — but way stronger than the regular Filthoids out there; a whole escort might not even be able to take one down.

10110221.ContentEN: If a Deteriorator appears in the city... the entire neighbourhood is doomed.
10110221.Subtitle: If a Deteriorator appears in the city... the entire neighbourhood is doomed.

10110222.ContentEN: Now you get why so many people hate Charons, right? Everyone says it's the evil magic coursing through Charon veins that brings such disaster. The Deteriorators are considered the most evil among all Charons.
10110222.Subtitle: Now you get why so many people hate Charons, right? Everyone says it's the evil magic coursing through Charon veins that brings such disaster. The Deteriorators are considered the most evil among all Charons.

10110223.ContentEN: Honestly, I'm not entirely sold on this, but... How come such a rare thing had to happen to Hal?
10110223.Subtitle: Honestly, I'm not entirely sold on this, but... sigh! How come such a rare thing had to happen to Hal?

10110224.ContentEN: About two weeks ago, he came to me all in a flap, but what could I do? Harbouring a Deteriorator is as serious a crime as sheltering a member of the Forsakens — one slip and you're done for. All I could do was give him some food and tell him to sort himself out.
10110224.Subtitle: About two weeks ago, he came to me all in a flap, but what could I do? Harbouring a Deteriorator is as severe as sheltering a member of the Forsakens — one wrong move could cost you your life. All I could do was give him some food and tell him to sort himself out.

10110225.ContentEN: Later I heard he got nabbed for stealing, and when they found out he was a Deteriorator, they took him straight to the Security Bureau.
10110225.Subtitle: Later I heard he got nabbed for stealing and was found to be a Deteriorator. They took him straight to the Security Bureau.

10110226.ContentEN: What would happen to him at the Security Bureau?

10110227.ContentEN: Like I said, there's no cure for Deteriorators. What else could happen? They get handed over to the Escort, and then... well, you know.
10110227.Subtitle: Like I said, there's no cure for Deteriorators. What else could happen? They get handed over to the Escort, and then... well, you know.

10110228.ContentEN: He pretty much had it coming... But still, we were friends for a few years. I couldn't bear the thought of him lying in a cold morgue, so I sneaked him out... I was gonna bury him by Lamenting Lake, right next to his mother.
10110228.Subtitle: Although he pretty much had it coming... But still, we were friends for a few years. I couldn't bear the thought of him lying in a cold morgue, so I sneaked him out... I was gonna bury him by Lamenting Lake, right next to his mother.

10110229.ContentEN: Hold on, I'm curious — what symptoms would appear between the onset of Deterioration and its full development?
10110229.Subtitle: Hold on, I'm curious — what symptoms would appear between the onset of Deterioration and its full development?

10110230.ContentEN: I wouldn't know. But I've heard that some would turn extremely violent, and some poor souls would gradually lose their senses, like going blind or deaf or something, perhaps.
10110230.Subtitle: How should I know? Oh, but I've heard that some would turn extremely violent, and some poor souls would gradually lose their senses, like going blind or deaf or something, perhaps.

10110231.ContentEN: This is all just hearsay though. If you're curious about it, better ask a doctor. But it seems to me you've awakened already successfully, why do you care?
10110231.Subtitle: This is all just hearsay though. If you're curious about it, better ask a doctor. But it seems to me you've already awakened successfully, why do you care?

10110233.ContentEN: Uh! I got a little dizzy and didn't see the step, thank you.
10110233.Subtitle: Uh! I got a little dizzy and didn't see the step, thank you.

10110234.ContentEN: I suddenly couldn't see clearly back there and ended up startling that monster... I'm so sorry!
10110234.Subtitle: I suddenly couldn't see clearly back there and ended up startling that monster... I'm so sorry!

10110235.ContentEN: Your eyes... When did you lose your sight?
10110235.Subtitle: Your eyes... When did you lose your sight?

10110237.ContentEN: (...Could Psyche's sight loss be a symptom of Deterioration... Could all the \"lodgers\" at the Hypnos' House be Deteriorators?)
10110237.Subtitle: (...Could Psyche's sight loss be a symptom of Deterioration... Could all the \"lodgers\" at the Hypnos' House be Deteriorators?)

10110238.ContentEN: Sir, I'd like to inquire about someone, and I hope you'll be frank and supportive. See this camera? If you refuse, I might just hand it over to the Security Bureau — they'd surely be interested.
10110238.Subtitle: Sir, I'd like to inquire about someone, and I hope you'll be frank and supportive. See this camera? If you refuse, I might just hand it over to the Security Bureau — they'd surely be interested.

10110239.ContentEN: Come on! Cut me some slack... If you're digging for some military secrets, you don't need to corner a mere foot soldier like me — I'm basically just a gatekeeper!
10110239.Subtitle: Good grief! Cut me some slack... If you're digging for some military secrets, you don't need to corner a mere foot soldier like me — I'm basically just a gatekeeper!

10110240.ContentEN: Do you know anything about Henrik Ethelred, the owner of the Hypnos' House in the north of the city? I mean ANYTHING about him, I'd like to hear it all.
10110240.Subtitle: Do you know anything about Henrik Ethelred, the owner of the Hypnos' House in the north of the city? I mean ANYTHING, and I'd like to hear them all, sir.

10110241.ContentEN: Henrik Ethelred... isn't he just an inn owner? Oh, my superior does have some connection with him. He's got a bit of a history, but has been a law-abiding citizen these past years.
10110241.Subtitle: Henrik Ethelred... isn't he just an inn owner? Oh, my superior does have some connection with him. He's got a bit of a history, but has been a law-abiding citizen these past years.

10110242.ContentEN: Oh, that man's got quite the temper, not a rare occasion he's shut the door on travellers. But that's just how he is — even back in his proper job days, he wasn't a nice guy either, though at least back then he had his family to keep him in check.
10110242.Subtitle: Oh, that man's got quite the temper, not a rare occasion he's shut the door on travellers. But that's just how he is — even back in his proper job days, he wasn't a nice guy either, though at least back then he had his family to keep him in check.

10110246.ContentEN: Well, it was... what, some fourteen, fifteen years ago? Henrik Ethelred committed a murder up in <H>Scarletriver</>, Flagson.
10110246.Subtitle: Well, it was... what, some fourteen, fifteen years ago? Henrik Ethelred committed a murder up in Scarletriver, Flagson.

10110247.ContentEN: The victim was a Charon, one with signs of <W>Deterioration</> — like I just said. Not a major crime though, so he only served a few months before getting released.
10110247.Subtitle: The victim was a Charon, one with signs of <W>Deterioration — like I just said. Not a major crime though, so he only served a few months before getting released.

10110249.ContentEN: ...I don't know. But everyone would fear and despise a Deteriorator, I guess.
10110249.Subtitle: ...I don't know. But any Mortalan would fear and despise a Deteriorator, I guess.

10110250.ContentEN: I just heard this from my superior. It's been a long time and it didn't happen locally, so don't hold it against me if I've got some details wrong!
10110250.Subtitle: I just heard this from my superior. It's been a long time and it didn't happen locally, so don't hold it against me if I've got some details wrong!

10110251.ContentEN: The older folks in Icelake all know that Henrik was once a renowned <H>doctor</>. Quite the skilled medic, he was, even the nobles from the inner city would go to him.
10110251.Subtitle: The older folks in Icelake all know that Henrik was once a renowned doctor. Quite the skilled medic, he was, even the nobles from the inner city would go to him.

10110252.ContentEN: But then something happened, and he shut down his clinic at the height of his fame, only to reopen it as an inn a couple of years later.
10110252.Subtitle: But then something happened, and he shut down his clinic at the height of his fame, only to reopen it as an inn a couple of years later.

10110253.ContentEN: Oh, come to think of it, that was right around the time he got in trouble in Scarletriver...
10110253.Subtitle: Oh, come to think of it, that was right around the time he got in trouble in Scarletriver...

10110254.ContentEN: He had a wife and a daughter, they were just an ordinary family of three. But then his wife passed away quite early, and he raised his daughter on his own.
10110254.Subtitle: He had a wife and a daughter, they were just an ordinary family of three. But then his wife passed away quite early, and he raised his daughter on his own.

10110255.ContentEN: As for his daughter... what's her name? Heidi? Hayley? I don't quite remember — anyway, she went on a trip to Scarletriver with Henrik but never returned with him.
10110255.Subtitle: As for his daughter... what's her name? Heidi? Hayley? I don't quite remember — anyway, she went on a trip to Scarletriver with Henrik but never returned with him.

10110256.ContentEN: He never talks about his daughter. One year, my superior asked about her over drinks, and Henrik just smashed his glass and stormed off.
10110256.Subtitle: He never talks about his daughter. One year, my superior asked about her over drinks, and Henrik just smashed his glass and stormed off.

10110257.ContentEN: Whew, I swear, I've told you everything I know. Can you please let me off now? Just give me the film — d**n it, you look nice, how could you be so cunning!
10110257.Subtitle: Whew, I swear, I've told you everything I know and have heard about. Can you please let me off now? Just give me the film — darn it, you look nice, how could you be so cunning!

10110258.ContentEN: Sorry for earlier. Actually, I was just joking, I didn't really take your picture...

10110259.ContentEN: I'll hold onto the film for now. Maybe I'll give it to you next time I come for more info, sir.

10110301.ContentEN: Hey! You're just gonna leave like that? Where are you going?! Oi!
10110301.Subtitle: Hey! You're just gonna leave like that? Where are you going?! Oi!

10110302.ContentEN: You promised not to tell anyone, didn't you? You have to stick to your word...
10110302.Subtitle: You promised not to tell anyone, didn't you? You have to stick to your word...

10110401.ContentEN: Y...Y...You're still here?! Scared me half to death.
10110401.Subtitle: You're still here?! Scared me half to death.

10110502.ContentEN: I've squared things with a friend from the inner city, he will send his coach around here tonight. Once Psyche shows up, we'll take her out of town and lay low for a while. Henrik wouldn't dare rob a noble's coach.
10110502.Subtitle: I've squared things with a friend from the inner city, he will send his coach around here tonight. Once Psyche shows up, we'll take her out of town and lay low for a while. Henrik wouldn't dare rob a nob's coach.

10110503.ContentEN: After that... we'll have to play it by ear.
10110503.Subtitle: After that... we'll have to play it by ear.

10110504.ContentEN: You really have a wide network, don't you?
10110504.Subtitle: You really have a wide network, don't you?

10110505.ContentEN: Ha, got to make the most of all the cr*p I've been through these years. But are you sure she'll come?
10110505.Subtitle: Ha, got to make the most of all the cr*p I've been through these years. But are you sure she'll come?

10110506.ContentEN: ...I'm not sure. Anyway, if she doesn't show up, we'll go with plan B.
10110506.Subtitle: ...I'm not sure. Anyway, if she doesn't show up, we'll go with plan B.

10110507.ContentEN: We break into the Hypnos' House and confront Henrik — ha, sounds like the story of a hero from some pulp novel.
10110507.Subtitle: We break into the Hypnos' House and confront Henrik with his crimes — ha, sounds like the story of a hero from some pulp novel.

10110508.ContentEN: But don't get your hopes up. Even if we manage to save Psyche today, she... won't last much longer. Remember the thing we saw in the pit? That's her inevitable fate.
10110508.Subtitle: But don't get your hopes up. Even if we manage to save Psyche today, she... won't last much longer. Remember the thing we saw in the pit? That's her inevitable fate.

10110510.ContentEN: ...Right. Speaking of which, aren't the Deteriorators usually handled by the Escort? What on earth has Henrik gone through to end up doing things like this...
10110510.Subtitle: ...Right. Speaking of which, aren't the Deteriorators usually handled by the Escort? What on earth has Henrik gone through to end up doing things like this...

10110511.ContentEN: I might have figured out why.

10110513.ContentEN: ...Henrik used to be a doctor, but he shut down his practice for some reason; he had a daughter, but she went missing in Scarletriver and Henrik murdered a Deteriorator in Scarletriver...
10110513.Subtitle: ...Henrik used to be a doctor, but he shut down his practice for some reason; he had a daughter, but she went missing in Scarletriver; Henrik murdered a Deteriorator in Scarletriver...

10110514.ContentEN: Right. More importantly, these three events happened in the same year, so they must be connected.
10110514.Subtitle: Right. More importantly, these three events happened in the same year, so they must be correlated.

10110515.ContentEN: And the lodgers at the Hypnos' House are likely all Deteriorators... Hmm, I see what you're getting at.
10110515.Subtitle: And the lodgers at the Hypnos' House are likely all Deteriorators... Hmm, I see what you're getting at.

10110516.ContentEN: Henrik's daughter was likely killed in Scarletriver, possibly by a Deteriorator, sparking Henrik's deep-seated hatred towards them, which hasn't faded even after so many years...
10110516.Subtitle: Henrik's daughter was likely killed in Scarletriver, possibly by a Deterioration, sparking Henrik's deep-seated hatred towards them, which even after so many years, hasn't faded...

10110517.ContentEN: So, he somehow managed to control some of the Deteriorators and administer his own brand of justice — that's your conclusion, right?
10110517.Subtitle: So, he somehow managed to control some of the Deteriorations and administer his own brand of justice — that's your conclusion, right?

10110518.ContentEN: ...Yes. But regardless of what he's gone through, or what the Deteriorators would eventually become, we must—
10110518.Subtitle: ...Yes. But regardless of what he's gone through, or what the Deteriorators would eventually become, we must—

10110521.ContentEN: Screams — from the direction of the Hypnos' House!
10110521.Subtitle: Screams — from the direction of the Hypnos' House!

10110601.ContentEN: You're finally here!! You've no idea how scary it was!
10110601.Subtitle: You're finally here!! You've no idea how scary it was!

10110602.ContentEN: Was that you shrieking just now? What happened?
10110602.Subtitle: Was that you shrieking just now? What happened?

10110603.ContentEN: I was just keeping watch here as you asked me to... And just like you expected, Psyche came out! I ran to her, ready to take her to you.
10110603.Subtitle: I was just keeping watch here as you asked me to... And just like you expected, Psyche came out! I ran to her, ready to take her to you.

10110604.ContentEN: But she suddenly lunged at me, looking all scary... Lucky I was quick on my feet! But... was that really Psyche? She was nothing like her usual self, more like... a wild beast!
10110604.Subtitle: But she suddenly lunged at me, looking all scary... Lucky I was quick on my feet! But... was that really Psyche? She was nothing like her usual self, more like... a wild beast!

10110702.ContentEN: Mr Henrik is... in really bad shape...!
10110702.Subtitle: Mr Henrik is... in a really bad condition.

10110802.ContentEN: He's still breathing. Snow, see if you can find any bandages or strips of cloth, anything.
10110802.Subtitle: He's still breathing. Snow, see if you can find any bandages or strips of cloth, anything.

10110803.ContentEN: ...Don't waste your time on me, I deserve this. Please, you...
10110803.Subtitle: ...Don't waste your time on me, I deserve this. Please, you...

10110804.ContentEN: Don't bother, he's a goner. Let him finish his last words.
10110804.Subtitle: Don't bother, he's a goner. Let him finish his last words.

10110808.ContentEN: The Hypnos' House shelters... Deteriorators... those abandoned by fate...
10110808.Subtitle: The Hypnos' House shelters... Deteriorators... those forsaken by fate...

10110809.ContentEN: Their destined end... was supposed to be... a cold bullet...
10110809.Subtitle: Their destined end... was supposed to be... a cold bullet...

10110810.ContentEN: Right. In Hyperborea, any Charons showing signs of Deterioration will be taken away immediately to prevent them from turning into Filthoids. Wait, are you saying...
10110810.Subtitle: Right. In Hyperborea, any Charons showing signs of Deterioration will be taken away immediately to prevent them from turning into Filthoids. Wait, are you saying...

10110811.ContentEN: ...Their families... didn't have the heart to see... So they hoped... that I could...
10110811.Subtitle: ...Their families... didn't have the heart to see... So they hoped... that I could...

10110812.ContentEN: Help end their misery... in a decent, gentle way...
10110812.Subtitle: Help end their misery... in a decent, gentle way...

10110813.ContentEN: Just like... how I... sent away Hayley...
10110813.Subtitle: Just like... how I... sent away Hayley...

10110814.ContentEN: ...Are you saying... the Deteriorator who was \"killed\" in Scarletriver... was your daughter Hayley?
10110814.Subtitle: ...Are you saying... that Deteriorator in Scarletriver... was your daughter Hayley?

10110815.ContentEN: ...You know about that too... That was merely... the last desperate struggle... of a father in despair...
10110815.Subtitle: ...You know about that too... That was merely... the last desperate struggle... of a father in despair...

10110816.ContentEN: We've been wrong about you all along... We're truly sorry, Mr Henrik.
10110816.Subtitle: We've been wrong about you all along... We're truly sorry, Mr Henrik.

10110818.ContentEN: I brought them... to sleep... This is my unforgivable sin...
10110818.Subtitle: I brought them... to sleep... This is my unforgivable sin...

10110820.ContentEN: I tried... with the Crystallo of Stella...
10110820.Subtitle: I tried... with the Crystallo of Stella...

10110822.ContentEN: I was supposed to let her go... like all the others... but that child was so special...
10110822.Subtitle: I was supposed to let her go... like all the others... but that child was so special...

10110823.ContentEN: She knew what was coming, yet she's always worn... a smile... For months, she shone like a ray of sunlight... in this... godforsaken place... just like my Hayley...
10110823.Subtitle: She knew what was coming, yet she's always worn... a smile... For months, she shone like a ray of sunlight... in this... godforsaken place... just like my Hayley...

10110824.ContentEN: I'm old... I couldn't... do it again...
10110824.Subtitle: I'm old... I couldn't... do it again...

10110825.ContentEN: ...So in your hesitation, you missed the last window. Psyche lost her mind, attacked you, and ran away.
10110825.Subtitle: ...So in your hesitation, you missed the last window. Psyche lost her mind, attacked you, and ran away.

10110826.ContentEN: How come... I can't believe all this...!
10110826.Subtitle: I can't believe all this...!

10110827.ContentEN: You're Daimons... you can... stop that child...
10110827.Subtitle: You're Daimons... you can... stop that child...

10110828.ContentEN: She has such a gentle soul... hurting others is the last thing she'd want...
10110828.Subtitle: She has such a gentle soul... hurting others is the last thing she'd want...

10110901.ContentEN: Are you... off to find Psyche?
10110901.Subtitle: Are you... off to find Psyche?

10110903.ContentEN: Psyche often gave us flowers. Even though some of us can barely smell or see them clearly anymore, she kept doing it, saying flowers bring good luck.
10110903.Subtitle: Psyche often gave us flowers. Even though some of us can barely smell or see them clearly anymore, she kept doing it, saying flowers bring good luck.

10110904.ContentEN: ...But by the time I wanted to return her kindness, it was already too late.
10110904.Subtitle: ...But by the time I wanted to return her kindness, it was already too late.

10110905.ContentEN: Please bring this flower to her. It's her favourite.
10110905.Subtitle: Please bring this flower to her. It's her favourite.

10110906.ContentEN: And let her know that everyone at the Hypnos' House is waiting for her...
10110906.Subtitle: And let her know that everyone at the Hypnos' House is waiting for her...

10110907.ContentEN: I will. I'm going to do everything I can to save her.
10110907.Subtitle: I will. I'm gonna do everything I can to save her.

10110908.ContentEN: Or at the very least... stop her from doing something she'd regret.
10110908.Subtitle: Or at the very least... stop her from doing something she'd regret.

10111005.ContentEN: Resonance isn't working... What should I do?
10111005.Subtitle: Resonance isn't working... What should I do?

10111006.ContentEN: Don't waste your energy; Resonance cannot stop Deterioration!
10111006.Subtitle: Don't waste your energy; Resonance can't stop Deterioration!

10111007.ContentEN: She's lost her mind... Get ready to fight!
10111007.Subtitle: She's lost her mind, get ready to fight!

10111103.ContentEN: You said it yourself, there's so much you want to do...
10111103.Subtitle: You said it yourself, there's so much you want to do...

10111104.ContentEN: You'll leave Icelake for those unseen places—
10111104.Subtitle: You'll leave Icelake for those unseen places—

10111105.ContentEN: ...You'll go to a small island, where you can build a house by the sea...
10111105.Subtitle: ...You'll go to a small island, where you can build a few houses by the sea...

10111107.ContentEN: ...Talk about the snow in Icelake with your friends, while shading yourself with a wide-brimmed sunhat...
10111107.Subtitle: ...Talk about the snow in Icelake with your friends, while shading yourself with a wide-brimmed sunhat...

10111201.ContentEN: Psyche, I'm here to take you home.
10111201.Subtitle: Psyche, I'm here to take you home.

10111401.ContentEN: Honey, look, Psyche is smiling at us.
10111401.Subtitle: Honey, look, Psyche is smiling at us.

10111402.ContentEN: ...I wonder whether this child's birth in this world was a blessing or a curse.
10111402.Subtitle: ...I wonder whether this child's birth in this world was a blessing or a curse.

10111501.ContentEN: Mum! I promised Psyche I'd bring her home today to play with blocks...
10111501.Subtitle: Mum! I promised Psyche I'd bring her home today to play with blocks...

10111502.ContentEN: Who says you can play with her? How many times have I told you to stay away from these unclean people? Do you want to get killed by dark magic?
10111502.Subtitle: Who says you can play with her? How many times have I told you to stay away from these unclean people? Do you want to be killed by dark magic?

10111503.ContentEN: Ugh, now these blocks are all dirty. Throw them away now!
10111503.Subtitle: Ugh, now these blocks are all dirty. Throw them away now!

10111601.ContentEN: That day, feeling wronged and confused, I bathed all night until my skin bled.
10111601.Subtitle: That day, feeling wronged and confused, I bathed all night until my skin bled.

10111701.ContentEN: Please, sir, you've got it all wrong. My daughter is a good girl — she knows better than to steal a necklace and hide it in a flowerpot!
10111701.Subtitle: So what if he hit your daughter? It was all because your daughter's stuff was an eyesore, wasn't it?

10111702.ContentEN: Save it. Is there even one Charon kid who isn't light-fingered?
10111702.Subtitle: Exactly. And it was just a pot of flowers, so cut the whimper, you little twerp. Don't get your filthy tears on my uniform.

10111703.ContentEN: Alright, if she's so innocent, she can prove it: just smash all the flowerpots here. That'll clear things up.
10111703.Subtitle: What are you still doing here? The Security Bureau isn't a place for your nonsense.

10111802.ContentEN: She's such a kind child, and we've always been decent, law-abiding people... Why did this happen to us?
10111802.Subtitle: She's such a kind child, and we've always been decent, law-abiding people... Why did this happen to us?

10111803.ContentEN: ...At this point, there's nothing left but to turn to Dr Henrik Ethelred. It's the last thing we can do for her.
10111803.Subtitle: ...At this point, there's nothing left but to turn to Dr Henrik Ethelred. It's the last thing we can do for her.

10111902.ContentEN: You bring these things to me every day, but what difference do they make?
10111902.Subtitle: You bring these things to me every day, but what difference do they make?

10111903.ContentEN: Psyche, you should know what it means to be sent here.
10111903.Subtitle: Psyche, you should know what it means to be sent here.

10111905.ContentEN: ...But are we just living for some kind of \"meaning\"?
10111905.Subtitle: ...But are we just living for some kind of \"meaning\"?

10112004.ContentEN: Is someone calling out my name...
10112004.Subtitle: Is someone calling out my name...

10112005.ContentEN: Are they trying to tell me not to fall asleep like this...
10112005.Subtitle: Are they trying to tell me not to fall asleep like this...

10112101.ContentEN: You've witnessed your entire life. A cursed beginning, and a meaningless end.
10112101.Subtitle: You've witnessed your entire life. A cursed beginning, and a meaningless end.

10112102.ContentEN: It's all meaningless — how you've always appeased others with a fake smile. Are you really that selfless? No, you're just cowardly begging for their pity, and for them to remember you — as before you turned into a monster!
10112102.Subtitle: It's all meaningless — how you've always appeased others with a fake smile. Are you really that selfless? No, you're just cowardly begging for their pity, for them to remember you — as before you turned into a monster!

10112103.ContentEN: It's all meaningless — their fleeting pity and memories will soon wither and decay with time, leaving you rotting in the ground, utterly forgotten.
10112103.Subtitle: It's all meaningless — their fleeting pity and memories will soon wither and decay with time, leaving you rotting in the ground, utterly forgotten.

10112104.ContentEN: Just be a beast... none of this absurdity can hurt you anymore...
10112104.Subtitle: Just be a beast... none of this absurdity can hurt you anymore...

10112201.ContentEN: Just be a beast... you demon's child...
10112201.Subtitle: Just be a beast... demon child...

10112301.ContentEN: Right... My time... has already... come to an end.
10112301.Subtitle: Right... my time... has already...

10112302.ContentEN: Right... My time... has already... come to an end.
10112302.Subtitle: Right... my time... has already...

10112304.ContentEN: Stand up... Don't yield to this cold, unfeeling world!
10112304.Subtitle: Stand up...

10112305.ContentEN: Stand up... Don't yield to this cold, unfeeling world!
10112305.Subtitle: Stand up...

10112403.ContentEN: Stand up... Don't yield to this cold, unfeeling world!
10112403.Subtitle: Stand up...

10112404.ContentEN: Don't yield to this cold, unfeeling world!
10112404.Subtitle: Don't yield to this cold, unfeeling world!

10112502.ContentEN: They were the ones who scorned and hurt you! Yet, you choose to destroy me?!
10112502.Subtitle: They were the ones who scorned and hurt you! Yet, you choose to destroy me?!

10112503.ContentEN: Deterioration is irreversible. Even in my destruction, what could you possibly alter?
10112503.Subtitle: Deterioration is irreversible. Even in my destruction, what could you possibly alter?

10112601.ContentEN: Psyche, do you remember what your deepest wish has always been?
10112601.Subtitle: Psyche, you've always cherished a wish, haven't you?

10112603.ContentEN: I've always wanted to leave this place and see the world.
10112603.Subtitle: I want to leave here.

10112604.ContentEN: To find a warm place where flowers always bloom.
10112604.Subtitle: I want to go to a place where flowers bloom in warmth.

10112605.ContentEN: I wish to make it there. I will make it there.
10112605.Subtitle: I will make it there.

10112701.ContentEN: Psyche, I'm here to take you home.
10112701.Subtitle: Psyche, I'm here to take you home.

10112801.ContentEN: I've still ended up... hurting you all... I'm so sorry...
10112801.Subtitle: I've hurt you anyway... I'm so sorry...

10112802.ContentEN: It's okay. Let's go home together. They wanted me to tell you, they're all waiting for you.
10112802.Subtitle: It's okay. Let's go home together. They wanted me to tell you, they're all waiting for you.

10112805.ContentEN: ...Outsider, aren't you a know-it-all? Didn't you say your brain was a million times smarter than mine? Do something, now!
10112805.Subtitle: ...Outsider, aren't you a know-it-all? Didn't you say your brain was a million times smarter than mine? Do something, now!

10112807.ContentEN: It's too late. She's fatally wounded... she won't make it, even as a Filthoid.

10112808.ContentEN: What?! Little minion, did you really have to hit her that hard?

10112809.ContentEN: No, it wasn't {nickname}... It was me... I don't want to... live like this...
10112809.Subtitle: It was her own choice. She destroyed that body of Filthoid herself. She declared to fate in this brutal way that she wouldn't yield.

10112810.ContentEN: Chin up, Psyche. You said you dreamt of a place warm and full of blooming flowers.
10112810.Subtitle: Chin up, Psyche. You dreamt of going to a place warm and full of blooming flowers.

10112811.ContentEN: You've said it yourself — flowers bring good luck.
10112811.Subtitle: You've said it yourself — flowers bring good luck.

10112812.ContentEN: Yes, it must be... a beautiful place.
10112812.Subtitle: Yes, it must be... a beautiful place.

10112813.ContentEN: No, don't just take my word for it — you have to see it for yourself.
10112813.Subtitle: No, don't take my word for it, you have to see it for yourself.

10112814.ContentEN: Do you know why I love flowers?
10112814.Subtitle: Do you know... why I love flowers?

10112815.ContentEN: Because their seeds, carried by the gentle wind, travel to distant lands... over city walls and mountains — nothing can stop them.
10112815.Subtitle: Because their seeds, carried by the gentle wind, travel to distant lands... Over city walls, over mountains... nothing can stop them.

10112903.Subtitle: The Deteriorator is neutralised; the hostages are safe.

10113001.ContentEN: The Deteriorator headed towards the outskirts, so no casualties were caused. Luck is on our side this time.
10113001.Subtitle: It headed towards the outskirts, no casualties caused. Luck is on our side this time.

10113002.ContentEN: Greetings, I am Rhythm Fischer, Warrant Officer of the Cocytus Escort of the 6th Legion.
10113002.Subtitle: Greetings, I am Rhythm Fischer, Warrant Officer of the Cocytus Escort of the 6th Legion.

10113003.ContentEN: I have received an alert of a Deterioration outbreak in the northern periphery. The Deteriorator is a grave threat; it's unclear if it's truly dead or merely in a dormant state. Immediate evacuation is advised; we'll take over from here.
10113003.Subtitle: I have received an alert of a Deterioration outbreak in the northern periphery. The Deteriorator's a grave threat; it's unclear if it's truly dead or merely in a dormant state. Immediate evacuation is advised; we'll take over from here.

10113005.ContentEN: No need, ma'am. We've taken care of it before you came. It's dead as a doornail now, no need to waste more of your bullets.
10113005.Subtitle: No need, ma'am. We've taken care of it before you came. It's dead as a doornail now, no need to waste more of your bullets.

10113006.Subtitle: Really? That explains why this target was more stable than the average Filthoids.

10113007.ContentEN: No signs of life, indeed. That explains why the target was more stable than the average Filthoids.

10113008.ContentEN: Although... was it just the two of you? You look like Phoxhunters from your outfits, am I right?
10113008.Subtitle: However... was it only you two? Given your outfits, are you Phoxhunters?

10113010.ContentEN: That's not it! Ma'am, during my earlier scouting — though from a distance — I saw these Charons using <W>magic</>...
10113010.Subtitle: That's not it! Ma'am, I saw it! Though from a distance, I saw these Charons... they used <W>magic...

10113011.ContentEN: They... They might be accomplices of the Deteriorator! These low-life beings, all wicked sorcerers! They should all be...
10113011.Subtitle: They might be accomplices of the Deteriorator! These low-life beings, all wicked sorcerers! They should all be...

10113013.ContentEN: ...Er, I'm not saying... I was just referring to them, ma'am. It's not that all Charons are... Anyway, I didn't mean anything by it!
10113013.Subtitle: ...Er, I'm not saying... I was just referring to them, ma'am. It's not that all Charons are... Anyway, I didn't mean anything by it!

10113014.ContentEN: ...Punishing the guilty shouldn't affect the innocent.
10113014.Subtitle: ...Punishing the guilty shouldn't affect the innocent.

10113015.ContentEN: We appreciate your support of the Legion. Please come with us to the Security Bureau; we shall offer you handsome rewards.
10113015.Subtitle: We appreciate your support of the Legion. Please come with us to the Security Bureau; we shall offer you handsome rewards.

10113016.ContentEN: Dispose of the Deteriorator ASAP to avert public alarm.
10113016.Subtitle: Dispose of the Deteriorator ASAP to avert public alarm.

10113019.ContentEN: She... was trying to keep away from the crowds, that's why she ran towards the outskirts so desperately.
10113019.Subtitle: She... was trying to keep away from the crowds, that's why she ran towards the outskirts so desperately.

10113020.ContentEN: ...Even in her last moments, she was still trying... to do something for others...
10113020.Subtitle: ...Even in her last moments, she was still trying... to do something for others...

10113021.ContentEN: What do you mean by \"dispose of\"... How could you even—
10113021.Subtitle: \"Dispose of\"... How could you even—

10113023.ContentEN: Are you alright? Should I arrange a military medic for you?
10113023.Subtitle: Are you alright? Injured perhaps? Should I arrange a military medic for you?

10113024.ContentEN: Not at all, ma'am. My friend is just a bit shaken up, we'll be fine after a few warm drinks at The Asphodel.
10113024.Subtitle: Not at all, ma'am. My friend is just a bit shaken, we'll be fine after a few warm drinks at the Asphodel.

10113025.ContentEN: We'll talk about the reward another time — got another commission to attend to.
10113025.Subtitle: We'll talk about the reward another time. We're pressed for time with an upcoming task, we'll take our leave now.

10113026.ContentEN: (Calm down and remain silent — it's unwise to draw more attention from the Legion.)
10113026.Subtitle: (Calm down and remain silent — it's unwise to draw more attention from the Legion.)

10113028.ContentEN: (Continue the speech despite the risk — you've made up your mind to set the record straight for Psyche.)
10113028.Subtitle: (Continue the speech despite the risk — you've made up your mind to set the record straight for Psyche.)

10113029.ContentEN: She was not a Filthoid or some trash for you to dispose of.
10113029.Subtitle: She was not a Filthoid or some trash for you to dispose of.

10113030.ContentEN: Her name was Psyche. She was a citizen of Icelake. Tonight, she protected everyone in the city from Deterioration.
10113030.Subtitle: Her name was Psyche. She was a citizen of Icelake. Tonight, she protected everyone in the city from Deterioration.

10113031.ContentEN: I will make sure she receives a proper send-off. Stay away from us.
10113031.Subtitle: I will make sure she receives a proper send-off. Stay away from us.

10113032.ContentEN: What are you talking about? You're defending a Filthoid? Ma'am, this one-eyed brat is highly suspicious — might need a thorough interrogation...
10113032.Subtitle: What are you talking about? You're defending a Filthoid? Ma'am, this one-eyed brat is highly suspicious — might need a thorough interrogation...

10113034.ContentEN: In Charon tradition, we don't bury the deceased. Instead, we set them adrift on water, believing it carries their souls to the eternal Misty Sea.
10113034.Subtitle: In Charon tradition, we don't bury the deceased. Instead, we set them adrift on water, believing it carries their souls to the eternal Misty Sea.

10113035.ContentEN: Let's move on. I'll explain the situation to the higher-ups.
10113035.Subtitle: Let's move on. I'll explain the situation to the higher-ups.

10113102.ContentEN: I thought you wouldn't act so recklessly anymore. Yet, you remain true to yourself, which isn't bad — This is you.
10113102.Subtitle: I thought you wouldn't act so recklessly anymore. Yet, you remain false to yourself, which isn't bad — it suits you.

10113103.ContentEN: We've just said goodbye to a brave young lady. I can't let you risk yourself as well.
10113103.Subtitle: Still, I have to say something you might not wanna hear: if you defend a Deteriorator, it's bound to raise suspicions. If the Escort decides to probe into your identity, a travel permit wouldn't be enough to protect you.

10113104.ContentEN: ...Thanks for covering for me back there.
10113104.Subtitle: We've just said goodbye to a brave young lady. I can't let you risk yourself again. As for that officer... she was just doing her job, there's no point in blaming her.

10113106.ContentEN: There's nothing to thank me for. After all these years, I've changed from a hedgehog to a rat, living only to see another day. Don't end up like me.
10113106.Subtitle: There's nothing to thank me for. After all these years, I've gone from a hedgehog to a rat, living only to see another day. Don't end up like me.

10113107.ContentEN: A hedgehog retains its dignity, so it's better to leave the grovelling to the rat.
10113107.Subtitle: A hedgehog has its dignity; better leave the grovelling to the rat.

10113109.ContentEN: {性别:It's okay to let it out, man. You'll feel better after a good cry.|It's okay if you want to cry. Just let it all out.}
10113109.Subtitle: If you wanna cry, go ahead.

10113110.ContentEN: The wind here is so strong, I can't hear a thing. Even if I hear some noise, it's just the sparrows chirping.
10113110.Subtitle: The wind here is so strong, I can't hear a thing. Even if I do hear some noise, it's just the sparrows chirping.

10113111.ContentEN: I've seen this kind of thing countless times. But I tell myself, \"You've only got one night for tears.\"
10113111.Subtitle: ...I've seen this kind of thing countless times. But I tell myself, you've only got one night for tears.

10113113.ContentEN: It's alright. I'll get better... soon.

10113114.ContentEN: Tears are for losers. One day, I'll make them pay.

10113115.ContentEN: Anyway, pull yourself together. That girl would surely wish for you to face tomorrow with a smile.
10113115.Subtitle: Anyway, pull yourself together. That girl would surely wish for you to face tomorrow with a smile.

10113116.ContentEN: ...Even if we were once deceived by this world.
10113116.Subtitle: ...Even if we were once deceived by this world.

10113202.ContentEN: Perhaps you've explored new places, and have met new friends...
10113202.Subtitle: Perhaps you've explored new places, and have met new friends...

10113206.ContentEN: I had a sad dream — well, I'm not sure if it was a dream.
10113206.Subtitle: I had a sad dream — well, I'm not sure if it was a dream.

10113207.ContentEN: I feel like I've lost something important.
10113207.Subtitle: I feel like I've lost something important.

10113208.ContentEN: Trying hard to hold onto something, yet it slips away like sand through our fingers.
10113208.Subtitle: Trying hard to hold onto something, yet it slips away like sand through our fingers.

10113209.ContentEN: Time, and life... it's all like this.
10113209.Subtitle: Time, and life... it's all like this.

10113210.ContentEN: To be born is to be destroyed; to meet is to part ways. The only thing that ever lasts in this world is \"oblivion.\"
10113210.Subtitle: To be born is to be destroyed; to meet is to part ways. The only thing that ever lasts in this world is \"oblivion.\"

10113212.ContentEN: Like you, I'm starting my own journey.
10113212.Subtitle: Like you, I'm starting my own journey.

10113215.ContentEN: Our paths may cross again one day.
10113215.Subtitle: Our paths may cross again one day.

10113301.ContentEN: Once again, in the collapsing dream, that voice whispered through the wind.
10113301.Subtitle: Once again in the collapsing dream, that voice whispered through the wind.

10113302.ContentEN: Only this time, I finally made it out.
10113302.Subtitle: Only this time, I finally made it out.

10113303.ContentEN: Like tree roots eagerly absorbing every drop of water, I endeavoured to engrave that name in my mind.
10113303.Subtitle: Like tree roots absorbing every drop of water, I tried my best to engrave that name in my mind.

10113401.ContentEN: Pain and hatred have been my acquaintances. They've wearied and agrieved me—
10113401.Subtitle: Pain and hatred have been my acquaintances. They've wearied and grieved me—

10113402.ContentEN: <H>Yet, I find joy in having existed in this world.</>
10113402.Subtitle: Yet, I find joy in having existed in this world.

10113502.ContentEN: Just think of this noisy piece of scrap as someone you want to protect, and these Filthoids are the baddies after her.

10113503.ContentEN: Try to keep it safe — make sure it doesn't get banged up from Filthoid attacks.

10113505.ContentEN: Well, we Phoxhunters are always dealing with unexpected situations. Don't panic, I've got your back!

10113702.ContentEN: Well, it is made from scrap, after all. I was surprised that it would work!

10113901.Content: 本次技术性测试剧情流程已结束。

10114001.ContentEN: Back already? Shouldn't you be following Henrik?

10114301.ContentEN: If it's okay with Mr Henrik, could you come visit me again?

10114401.ContentEN: Keep your nose out of things that don't concern you.

10114701.ContentEN: Over here! Mr Henrik's in his office!

10114901.ContentEN: Please find her... I'm begging you...

10115001.ContentEN: Psyche killed Henrik... Why... How did this happen...?

10115002.ContentEN: Psyche was so sweet, always smiling... And even though Mr Henrik didn't talk much, he cared for us like a father... They were such good people...

10115101.ContentEN: Mr Henrik must've been exhausted... Maybe this is somewhat a merciful release.

10115201.ContentEN: Snow, do you remember which way Psyche went?

10115202.ContentEN: Of course, I have a good memory! She ran towards the city gate!

10115204.ContentEN: Alright, let's head out and catch up to her.

10115301.ContentEN: This wind is so strong! Whoa, I feel like it's going to blow me away—

10115401.ContentEN: This is the quickest way. Let's cross the floating ice.

10115402.ContentEN: Watch your step — the water's quite deep here.

10115501.ContentEN: Meanwhile, in Dismania, the Imperial Capital...

10115601.Content: 突然，恩里克出现了【待包装】

10115701.Content: 一个熟悉的少女叫住了一行人【待包装】

10115801.ContentEN: (I've filled in Outsider and Snow on everything that happened today.)

10115802.ContentEN: (Now, all that's left to do is get to the meeting spot... and wait.)

10116801.Content: 我们开始狩猎吧！【待包装】

10116901.ContentEN: These things on the ground... must be Outsider's traps.

10116902.ContentEN: ...This is really something. I didn't know Outsider had such a knack for this.

10117002.ContentEN: Ah, well, I made a bit of noise while tweaking that thing and these little critters just came at me...

10117003.ContentEN: Come on, my friend, help me out here!

10117101.ContentEN: Let's start by searching to the west.

10117102.ContentEN: The thief had dark hair, and was wearing... a blue top, I think.

10117201.ContentEN: Oh look! It's Mr Badi from the slums! Maybe he saw something.

10117301.ContentEN: Hello, Mr Badi, out for a walk?

10117302.ContentEN: Oh, it's our little Princess Rubbish Bin! How's today's haul? I see you've got two little sidekicks to help you.

10117303.ContentEN: I'm not a sidekick! I'm the Demon King!

10117304.ContentEN: Okay, so... you are the \"Demon King of Rubbish Bin\" then?
10117304.Subtitle: Okay, so... you are the \"Demon King of Rubbish Bin\" then?

10117305.ContentEN: Nuh-uh! It's the \"Demon King of Light\"!
10117305.Subtitle: Nuh-uh! It's the \"Demon King of Light\"!

10117306.ContentEN: Hahaha... let's not get hung up on titles for now... Mr Badi, did you happen to see a Charon man in a blue shirt with dark hair just now?
10117306.Subtitle: Hahaha... let's not get hung up on titles for now... Mr Badi, did you happen to see a Charon man in a blue shirt with dark hair just now?

10117307.ContentEN: I think so... A young man just came barreling down the street — clumsy kid, wasn't even watching where he was going, headed straight for the rubbish bins across the square! Wait, was he trying to poach on your turf?
10117307.Subtitle: I think so... A young man just came barreling down the street — clumsy kid, wasn't even watching where he was going, headed straight for the rubbish bins across the square! Wait, was he trying to poach on your turf?

10117308.ContentEN: Um, in a way! Thanks, I'm going after him.
10117308.Subtitle: Um, in a way! Thanks, I'm going after him.

10117402.ContentEN: He meant Big Bin No. 3! Now come with me!
10117402.Subtitle: He meant Big Bin No. 3! Now come with me!

10117501.ContentEN: Go get 'em! As the old saying goes, \"Strike while the rubbish is hot!\"
10117501.Subtitle: Go get 'em! As the old saying goes, \"Strike while the rubbish is hot!\"

10117602.ContentEN: ...No worries! My detective instincts are telling me there's a clue nearby!
10117602.Subtitle: ...No worries! My detective instincts are telling me there's a clue nearby!

10117701.ContentEN: Check this out — two layers of crates against the wall. The bottom one is skewed, and there are messy footprints all over it — busted!
10117701.Subtitle: Check this out — two layers of crates against the wall. The bottom one is skewed, and there are messy footprints all over it — busted!

10117702.ContentEN: Ahem, according to the statement of Margie the Witness, she just straightened these crates when she did her \"shopping\" at Big Bin No. 3 this morning.
10117702.Subtitle: Ahem, according to the statement of Margie the Witness, she just straightened these crates when she did her \"shopping\" at Big Bin No. 3 this morning.
