10117703.ContentEN: Thus, Margie the Reticent Detective deduces — that desperate thief must have stacked these crates to climb the wall! He's likely hiding on the rooftop right now!
10117703.Subtitle: Thus, Margie the Reticent Detective deduces — that desperate thief must have stacked these crates to climb the wall! He's likely hiding on the rooftop right now!

10117704.ContentEN: Huh! Smart thinking! Let's get up there and check it out.
10117704.Subtitle: Huh! Smart thinking! Let's get up there and check it out.

10117801.ContentEN: So \"Reticent Detective\"... that's your title, Margie? Sounds cool... A bit short though — could use more punch!
10117801.Subtitle: So \"Reticent Detective\"... that's your title, Margie? Sounds cool... A bit short though — could use more punch!

10117802.ContentEN: Makes sense! Any suggestions, Demon King?
10117802.Subtitle: Makes sense! Any suggestions, Demon King?

10117803.ContentEN: That old man back there called you \"Princess Rubbish Bin\"... That's a good one!
10117803.Subtitle: That old man back there called you \"Princess Rubbish Bin\"... That's a good one!

10117804.ContentEN: \"Reticent Detective ☆ Princess Rubbish Bin\", has a nice ring to it, doesn't it?
10117804.Subtitle: \"Reticent Detective ☆ Princess Rubbish Bin\", has a nice ring to it, doesn't it?

10117805.ContentEN: Argh—! Noooo way! Can we please drop that nickname? It's embarrassing!
10117805.Subtitle: Argh—! Noooo way! Can we please drop that nickname? It's embarrassing!

10117902.ContentEN: Just making sure he wasn't hiding in—
10117902.Subtitle: Just making sure he wasn't hiding in—

10117903.ContentEN: Whoooa! Is that... half a bottle of wine and an antique pin!? Wow, aren't you the chosen one blessed by the gods of rubbish bins!?
10117903.Subtitle: Whoooa! Is that... half a bottle of wine and an antique pin!? Wow, aren't you the chosen one blessed by the gods of rubbish bins!?

10117904.ContentEN: But this really isn't the best time… just a sec!
10117904.Subtitle: But this really isn't the best time… just a sec!

10117905.ContentEN: (Margie fishes out two old newspapers from the rubbish, wraps her newly discovered treasures carefully, and stashes them in a corner.)
10117905.Subtitle: (Margie fishes out two old newspapers from the rubbish, wraps her newly discovered treasures carefully, and stashes them in a corner.)

10117906.ContentEN: There, all set! I'll come back for these later. Finders keepers — I'll share this wine with you once we've caught the thief!
10117906.Subtitle: There, all set! I'll come back for these later. Finders keepers — I'll share this wine with you once we've caught the thief!

10117907.ContentEN: Um... I think I'll pass, thanks.
10117907.Subtitle: Um... I think I'll pass, thanks.

10118001.ContentEN: A young man just climbed up here, and now three others? What's all this about?

10118101.ContentEN: Is Icelake having a parkour race or something? With prizes for the fastest runner?

10118102.ContentEN: Hmm... you know what — I heard that a Luno elder did once set up a race like that...

10118103.ContentEN: Well then, you better hurry! The other contestant's been gone a good while.

10118201.ContentEN: Ah, there he is! On that roof!

10118202.ContentEN: Wha... Did you really have to chase me all the way up here? You said you were going to share the money with the poor anyway, so why can't I get a piece of it?

10118203.ContentEN: If you're hard up, I can help you. But you can't just grab money of people — that'll earn you a whack on the head with my shovel!
10118203.Subtitle: If you're hard up, I can help you. But you can't just grab money of people — that'll earn you a whack on the head with my shovel!

10118204.ContentEN: (The thief seems at a loss for words and jumps off the wall in frustration.)

10118301.ContentEN: He's disappeared again!? What is he, a ghost?

10118302.ContentEN: No... look, this manhole cover's been shifted.

10118303.ContentEN: He must've ducked into the sewers!

10118401.ContentEN: This water's too deep... How did he get across?

10118402.ContentEN: Don't worry — this is where the Reticent Detective's intel network shines!

10118403.ContentEN: According to the \"Sewer Maintenance Manual\" from Bin No. 8, the water level here is controllable! There's gotta be a switch nearby.

10118501.ContentEN: Wow, it worked! Princess Rubbish Bin ☆ Reticent Detective, you're incredible!

10118502.ContentEN: Please, remove the \"Princess Rubbish Bin\" part... I'm begging you...

10118503.ContentEN: The water level has dropped a bit. Let's see if there are more switches.

10118601.ContentEN: Hey, look! There's really a path down there!

10118602.ContentEN: Oh, right — the Manual says sewers sometimes attract Filthoids that like warm, damp environments.

10118603.ContentEN: They're usually small — no bigger than cats or dogs — but a swarm could be trouble…

10118604.ContentEN: Let's make sure we're prepared before we go any further.

10118702.ContentEN: Huff... Huff... Wait up... Not everyone is blessed with long legs, you know...

10118801.ContentEN: *cough* *cough* I can't breathe... That is a low blow...

10119101.ContentEN: He's up there! Hmph, you won't hit me this time — ow!

10119102.ContentEN: Ugh... What are you, a monkey? Always throwing rocks...

10119201.ContentEN: These footprints are fresh — it must be him! Let's follow them.

10119301.ContentEN: Is that... blood? Did he get hurt?

10119302.ContentEN: Something might have attacked him... We should be extra careful.

10119401.ContentEN: Just as I thought, he startled the Filthoids here and got attacked.

10119501.ContentEN: Hmph, not so fast now, are you?

10119502.ContentEN: {nickname}, come on, let's pin him down!

10119601.ContentEN: Looks like this gate still works. But it's locked...

10119602.ContentEN: Seriously, why do they need all these security measures for an abandoned old pit?

10119603.ContentEN: ...Probably to keep curious folks from stumbling into a Filthoid attack.

10119604.ContentEN: Let's try our luck! Maybe there's a key lying around here somewhere.

10119701.ContentEN: Wow... take a look at this! Margie would flip if she saw it!

10119702.ContentEN: This ore's pretty tough, though. It might just break Miss Margie's shovel.

10119802.ContentEN: I've got this. Hey Psyche, while the Demon King isn't looking, how about we split the treasure?

10119803.ContentEN: I'm good. You can keep it all to buy yourself some nice clothes or something. I... don't really need the treasure.

10120001.ContentEN: Ah, it's a hidden switch for the gate! Who'd have thought?

10120101.ContentEN: Uh-oh... there are so many of them... Argh... aaaargh...

10120102.ContentEN: Get off my leg, Snow — I can't walk like this... You can head back to Icelake if you're scared. I won't make fun of you.

10120103.ContentEN: N—No way. A life without s—some risks is not c—c—c—complete!

10120104.ContentEN: Alright then, I'll be right here with {nickname} and Miss Demon King to make our lives complete.

10120105.ContentEN: I didn't slow us down earlier... so I believe I can keep going forward with you.

10120107.ContentEN: (These Filthoids are nothing compared to what happened to Berry and me on Purgatorio Island...)

10120108.ContentEN: (Just go over the self-defence moves Berry once taught me and wield my sword carefully — I can do this.)

11010102.ContentEN: <W>...That giant beast blocked your path, its grip tightening around your throat.</>
11010102.Subtitle: ...That giant beast blocked your path, its grip tightening around your throat.

11010103.ContentEN: <W>Your body shakes as you suffocate, sharp pains triggering the deepest desire within your soul.</>
11010103.Subtitle: Your body shakes as you suffocate, sharp pains triggering the deepest desire within your soul.

11010106.ContentEN: <W>Kill it. Listen to its death throes, bathe in its blood, and embrace the sweet release of death.</>
11010106.Subtitle: Kill it. Listen to its death throes, bathe in its blood, and embrace the sweet release of death.

11010107.ContentEN: (Cover your ears to shut out that strange voice)
11010107.Subtitle: (Cover your ears to shut out that strange voice)

11010108.ContentEN: (Find a way to leave this place)
11010108.Subtitle: (Find a way to leave this place)

11010115.ContentEN: (This door... When did it show up here?)
11010115.Subtitle: (This door... When did it show up here?)

11010116.ContentEN: (...Anyway, I must get out of here, and get rid of these terrible thoughts that cling to me like a plague.)
11010116.Subtitle: (...Anyway, I must get out of here, and get rid of these terrible thoughts that cling to me like a plague.)

11010203.ContentEN: Captain! You're finally back with us!
11010203.Subtitle: Captain! You're finally back with us!

11010204.ContentEN: That Filthoid is on its last breath! Keep it up and finish it!
11010204.Subtitle: That Filthoid is on its last breath! Keep it up and finish it!

11010205.ContentEN: Urien, retreat to the rear with me! Your wound is opening up again!
11010205.Subtitle: Urien, retreat to the rear with me! Your wound is opening up again!

11010208.ContentEN: <W>Your hands are drenched in wet, slimy filth, uncertain whether it's the Filthoid's secretions or its innards. Yet, a sudden joy tingles through your soul, bringing an inexplicable elation.</>
11010208.Subtitle: Your hands are drenched in wet, slimy filth, uncertain whether it's the Filthoid's secretions or its innards. Yet, a sudden joy tingles through your soul, bringing an inexplicable elation.

11010209.ContentEN: (Shut up! That was not how I felt!)
11010209.Subtitle: (Shut up! That was not how I felt!)

11010210.ContentEN: <W>Do not resist, because I am what you actually are. I am your instinct for death. One day you shall follow my lead and obey the ancient will...</>
11010210.Subtitle: Do not resist, because I am what you actually are. I am your instinct for death. One day you shall follow my lead and obey the ancient will...

11010211.ContentEN: (You refuse to let the ramblings erode your will and try to stay sane.)
11010211.Subtitle: (You refuse to let the ramblings erode your will and try to stay sane.)

11010216.ContentEN: I should go check on the others.
11010216.Subtitle: I should go check on the others.

11010221.ContentEN: Hssss... Dr Daphne, we've completed our mission, right?
11010221.Subtitle: Hssss... Dr Daphne, we've completed our mission, right?

11010222.ContentEN: ...No, not until when we get back alive.
11010222.Subtitle: ...No, not until when we get back alive.

11010223.ContentEN: It's alright, Daphne. Calm down. Everything's going to be okay. Come down.
11010223.Subtitle: It's alright, Daphne. Calm down. Everything's going to be okay. Come down.

11010303.ContentEN: Good to hear that. When you got tangled up by that Filthoid, I thought I'd never...
11010303.Subtitle: Good to hear that. When you got tangled up by that Filthoid, I thought I'd never...

11010304.ContentEN: ...I'm just glad to see you're okay.
11010304.Subtitle: ...I'm just glad to see you're okay.

11010305.ContentEN: ...There are so few of us left. And those who survived are heavily wounded.
11010305.Subtitle: ...There are so few of us left. And those who survived are heavily wounded.

11010306.ContentEN: If you have the time, would you stay and talk to the wounded?
11010306.Subtitle: If you have the time, would you stay and talk to the wounded?

11010307.ContentEN: Thank you. I'm heading back to find something, so please take care of them for the time being. The soldiers look up to you. Your encouragement will make them feel better.
11010307.Subtitle: Thank you. I'm heading back to find something, so please take care of them for the time being. The soldiers look up to you. Your encouragement will make them feel better.

11010309.ContentEN: The battle map shows several warehouses near our location. We might find some first-aid kits there if we're lucky.
11010309.Subtitle: The battle map shows several warehouses near our location. We might find some first-aid kits there if we're lucky.

11010310.ContentEN: I'm already out of coagulants and painkillers, but some of the soldiers haven't been treated yet... Their injuries can't afford any more delays.
11010310.Subtitle: I'm already out of coagulants and painkillers, but some of the soldiers haven't been treated yet... Their injuries can't afford any more delays.

11010313.ContentEN: And the medic stays. You aren't strong enough to deal with the Filthoids out there alone. We can't afford to lose our only medic.
11010313.Subtitle: And the medic stays. You aren't strong enough to deal with the Filthoids out there alone. We can't afford to lose our only medic.

11010318.ContentEN: Then please stay on the channel so we can keep in touch.
11010318.Subtitle: Then please stay on the channel so we can keep in touch.

11010403.ContentEN: Captain! I'm fine, I can still move... HSSSSS—
11010403.Subtitle: Captain! I'm fine, I can still move... HSSSSS—

11010404.ContentEN: I failed to protect you. I'm sorry.
11010404.Subtitle: I failed to protect you. I'm sorry.

11010405.ContentEN: Please don't say that, Captain! You did your best!
11010405.Subtitle: Please don't say that, Captain! You did your best!

11010407.ContentEN: Who else could it be? The bastards who call themselves The Forsakens.
11010407.Subtitle: Who else could it be? The bastards who call themselves The Forsakens.

11010408.ContentEN: Those despicable cowards are using Filthoids as their weapon... <W>The Forsakens</> are monsters, just like their Filthoid pets!
11010408.Subtitle: Those despicable cowards are using Filthoids as their weapon... The Forsakens are monsters, just like their Filthoid pets!

11010409.ContentEN: And those blasted airheads giving us the orders are just as bad. The mission brief mentioned nothing about the Filthoid hordes down here.
11010409.Subtitle: And those blasted airheads giving us the orders are just as bad. The mission brief mentioned nothing about the Filthoid hordes down here.

11010410.ContentEN: ...Sorry about that. I shouldn't have vented my frustration in front of you, Captain.
11010410.Subtitle: ...Sorry about that. I shouldn't have vented my frustration in front of you, Captain.

11010411.ContentEN: It's alright. Letting out emotions is better than being unable to speak at all.
11010411.Subtitle: It's alright. Letting out emotions is better than being unable to speak at all.

11010412.ContentEN: Hah! You always know how to soothe people, Captain!
11010412.Subtitle: Hah! You always know how to soothe people, Captain!

11010413.ContentEN: And thank goodness we have you. We thought we were goners.
11010413.Subtitle: And thank goodness we have you. We thought we were goners.

11010414.ContentEN: It's just that we're too green. If only <H>Commander Avar</> were here... As a veteran, he must have a way to get us out.
11010414.Subtitle: It's just that we're too green. If only Commander Avar were here... As a veteran, he must have a way to get us out.

11010415.ContentEN: (Sir Avar... Still no words from him.)
11010415.Subtitle: (Sir Avar... Still no words from him.)

11010501.ContentEN: Doctor... Dr Daphne... We're stuck in this bloody dump. Please, Dr Daphne, if I don't make it, do me a favour and bury me...
11010501.Subtitle: Doctor... Dr Daphne... We're stuck in this bloody dump. Please, Dr Daphne, if I don't make it, do me a favour and bury me...

11010502.ContentEN: Don't be discouraged. It'll worsen your wounds.
11010502.Subtitle: Don't be discouraged. It'll worsen your wounds.

11010503.ContentEN: We're out of painkillers... so I have to grumble a bit to make myself feel better.
11010503.Subtitle: We're out of painkillers... so I have to grumble a bit to make myself feel better.

11010504.ContentEN: Right, keep raising your voice to attract the Filthoids.
11010504.Subtitle: Right, keep raising your voice to attract the Filthoids.

11010505.ContentEN: Sorry, Captain. I'll zip it. With no painkillers left, I can only grumble a little to help distract me from the pain.
11010505.Subtitle: Sorry, Captain. I'll zip it. With no painkillers left, I can only grumble a little to help distract me from the pain.

11010506.ContentEN: Dr Daphne and you covered our retreat just then. How is she?
11010506.Subtitle: Dr Daphne and you covered our retreat just then. How is she?

11010507.ContentEN: She's all right. She told me to come check on all of you.
11010507.Subtitle: She's all right. She told me to come check on all of you.

11010508.ContentEN: Good to hear that. *sigh* A high-born lady like her could've stayed at the Academy, but no, she chose to serve with the 13th Legion. What was she thinking?
11010508.Subtitle: Good to hear that. *sigh* A high-born lady like her could've stayed at the Academy, but no, she chose to serve with the 13th Legion. What was she thinking?

11010509.ContentEN: ...\"Eternal glory and loyalty to our Emperor!\" Those aristocrats say that all the time. I wonder if any of them would still be so keen on that when they're actually in a filth pit like this.
11010509.Subtitle: ...\"Eternal glory and loyalty to our Emperor!\" Those aristocrats say that all the time. I wonder if any of them would still be so keen on that when they're actually in a filth pit like this.

11010510.ContentEN: But Dr Daphne has real medical skills and a soft, pretty voice. We gotta keep her safe, Captain. Don't want her to die here.
11010510.Subtitle: But Dr Daphne has real medical skills and a soft, pretty voice. We gotta keep her safe, Captain. Don't want her to die here.

11010601.Content: 怎么样？他们有没有稍微好一点？

11010603.Content: 那就好。不过大家伤得这么重，也不知道还能撑多久。

11010605.Content: ……嗯，我明白……只是心理安慰远远不够……

11010607.Content: 抱歉，可以再麻烦您一次吗？我要回去一趟，可否请您继续照看一下伤员？

11010609.Content: 是的。来的路上有些军需箱，应该是原本储备在要塞的应急物资。当时我在忙着掩护大家，没来得及……

11010610.Content: 我再回去找找，运气好的话，里面说不定会有急救包……就这么办吧！他们的伤情耽误不得了。

11010613.Content: 所以你更应该留下。你身手没那么好，要是遇到秽兽，应付不来。

11010615.Content: 对了，您的通讯器还完好吗？

11010617.Content: 好，那么我们随时保持联络。

11010618.ContentEN: The warehouse does have a few military supply crates.
11010618.Subtitle: The warehouse does have a few military supply crates.

11010619.ContentEN: Great. But before your search, make sure the crates are safe to be approached.
11010619.Subtitle: Great. But before your search, make sure the crates are safe to be approached.

11010621.ContentEN: I got it. The medicine appears to be in good condition.
11010621.Subtitle: I got it. The medicine appears to be in good condition.

11010622.ContentEN: That's great! Thank you! Be careful on your way back. Filthoids are probably lurking around this place.
11010622.Subtitle: That's great! Thank you! Be careful on your way back. Filthoids are probably lurking around this place.

11010623.ContentEN: Wonder how the other guys are doing...
11010623.Subtitle: Wonder how the other guys are doing...

11010625.ContentEN: Damn those Filthoids... Damn The Forsakens...
11010625.Subtitle: Damn those Filthoids... Damn The Forsakens...

11010626.ContentEN: Can't fall asleep... Can't die here...
11010626.Subtitle: Can't fall asleep... Can't die here...

11010627.ContentEN: Hsss— I can't feel my arm...
11010627.Subtitle: Hsss— I can't feel my arm...

11010628.ContentEN: Thank goodness our Captain is all right. We're gonna make it.
11010628.Subtitle: Thank goodness our Captain is all right. We're gonna make it.

11010703.ContentEN: Great, this would help stabilise the wounded.
11010703.Subtitle: Great, this would help stabilise the wounded.

11010704.ContentEN: Any news from the Snow Wolves?
11010704.Subtitle: Any news from the Snow Wolves?

11010705.ContentEN: Not yet. While you were away, I tried reaching out to Commander Avar of the Snow Wolves and Chief Commander Fulvis, but none of the comm channels were working.
11010705.Subtitle: Not yet. While you were away, I tried reaching out to Commander Avar of the Snow Wolves and Chief Commander Fulvis, but none of the comm channels were working.

11010706.ContentEN: Keep trying. And meanwhile, let's see if we can find a safer place for the wounded.
11010706.Subtitle: Keep trying. And meanwhile, let's see if we can find a safer place for the wounded.

11010709.ContentEN: Take a look at this map.
11010709.Subtitle: Take a look at this map.

11010710.ContentEN: We're currently in the storage area where the exit is blocked. However, there are some <H>underground tunnels</> that we haven't checked yet.
11010710.Subtitle: We're currently in the storage area where the exit is blocked. However, there are some underground tunnels that we haven't checked yet.

11010711.ContentEN: Most imperial cities and fortresses have elaborate networks of underground sewers. In recent years, some of these tunnels were expanded and reinforced to serve as air raid shelters.
11010711.Subtitle: Most imperial cities and fortresses have elaborate networks of underground sewers. In recent years, some of these tunnels were expanded and reinforced to serve as air raid shelters.

11010712.ContentEN: If we're lucky enough and The Forsakens didn't set up any ambushes, maybe we could get the wounded there to rest and recover. Besides, the sewer tunnels run all the way outside the fortress, so if our reinforcements arrive, they can easily get to us.
11010712.Subtitle: If we're lucky enough and The Forsakens didn't set up any ambushes, maybe we could get the wounded there to rest and recover. Besides, the sewer tunnels run all the way outside the fortress, so if our reinforcements arrive, they can easily get to us.

11010713.ContentEN: Of course... the tunnels might be risky as well. If you think it's feasible, allow me to scout ahead first.
11010713.Subtitle: Of course... the tunnels might be risky as well. If you think it's feasible, allow me to scout ahead first.

11010714.ContentEN: It's worth a try, but we can't risk having our medic do this alone.
11010714.Subtitle: It's worth a try, but we can't risk having our medic do this alone.

11010715.ContentEN: But now only the two of us can move or act... And the Filthoids might attack this place anytime. You should stay and keep the squad safe.
11010715.Subtitle: But now only the two of us can move or act... And the Filthoids might attack this place anytime. You should stay and keep the squad safe.

11010716.ContentEN: I may not be a professional scout, but over time I've picked up some useful skills, so...
11010716.Subtitle: I may not be a professional scout, but over time I've picked up some useful skills, so...

11010717.ContentEN: ...Alright, be careful down there. Make sure to sidestep any confrontation with the enemies.
11010717.Subtitle: ...Alright, be careful down there. Make sure to sidestep any confrontation with the enemies.

11010718.ContentEN: Understood. I'll stay on the radio while you keep contacting the others. And if I lose contact for more than half an hour, please... lead the squad to find another way.
11010718.Subtitle: Understood. I'll stay on the radio while you keep contacting the others. And if I lose contact for more than half an hour, please... lead the squad to find another way.

11010719.ContentEN: Don't be scared, Daphne. Everyone's survival depends on you... Don't be scared.
11010719.Subtitle: Don't be scared, Daphne. Everyone's survival depends on you... Don't be scared.

11011001.ContentEN: Hang in there, I'll try contacting the Snow Wolves!
11011001.Subtitle: Hang in there, I'll try contacting the Snow Wolves!

11011005.ContentEN: <H>What's the weather like in Hyperborea today?</>
11011005.Subtitle: What's the weather like in Hyperborea today?

11011007.ContentEN: This is Lieutenant Colonel Avar Hrodland. Report your position, Squad Griffins.
11011007.Subtitle: This is Lieutenant Colonel Avar Hrodland. Report your position, Squad Griffins.

11011008.ContentEN: This is Medic Daphne Theodore requesting backup. We're currently at...
11011008.Subtitle: This is Medic Daphne Theodore requesting backup. We're currently at...

11011012.ContentEN: Focus on the fight. I've got your six.
11011012.Subtitle: Focus on the fight. I've got your six.

11011013.ContentEN: We've repelled the Filthoids and set up a temporary shelter, but I don't think this place will hold.
11011013.Subtitle: We've repelled the Filthoids and set up a temporary shelter, but I don't think this place will hold.

11011014.ContentEN: Daphne has tended to the wounded, but due to their injuries they're currently unable to fight.
11011014.Subtitle: Daphne has tended to the wounded, but due to their injuries they're currently unable to fight.

11011015.ContentEN: ...Okay. You two have done pretty well.
11011015.Subtitle: ...Okay. You two have done pretty well.

11011016.ContentEN: Commander Avar! Huff... Huff... you're here! I knew it... You'll lead us all... to take this damned fort...
11011016.Subtitle: Commander Avar! Huff... Huff... you're here! I knew it... You'll lead us all... to take this damned fort...

11011017.ContentEN: Each one of you is a credit to the squad. You've shown courage that is truly worthy of your badge. The Empire will not let your efforts go to waste.
11011017.Subtitle: Each one of you is a credit to the squad. You've shown courage that is truly worthy of your badge. The Empire will not let your efforts go to waste.

11011018.ContentEN: Sir, what about the Snow Wolves?
11011018.Subtitle: Sir, what about the Snow Wolves?

11011019.ContentEN: They are performing their duties, and I've reached out to the chief commander. Have a good rest and leave the fighting to us.
11011019.Subtitle: They are performing their duties, and I've reached out to the chief commander. Have a good rest and leave the fighting to us.

11011020.ContentEN: Commander Avar...? Am I... in a dream...?
11011020.Subtitle: Commander Avar...? Am I... in a dream...?

11011021.ContentEN: This is not a dream. Stay with us, and don't fall asleep.
11011021.Subtitle: This is not a dream. Stay with us, and don't fall asleep.

11011022.ContentEN: I salute you, sir... All glory... to our Emperor...
11011022.Subtitle: I salute you, sir... All glory... to our Emperor...

11011024.ContentEN: Sir, do you think we still have the chance?
11011024.Subtitle: Sir, do you think we still have the chance?

11011025.ContentEN: From what I see of the battle—
11011025.Subtitle: From what I see of the battle—

11011026.ContentEN: The tide of battle is in our favour. Reinforcements are on their way. Soon we will take the fortress and crush those bastards.
11011026.Subtitle: The tide of battle is in our favour. Reinforcements are on their way. Soon we will take the fortress and crush those bastards.

11011103.ContentEN: Why the grief? You still have your arms and legs, so stand up straight and pull yourself together!
11011103.Subtitle: Why the grief? You still have your arms and legs, so stand up straight and pull yourself together!

11011105.ContentEN: ...I know what you've been through. I've seen many of our fallen soldiers along the way.
11011105.Subtitle: ...I know what you've been through. I've seen many of our fallen soldiers along the way.

11011106.ContentEN: But you are soldiers. Save your condolences for when you're home and safe.
11011106.Subtitle: But you are soldiers. Save your condolences for when you're home and safe.

11011109.ContentEN: We're doing fine. Just carrying out the orders from higher-ups and almost got killed. Thanks for asking, sir.
11011109.Subtitle: We're doing fine. Just carrying out the orders from higher-ups and almost got killed. Thanks for asking, sir.

11011112.ContentEN: Yes, sir. As planned, the Griffins and the Snow Wolves were expected to launch a two-way assault on Lonza Fortress. However, the Griffins were ambushed shortly after we began our infiltration.
11011112.Subtitle: Yes, sir. As planned, the Griffins and the Snow Wolves were expected to launch a two-way assault on Lonza Fortress. However, the Griffins were ambushed shortly after we began our infiltration.

11011113.ContentEN: The passageways between the zones were blocked. We lost contact with some of our men, and the rest have suffered heavy casualties. Our commlinks have been severed, too — we're essentially trapped here.
11011113.Subtitle: The passageways between the zones were blocked. We lost contact with some of our men, and the rest have suffered heavy casualties. Our commlinks have been severed, too — we're essentially trapped here.

11011114.ContentEN: Actually, the Snow Wolves went through the same situation as yours. Keep this between us, don't let the wounded know.
11011114.Subtitle: Actually, the Snow Wolves went through the same situation as yours. Keep this between us, don't let the wounded know.

11011115.ContentEN: So, seems like the two of you are the only combat-capable Griffins left in the squad...
11011115.Subtitle: So, seems like the two of you are the only combat-capable Griffins left in the squad...

11011116.ContentEN: Daphne, we've opened the passage between the storage area and the processing area, and there's a place in the middle that's reasonably secure. I've given the signal, and you'll be escorted there for a better rest.
11011116.Subtitle: Daphne, we've opened the passage between the storage area and the processing area, and there's a place in the middle that's reasonably secure. I've given the signal, and you'll be escorted there for a better rest.

11011117.ContentEN: {nickname2}, you come with me and continue the mission.
11011117.Subtitle: , you come with me and continue the mission.

11011118.ContentEN: I can take action with you. Please, let me... Argh!
11011118.Subtitle: I can take action with you. Please, let me... Argh!

11011119.ContentEN: You hurt your leg? Are you okay? ... How did you manage to make it here?
11011119.Subtitle: You hurt your leg? Are you okay? ... How did you manage to make it here?

11011120.ContentEN: Don't mind me. I — I've saved one last dose of anaesthetic for myself. The latest Academy potion is quite effective at killing pains, so it's okay—
11011120.Subtitle: Don't mind me. I—I've saved one last dose of anaesthetic for myself. The latest Academy potion is quite effective at killing pains, so it's okay—

11011121.ContentEN: Medic Daphne, what is Article 12 of the Hyperborean Legionary Code of Conduct?
11011121.Subtitle: Medic Daphne, what is Article 12 of the Hyperborean Legionary Code of Conduct?

11011122.ContentEN: Now is not the time for rules! I can still—
11011122.Subtitle: Now is not the time for rules! I can still—

11011123.ContentEN: Medic Daphne, answer your superior officer.
11011123.Subtitle: Medic Daphne, answer your superior officer.

11011124.ContentEN: ...The chain of command must be respected during all military operations...
11011124.Subtitle: ...The chain of command must be respected during all military operations...

11011125.ContentEN: Daphne Theodore, Medic of the 13th Legion of the Hyperborean Empire.
11011125.Subtitle: Daphne Theodore, Medic of the 13th Legion of the Hyperborean Empire.

11011127.ContentEN: Hold all actions and stand by. After joining up with the Snow Wolves, proceed with the wounded Griffins to the processing area for rest and await further orders.
11011127.Subtitle: Hold all actions and stand by. After joining up with the Snow Wolves, proceed with the wounded Griffins to the processing area for rest and await further orders.

11011131.ContentEN: Okay. {nickname2}, follow me and proceed with the mission.
11011131.Subtitle: Okay. , follow me and proceed with the mission.

11011134.ContentEN: During the attack by that giant Filthoid. I didn't mean to hide it from you, but...
11011134.Subtitle: During the attack by that giant Filthoid. I didn't mean to hide it from you, but...

11011135.ContentEN: ...You need a break. Listen to Sir Avar and go to the processing area.
11011135.Subtitle: ...You need a break. Listen to Sir Avar and go to the processing area.

11011136.ContentEN: I'll go see you when we're back in the capital.
11011136.Subtitle: I'll go see you when we're back in the capital.

11011137.ContentEN: Okay. After what Commander Avar said, I guess I don't have a choice. But I'm still worried...
11011137.Subtitle: Okay. After what Commander Avar said, I guess I don't have a choice. But I'm still worried...

11011138.ContentEN: Forget it. Now that he's here, there shouldn't be any problems.
11011138.Subtitle: Forget it. Now that he's here, there shouldn't be any problems.

11011201.ContentEN: Since they've reworked the mechanisms, does that mean there are some elite engineers in The Forsakens?
11011201.Subtitle: Since they've reworked the mechanisms, does that mean there are some elite engineers in The Forsakens?

11011202.ContentEN: Of course. I've repeatedly warned the bigoted higher-ups not to take The Forsakens as mere illiterate barbarians.
11011202.Subtitle: Of course. I've repeatedly warned the bigoted higher-ups not to take The Forsakens as mere illiterate barbarians.

11011203.ContentEN: They have controlled the fortress for over six months. If they are barbarians, what does that make us?
11011203.Subtitle: They have controlled the fortress for over six months. If they are barbarians, what does that make us?

11011205.ContentEN: Well, no one grasps the \"Art of Command\" better than Fulvis after all.
11011205.Subtitle: Well, no one grasps the \"Art of Command\" better than Fulvis after all.

11011206.ContentEN: Let the great commander explain himself to the Chief! And let's see if his silver tongue can charm Sibylle into letting him off the hook this time.
11011206.Subtitle: Let the great commander explain himself to the Chief! And let's see if his silver tongue can charm Sibylle into letting him off the hook this time.

11011301.ContentEN: Let's sort through the situation here first.
11011301.Subtitle: Let's sort through the situation here first.

11011302.ContentEN: Our battle plan involved Colonel Fulvis and his numerically superior Squad, the Narwhals, launching a diversionary attack on the bridge leading to Lonza Fortress to distract The Forsakens.
11011302.Subtitle: Our battle plan involved Colonel Fulvis and his numerically superior Squad, the Narwhals, launching a diversionary attack on the bridge leading to Lonza Fortress to distract The Forsakens.

11011303.ContentEN: Meanwhile, the Snow Wolves and the Griffins would parachute right on top of the fortress. Our two squads would infiltrate the fortress via the engine room and the arsenal, then launch a direct strike and seize the central control room.
11011303.Subtitle: Meanwhile, the Snow Wolves and the Griffins would parachute right on top of the fortress. Our two squads would infiltrate the fortress via the engine room and the arsenal, then launch a direct strike and seize the central control room.

11011306.ContentEN: Yes. Either they have intercepted our communications, or there is a spy working for The Forsakens in the Legion.
11011306.Subtitle: Yes. Either they have intercepted our communications, or there is a spy working for The Forsakens in the Legion.

11011307.ContentEN: Regardless of how our plans got out, The Forsakens were undoubtedly well-prepared.
11011307.Subtitle: Regardless of how our plans got out, The Forsakens were undoubtedly well-prepared.

11011308.ContentEN: They used the fortress's defense systems to ambush us, and even lured a bunch of Filthoids here... We planned for an infiltration strike, so none of us were equipped with heavy weapons for large beasts. The only option was to throw our lives at it.
11011308.Subtitle: They used the fortress's defense systems to ambush us, and even lured a bunch of Filthoids here... We planned for an infiltration strike, so none of us were equipped with heavy weapons for large beasts. The only option was to throw our lives at it.

11011309.ContentEN: Given that Lonza Fortress was designed by Imperial engineers, you might know how to disable its defense systems, right?
11011309.Subtitle: Given that Lonza Fortress was designed by Imperial engineers, you might know how to disable its defense systems, right?

11011310.ContentEN: You literally slept through your cryptography courses, didn't you?
11011310.Subtitle: You literally slept through your cryptography courses, didn't you?

11011311.ContentEN: I cannot believe you're still sore about that, sir.
11011311.Subtitle: I cannot believe you're still sore about that, sir.

11011312.ContentEN: Never mind. Acing those courses wouldn't be much help in this case anyway. The Forsakens have modified the mechanisms in the fortress. We don't have time to go through each hardpoint and crack every code.
11011312.Subtitle: Never mind. Acing those courses wouldn't be much help in this case anyway. The Forsakens have modified the mechanisms in the fortress. We don't have time to go through each hardpoint and crack every code.

11011313.ContentEN: But disabling the systems first would be the right call, so we should reach the <H>engine room</> next.
11011313.Subtitle: But disabling the systems first would be the right call, so we should reach the engine room next.

11011314.ContentEN: Cutting their power will shut down the systems, giving us the time to rescue our trapped soldiers. That's our main objective in the next move.
11011314.Subtitle: Cutting their power will shut down the systems, giving us the time to rescue our trapped soldiers. That's our main objective in the next move.

11011315.ContentEN: Operating the devices there requires two people. Thank god I took you with me.
11011315.Subtitle: Operating the devices there requires two people. Thank god I took you with me.

11011316.ContentEN: Hold on, we're getting a call...
11011316.Subtitle: Hold on, we're getting a call...

11011317.ContentEN: Hello? Does anyone copy? <H>What's the weather like in Hyperborea today?</>
11011317.Subtitle: Hello? Does anyone copy? What's the weather like in Hyperborea today?

11011319.ContentEN: Commander Avar? Is that you? I'm Vic!
11011319.Subtitle: Commander Avar? Is that you? I'm Vic!

11011320.ContentEN: Avar listening. Give me a report.
11011320.Subtitle: Avar listening. Give me a report.

11011321.ContentEN: After we split our forces, Monica and I took the path along the outer perimeter. We're about to reach the engine room.
11011321.Subtitle: After we split our forces, Monica and I took the path along the outer perimeter. We're about to reach the engine room.

11011322.ContentEN: Engine room? Are you trying to—
11011322.Subtitle: Engine room? Are you trying to—

11011323.ContentEN: I'm calling you specifically to give you an update, sir. We'll make an attempt to shut down the power unit.
11011323.Subtitle: I'm calling you specifically to give you an update, sir. We'll make an attempt to shut down the power unit.

11011324.ContentEN: The engine room is probably full of traps. Cease your actions and stay where you are. Captain {nickname2} and I will get to your place in about fifteen minutes.
11011324.Subtitle: The engine room is probably full of traps. Cease your actions and stay where you are. Captain  and I will get to your place in about fifteen minutes.

11011325.ContentEN: Please, let us try, sir! Every moment we delay puts our comrades in greater danger.
11011325.Subtitle: Please, let us try, sir! Every moment we delay puts our comrades in greater danger.

11011327.ContentEN: And one more thing... Since Captain {nickname2} is with you, may I ask how the Griffins are doing? My brother Simon is in that squad...
11011327.Subtitle: And one more thing... Since Captain  is with you, may I ask how the Griffins are doing? My brother Simon is in that squad...

11011329.ContentEN: We have yet to secure his body.
11011329.Subtitle: We have yet to secure his body.

11011331.ContentEN: Ahem, he means Simon's got some injuries, but the medic is taking care of him in a temporary shelter. There's no need to worry about him.
11011331.Subtitle: Ahem, he means Simon's got some injuries, but the medic is taking care of him in a temporary shelter. There's no need to worry about him.

11011333.ContentEN: Your way with words... Take my advice, never try to comfort anyone. Okay?
11011333.Subtitle: Your way with words... Take my advice, never try to comfort anyone. Okay?

11011402.ContentEN: Vic is down there. He was trying to shut down the Phoxichor tank, but he got locked behind a door... They've re-encrypted the control panel... I gotta figure out something else...
11011402.Subtitle: Vic is down there. He was trying to shut down the Phoxichor tank, but he got locked behind a door... They've re-encrypted the control panel... I gotta figure out something else...

11011407.ContentEN: Hang in there! I'm nearly finished... Almost there...
11011407.Subtitle: Hang in there! I'm nearly finished... Almost there...

11011409.ContentEN: ...It just won't crack...! Ugh! Of all times...!
11011409.Subtitle: ...It just won't crack...! Ugh! Of all times...!

11011411.ContentEN: I'll take care of the door. {nickname2}, get down there, and help me shut down the device to save Vic.
11011411.Subtitle: I'll take care of the door. , get down there, and help me shut down the device to save Vic.

11011412.ContentEN: Follow my lead. The quicker we are, the higher our chances of saving our comrade. Understood?
11011412.Subtitle: Follow my lead. The quicker we are, the higher our chances of saving our comrade. Understood?

11011416.ContentEN: Besides the independently powered central control room, this place stores all the Phoxichor that powers the whole fortress.
11011416.Subtitle: Besides the independently powered central control room, this place stores all the Phoxichor that powers the whole fortress.

11011417.ContentEN: If we destroy the power unit here, we'll disable most of the facilities in the fortress.
11011417.Subtitle: If we destroy the power unit here, we'll disable most of the facilities in the fortress.

11011418.ContentEN: We must shut down the systems... We can't let Vic die in vain.
11011418.Subtitle: We must shut down the systems... We can't let Vic die in vain.

11011419.Content: 哦？已经处理好一个了吗，小心些，我好像听到秽兽靠过来的声音了。

11011420.Content: 好，{nickname2}，动力链接已经断开了，我们得趁现在去把整个动力装置都毁了。

11011421.Content: 核心的动力炉就在下面，小心些……

11011422.Content: 有些脏东西围过来了……事办妥了再上来集合！

11011424.ContentEN: I'll disable the protective barriers one by one. When the signal light's on, smash the Phoxichor tank as fast as you can!
11011424.Subtitle: I'll disable the protective barriers one by one. When the signal light's on, smash the Phoxichor tank as fast as you can!

11011425.ContentEN: Some Phoxichor tanks may be equipped with self-destruct devices; if you hear a timer, evacuate immediately.
11011425.Subtitle: Some Phoxichor tanks may be equipped with self-destruct devices; if you hear a timer, evacuate immediately.

11011427.ContentEN: Excellent work. We got two more tanks to go.
11011427.Subtitle: Excellent work. We got two more tanks to go.

11011428.ContentEN: The 2nd one has been disabled. Now!
11011428.Subtitle: The 2nd one has been disabled. Now!

11011429.ContentEN: Whew... One more left. You okay down there?
11011429.Subtitle: Whew... One more left. You okay down there?

11011431.Content: 抓紧时间打碎那玩意儿，快从那儿离开！

11011432.ContentEN: Alright, this is the last one!
11011432.Subtitle: Alright, this is the last one!

11011434.ContentEN: The engine room is about to explode. Evacuate now!
11011434.Subtitle: The engine room is about to explode. Evacuate now!

11011501.ContentEN: Fantastic job, kid — you are indeed the best among your peers.
11011501.Subtitle: Fantastic job, kid — you are indeed the best among your peers.

11011503.ContentEN: Okay, most of the defensive weapons within the fortress have been disabled. The rest of our squads should have an easier time.
11011503.Subtitle: Okay, most of the defensive weapons within the fortress have been disabled. The rest of our squads should have an easier time.

11011504.ContentEN: So can you continue? Let's go if you can, we've got other comrades to rescue— Hold on, new communication coming in.
11011504.Subtitle: So can you continue? Let's go if you can, we've got other comrades to rescue— Hold on, new communication coming in.

11011509.ContentEN: What's your problem? Can't even recognise the chief commander's voice?
11011509.Subtitle: What's your problem? Can't even recognise the chief commander's voice?

11011511.ContentEN: It's raining tonight. Tsk, I've seen marble sculptures in the gallery with more flexibility than your mind. Now, report on your squad.
11011511.Subtitle: It's raining tonight. Tsk, I've seen marble sculptures in the gallery with more flexibility than your mind. Now, report on your squad.

11011512.ContentEN: Thanks to your \"brilliant\" decision-making, the Snow Wolves and the Griffins haven't been completely annihilated yet. What, got any new insight?
11011512.Subtitle: Thanks to your \"brilliant\" decision-making, the Snow Wolves and the Griffins haven't been completely annihilated yet. What, got any new insight?

11011513.ContentEN: Enough with your snide attitude. You should be ashamed of how this battle has turned out.
11011513.Subtitle: Enough with your snide attitude. You should be ashamed of how this battle has turned out.

11011514.ContentEN: I would like to achieve glory, sir. If you exercised proper secrecy and came up with a more credible plan, our soldiers would be popping champagne bottles in the central control room at this very moment instead of waiting for body bags.
11011514.Subtitle: I would like to achieve glory, sir. If you exercised proper secrecy and came up with a more credible plan, our soldiers would be popping champagne bottles in the central control room at this very moment instead of waiting for body bags.

11011515.ContentEN: Avar Hrodland, I'm warning you — Watch your tone when speaking to your superior!
11011515.Subtitle: Avar Hrodland, I'm warning you — Watch your tone when speaking to your superior!

11011516.ContentEN: Antonius Fulvis, I'm also warning you — Stop wasting the lives of my comrades.
11011516.Subtitle: Antonius Fulvis, I'm also warning you — Stop wasting the lives of my comrades.

11011517.ContentEN: I have no time for this right now. I am here to demand a progress update on the mission.
11011517.Subtitle: I have no time for this right now. I am here to demand a progress update on the mission.

11011518.ContentEN: The two squads have been ambushed and suffered heavy losses. I'm preparing to search and rescue the missing soldiers first, then regroup in the processing area, waiting for your support.
11011518.Subtitle: The two squads have been ambushed and suffered heavy losses. I'm preparing to search and rescue the missing soldiers first, then regroup in the processing area, waiting for your support.

11011519.ContentEN: Your mission is a rapid infiltration assault. No field officer of mine is permitted to make their own bloody choices.
11011519.Subtitle: Your mission is a rapid infiltration assault. No field officer of mine is permitted to make their own bloody choices.

11011520.ContentEN: Straying off the planned course of action will only alert the entire fortress. I order you to stick to the plan and launch a direct assault on the central control room.
11011520.Subtitle: Straying off the planned course of action will only alert the entire fortress. I order you to stick to the plan and launch a direct assault on the central control room.

11011521.ContentEN: Are you even listening to yourself? Alert the fortress? They're already in ambush positions, waiting to wipe us all out! We've sustained eighty percent casualties — eight zero! Isn't that enough for you!?
11011521.Subtitle: Are you even listening to yourself? Alert the fortress? They're already in ambush positions, waiting to wipe us all out! We've sustained eighty percent casualties — eight zero! Isn't that enough for you!?

11011522.ContentEN: Casualties? Forget about your bloody casualties. All I know is that you're significantly behind schedule!
11011522.Subtitle: Casualties? Forget about your bloody casualties. All I know is that you're significantly behind schedule!

11011523.ContentEN: You've brought shame to the legion's banner — the soldiers of Hyperborea are not cowards who would stop because of trivial losses like this!
11011523.Subtitle: You've brought shame to the legion's banner — the soldiers of Hyperborea are not cowards who would stop because of trivial losses like this!

11011524.ContentEN: From Emperor Dis I to Legion Chief Quintus, the mastermind of the Divine Elegy offensive, no Hyperborean commander ever baulked at taking losses.
11011524.Subtitle: From Emperor Dis I to Legion Chief Quintus, the mastermind of the Divine Elegy offensive, no Hyperborean commander ever baulked at taking losses.

11011525.ContentEN: I gave you the elites of the 13th Legion. You should have more than enough resources to take this puny fort.
11011525.Subtitle: I gave you the elites of the 13th Legion. You should have more than enough resources to take this puny fort.

11011528.ContentEN: We can continue the mission, but only with additional support.
11011528.Subtitle: We can continue the mission, but only with additional support.

11011529.ContentEN: Receiving enough support gives us a better chance of victory. A victory in your name, sir.
11011529.Subtitle: Receiving enough support gives us a better chance of victory. A victory in your name, sir.

11011530.ContentEN: Commander Fulvis, if we all fall here, your tactical acumen alone won't stand a chance to take this fortress. And you'll surely have to answer for such a failure.
11011530.Subtitle: Commander Fulvis, if we all fall here, your tactical acumen alone won't stand a chance to take this fortress. And you'll surely have to answer for such a failure.

11011531.ContentEN: We are your soldiers who fight for the glory of the Empire, not your enemies.
11011531.Subtitle: We are your soldiers who fight for the glory of the Empire, not your enemies.

11011532.ContentEN: And who is this? Oh, it's you, {nickname2}, Avar's favourite protege and the Captain of the Griffins, I presume?
11011532.Subtitle: And who is this? Oh, it's you, , Avar's favourite protege and the Captain of the Griffins, I presume?

11011533.ContentEN: Since you're so full of courage, why don't you come to the front yourself?
11011533.Subtitle: Since you're so full of courage, why don't you come to the front yourself?

11011534.ContentEN: And who is this? Oh, it's you, {nickname2}, Avar's favourite protege and the Captain of the Griffins, I presume?
11011534.Subtitle: And who is this? Oh, it's you, , Avar's favourite protege and the Captain of the Griffins, I presume?

11011535.ContentEN: What's the hurry? We have concluded our tactical meeting. Reinforcements from the Narwhals are on their way, and I'll be gracing the front with them.
11011535.Subtitle: What's the hurry? We have concluded our tactical meeting. Reinforcements from the Narwhals are on their way, and I'll be gracing the front with them.

11011536.ContentEN: Stick to the plan, you hear me? As Hyperborean soldiers, you fight until your last breath or face the consequences!
11011536.Subtitle: Stick to the plan, you hear me? As Hyperborean soldiers, you fight until your last breath or face the consequences!

11011541.ContentEN: This is Simon from the Griffins. Do you copy, Captain?
11011541.Subtitle: This is Simon from the Griffins. Do you copy, Captain?

11011542.ContentEN: Copy that. Simon, where are you?
11011542.Subtitle: Copy that. Simon, where are you?

11011543.ContentEN: We're trapped by a Filthoid horde along the rail track. If you have any forces to spare, we need an extraction!
11011543.Subtitle: We're trapped by a Filthoid horde along the rail track. If you have any forces to spare, we need an extraction!

11011546.ContentEN: I also picked up a signal from another squad reporting their position, right after Fulvis ended his call. {nickname2}, what are you gonna do?
11011546.Subtitle: I also picked up a signal from another squad reporting their position, right after Fulvis ended his call. , what are you gonna do?

11011547.ContentEN: I intend to get to the soldiers first. We don't stand a chance on our own.
11011547.Subtitle: I intend to get to the soldiers first. We don't stand a chance on our own.

11011548.ContentEN: You kiddo... I knew I was right about you.
11011548.Subtitle: You kiddo... I knew I was right about you.

11011549.ContentEN: Even though our chances are slim, we must adhere to the Chief Commander's orders.
11011549.Subtitle: Even though our chances are slim, we must adhere to the Chief Commander's orders.

11011550.ContentEN: Fulvis is nothing but an arrogant and greedy bastard. His senatorial lineage is the only reason he's up there, barking orders at you.
11011550.Subtitle: Fulvis is nothing but an arrogant and greedy bastard. His senatorial lineage is the only reason he's up there, barking orders at you.

11011551.ContentEN: He sees soldiers as mere numbers in his reports, treating them as fodder for medals to pin on his uniform, not as living, breathing humans.
11011551.Subtitle: He sees soldiers as mere numbers in his reports, treating them as fodder for medals to pin on his uniform, not as living, breathing humans.

11011552.ContentEN: Besides, battlefields are ever-changing. What true insight can he gain from just staring at a map?
11011552.Subtitle: Besides, battlefields are ever-changing. What true insight can he gain from just staring at a map?

11011553.ContentEN: Go rescue your comrades, {nickname2}. In case Fulvis seeks someone to blame later, consider this a direct order from me.
11011553.Subtitle: Go rescue your comrades, . In case Fulvis seeks someone to blame later, consider this a direct order from me.

11011555.ContentEN: Monica and I will be on our way to rescue another team of soldiers trapped near Turret 4.
11011555.Subtitle: Monica and I will be on our way to rescue another team of soldiers trapped near Turret 4.

11011556.ContentEN: We disabled most defensive weapons within the fortress. The turret's auto-defences should be offline now... We might be able to seize the Turret first.
11011556.Subtitle: We disabled most defensive weapons within the fortress. The turret's auto-defences should be offline now... We might be able to seize the Turret first.

11011557.ContentEN: ...And once we do that, we can blow apart the defence system around the central area with the Phoxichor Cannon.
11011557.Subtitle: ...And once we do that, we can blow apart the defence system around the central area with the Phoxichor Cannon.

11011558.ContentEN: It's settled then. Meet me at Turret 4 once you've finished everything on your side.
11011558.Subtitle: It's settled then. Meet me at Turret 4 once you've finished everything on your side.

11011604.ContentEN: Quick... the rail tracks... Everyone is trapped by the Filthoids there... Go save them...
11011604.Subtitle: Quick... the rail tracks... Everyone is trapped by the Filthoids there... Go save them...

11011605.ContentEN: And... be careful out there, Captain...
11011605.Subtitle: And... be careful out there, Captain...

11011606.ContentEN: ...Ma... the Filthoids are feasting on my leg... It hurts so much...
11011606.Subtitle: ...Ma... the Filthoids are feasting on my leg... It hurts so much...

11011610.ContentEN: Simon! Are you still with me?
11011610.Subtitle: Simon! Are you still with me?

11011614.ContentEN: Since you're so full of courage, why don't you come to the front yourself?
11011614.Subtitle: Since you're so full of courage, why don't you come to the front yourself?

11011619.Content: 这段音乐应该就是秽兽发狂的罪魁祸首了。

11011620.Content: 二号广播室应该就在附近……在救人前，也许可以先去关停广播。

11011706.ContentEN: Do you copy? I'm Daphne Theodore, the Medic of Squad Griffins.
11011706.Subtitle: Do you copy? I'm Daphne Theodore, the Medic of Squad Griffins.

11011707.ContentEN: ...{nickname2}? Is that you? Why aren't you saying anything? Are you hurt?
11011707.Subtitle: ...? Is that you? Why aren't you saying anything? Are you hurt?

11011708.ContentEN: Where are you!? I'll seek permission and come for you right away...
11011708.Subtitle: Where are you!? I'll seek permission and come for you right away...

11011709.ContentEN: I... I just need to hear the voices of my squad. I'm okay. How is everyone on your side?
11011709.Subtitle: I... I just need to hear the voices of my squad. I'm okay. How is everyone on your side?

11011710.ContentEN: The Snow Wolves have joined us. We're safe here for now. What about you?
11011710.Subtitle: The Snow Wolves have joined us. We're safe here for now. What about you?

11011711.ContentEN: ...I... I'm okay. I need to go, I should continue the mission.
11011711.Subtitle: ...I... I'm okay. I need to go, I should continue the mission.

11011712.ContentEN: Please be careful... I'll see you in Dismania.
11011712.Subtitle: Please be careful... I'll see you in Dismania.

11011802.ContentEN: Oh, Captain! My dear Captain!! You finally came for us!! Something's gone wrong with our comm channels and we couldn't get in touch with nobody. Simon went out looking for help.
11011802.Subtitle: Oh, Captain! My dear Captain!! You finally came for us!! Something's gone wrong with our comm channels and we couldn't get in touch with nobody. Simon went out looking for help.

11011803.ContentEN: I was just trying to get everyone to keep it together — told them how good you are and how you're gonna come flying in and get everyone out of this mess.
11011803.Subtitle: I was just trying to get everyone to keep it together — told them how good you are and how you're gonna come flying in and get everyone out of this mess.

11011804.ContentEN: Captain, did you come alone? Did you see Simon?
11011804.Subtitle: Captain, did you come alone? Did you see Simon?

11011806.ContentEN: ...!! He... He's the smartest among us. How come...?
11011806.Subtitle: ...!! He... He's the smartest among us. How come...?

11011807.ContentEN: Now is not the time to dwell on Simon. We need to focus on this battle and surviving.
11011807.Subtitle: Now is not the time to dwell on Simon. We need to focus on this battle and surviving.

11011809.ContentEN: ...You're right... He didn't risk his life going out there to look for help so that we could end up here like crybabies.
11011809.Subtitle: ...You're right... He didn't risk his life going out there to look for help so that we could end up here like crybabies.

11011810.ContentEN: Get going once you're ready. I ran into Commander Avar on my way here. We plan to join them at Turret 4.
11011810.Subtitle: Get going once you're ready. I ran into Commander Avar on my way here. We plan to join them at Turret 4.

11011811.ContentEN: Turret 4? Are you sure about that, Captain? That's pretty far, and god knows how many Filthoids there are along the way. There aren't many of us... Can we make it?
11011811.Subtitle: Turret 4? Are you sure about that, Captain? That's pretty far, and god knows how many Filthoids there are along the way. There aren't many of us... Can we make it?

11011815.ContentEN: The Forsakens. We captured them on the way.
11011815.Subtitle: The Forsakens. We captured them on the way.

11011816.ContentEN: ...Your pet Filthoids killed a close buddy of mine. Reminded me just now — I ought to carve a few holes in you to honour his memory.
11011816.Subtitle: ...Your pet Filthoids killed a close buddy of mine. Reminded me just now — I ought to carve a few holes in you to honour his memory.

11011818.ContentEN: We should keep the captives alive. We need to take them back for interrogation in the Imperial Prison.
11011818.Subtitle: We should keep the captives alive. We need to take them back for interrogation in the Imperial Prison.

11011820.ContentEN: If sacrificing one Charon can quell your anger, then take me. But first, please, let me explain...
11011820.Subtitle: If sacrificing one Charon can quell your anger, then take me. But first, please, let me explain...

11011821.ContentEN: Come back, Katya! Don't be silly!
11011821.Subtitle: Come back, Katya! Don't be silly!

11011822.ContentEN: Sir, we may be Charons but we are not part of The Forsakens. We're just ordinary folk living in a town nearby.
11011822.Subtitle: Sir, we may be Charons but we are not part of The Forsakens. We're just ordinary folk living in a town nearby.

11011823.ContentEN: The Forsakens grabbed us from our homes and forced us to help rebuild this fortress. They left the humans in peace and only took the Charons...
11011823.Subtitle: The Forsakens grabbed us from our homes and forced us to help rebuild this fortress. They left the humans in peace and only took the Charons...

11011824.ContentEN: You can't be serious — The Forsakens are enslaving their own people?
11011824.Subtitle: You can't be serious — The Forsakens are enslaving their own people?

11011825.ContentEN: Exactly. They exploit us because Charons are stronger and withstand extreme heat and cold better than humans. You may think we're the same as The Forsakens, but they've never accepted us as their own.
11011825.Subtitle: Exactly. They exploit us because Charons are stronger and withstand extreme heat and cold better than humans. You may think we're the same as The Forsakens, but they've never accepted us as their own.

11011828.ContentEN: Just a few days ago, I had to take a break because my stomach was acting up, but those Forsaken rotters whipped me dozens of times and left me for dead. It was Mr Frank who gave me water, food, and this ragged robe to cover me up.
11011828.Subtitle: Just a few days ago, I had to take a break because my stomach was acting up, but those Forsaken rotters whipped me dozens of times and left me for dead. It was Mr Frank who gave me water, food, and this ragged robe to cover me up.

11011829.ContentEN: I would have died if not for Mr Frank. So if you must shoot him, could you please shoot me instead? He just wants to help, because none of us can forgive what The Forsakens did to us.
11011829.Subtitle: I would have died if not for Mr Frank. So if you must shoot him, could you please shoot me instead? He just wants to help, because none of us can forgive what The Forsakens did to us.

11011830.ContentEN: The sewer tunnels are like a maze. You'd easily get lost without help. The Forsakens always get Mr Frank to fix the sewer valves, so he knows the place like the back of his hand. Let him live and he'll get you where you need to go.
11011830.Subtitle: The sewer tunnels are like a maze. You'd easily get lost without help. The Forsakens always get Mr Frank to fix the sewer valves, so he knows the place like the back of his hand. Let him live and he'll get you where you need to go.

11011831.ContentEN: Alright. Marco, lower your gun — Holster it, this is an order.
11011831.Subtitle: Alright. Marco, lower your gun — Holster it, this is an order.

11011835.ContentEN: Just a few days ago, I had to take a break because my stomach was acting up, but those Forsaken rotters whipped me dozens of times and left me for dead. It was Mr Frank who gave me water, food, and this ragged robe to cover me up.
11011835.Subtitle: Just a few days ago, I had to take a break because my stomach was acting up, but those Forsaken rotters whipped me dozens of times and left me for dead. It was Mr Frank who gave me water, food, and this ragged robe to cover me up.

11011839.ContentEN: I've heard you're familiar with these sewers. Please lead the way then.
11011839.Subtitle: I've heard you're familiar with these sewers. Please lead the way then.

11011840.ContentEN: Stay alert and keep a close watch on them. If anything seems amiss, we pull out immediately.
11011840.Subtitle: Stay alert and keep a close watch on them. If anything seems amiss, we pull out immediately.

11011841.ContentEN: Behave! Captain's orders — no sudden moves or funny business, alright?
11011841.Subtitle: Behave! Captain's orders — no sudden moves or funny business, alright?

11011842.ContentEN: But if I'm not allowed to move, how am I supposed to lead the way...?
11011842.Subtitle: But if I'm not allowed to move, how am I supposed to lead the way...?

11011843.ContentEN: Right, you have a point there.
11011843.Subtitle: Right, you have a point there.

11011844.ContentEN: There's no need to so on guard. We Charons are ordinary people too, with families we're desperate to see again.
11011844.Subtitle: There's no need to so on guard. We Charons are ordinary people too, with families we're desperate to see again.

11011847.ContentEN: Not all Charons are rebels from The Forsakens — Commander Avar is a Charon, remember? And even if they are, they'd be worth more to us alive.
11011847.Subtitle: Not all Charons are rebels from The Forsakens — Commander Avar is a Charon, remember? And even if they are, they'd be worth more to us alive.

11011848.ContentEN: ...An inner voice might tell you otherwise, Marco, but don't listen to it. Don't let emotions cloud your judgment.
11011848.Subtitle: ...An inner voice might tell you otherwise, Marco, but don't listen to it. Don't let emotions cloud your judgment.

11011851.ContentEN: Yes. You didn't let your man frisk me, and I really appreciate it — it's rare to see an Imperial officer respect the dignity of a Charon girl like me.
11011851.Subtitle: Yes. You didn't let your man frisk me, and I really appreciate it — it's rare to see an Imperial officer respect the dignity of a Charon girl like me.

11011852.ContentEN: Your kindness will reap a just reward.
11011852.Subtitle: Your kindness will reap a just reward.

11011901.ContentEN: ...What did you say!? The reinforcements are delayed!?
11011901.Subtitle: ...What did you say!? The reinforcements are delayed!?

11011902.ContentEN: The Forsakens sabotaged the Narwhals at the bridge. Now we're stuck here.
11011902.Subtitle: The Forsakens sabotaged the Narwhals at the bridge. Now we're stuck here.

11011903.ContentEN: You expect me to break into the central control room with just two battered squads and directly confront their Messenger? You can't be serious, Fulvis. The enemies are Daimons, and god knows how many more ambushes lie ahead!
11011903.Subtitle: You expect me to break into the central control room with just two battered squads and directly confront their Messenger? You can't be serious, Fulvis. The enemies are Daimons, and god knows how many more ambushes lie ahead!

11011904.ContentEN: So what if they are Daimons? You're one too! Besides, don't you have {nickname2} on your side, who's as strong as any Daimon?
11011904.Subtitle: So what if they are Daimons? You're one too! Besides, don't you have  on your side, who's as strong as any Daimon?

11011905.ContentEN: The central control room is just right ahead. It's less than fifty yards away from the Turret you're at.
11011905.Subtitle: The central control room is just right ahead. It's less than fifty yards away from the Turret you're at.

11011906.ContentEN: Fifty yards further, and we can dedicate the victory to His Majesty! What's so hard about that?
11011906.Subtitle: Fifty yards further, and we can dedicate the victory to His Majesty! What's so hard about that?

11011908.ContentEN: {nickname2}? How are things going on your side?
11011908.Subtitle: ? How are things going on your side?

11011909.ContentEN: Simon sacrificed himself. Thanks to him, I managed to save the rest.
11011909.Subtitle: Simon sacrificed himself. Thanks to him, I managed to save the rest.

11011910.ContentEN: We also met a few Charon refugees enslaved by The Forsakens. They led us here.
11011910.Subtitle: We also met a few Charon refugees enslaved by The Forsakens. They led us here.

11011911.ContentEN: Refugees? Not Forsakens rebels in disguise, I hope.
11011911.Subtitle: Refugees? Not Forsakens rebels in disguise, I hope.

11011912.ContentEN: That's why I asked the soldiers to keep an eye on them. If they are indeed civilians, they'd be safer with us. If they turn out to be from the Forsakens, we'll detain them and bring them back to the capital.
11011912.Subtitle: That's why I asked the soldiers to keep an eye on them. If they are indeed civilians, they'd be safer with us. If they turn out to be from the Forsakens, we'll detain them and bring them back to the capital.

11011913.ContentEN: In that case, the ambushing Forsakens may think twice about attacking for fear of harming their fellows. Mm, you made a smart decision.
11011913.Subtitle: In that case, the ambushing Forsakens may think twice about attacking for fear of harming their fellows. Mm, you made a smart decision.

11011914.ContentEN: As for this side... Our reinforcements met a problem on the way here and can't make it... And we're ordered to continue the mission.
11011914.Subtitle: As for this side... Our reinforcements met a problem on the way here and can't make it... And we're ordered to continue the mission.

11011916.ContentEN: ...Look on the bright side, the mission is almost done. Knock out everything that gets in the way, breach the central control room, insert the key, we reclaim access, and then mission accomplished. That's all that stands between us and home.
11011916.Subtitle: ...Look on the bright side, the mission is almost done. Knock out everything that gets in the way, breach the central control room, insert the key, we reclaim access, and then mission accomplished. That's all that stands between us and home.

11011917.ContentEN: ...So the first thing to do now is disable the barrier up ahead, right? How does this cannon work?
11011917.Subtitle: ...So the first thing to do now is disable the barrier up ahead, right? How does this cannon work?

11011918.ContentEN: The cannon just ran out of Phoxichor primers. I was about to—
11011918.Subtitle: The cannon just ran out of Phoxichor primers. I was about to—

11011920.ContentEN: It sounds like you need Phoxichor. I know where the nearest storage is. I can take you there.
11011920.Subtitle: It sounds like you need Phoxichor. I know where the nearest storage is. I can take you there.

11011923.ContentEN: ...You still don't trust me? Even after I brought you here safely?
11011923.Subtitle: ...You still don't trust me? Even after I brought you here safely?

11011926.ContentEN: Allow me to carry that for you, sir. I've done all kinds of heavy work and have great strength.
11011926.Subtitle: Allow me to carry that for you, sir. I've done all kinds of heavy work and have great strength.

11011927.ContentEN: ...Er, sure you don't want my help...?
11011927.Subtitle: ...Er, sure you don't want my help...?

11011928.ContentEN: The Phoxichor is beautiful, all clear and shimmering.
11011928.Subtitle: The Phoxichor is beautiful, all clear and shimmering.

11011929.ContentEN: If only it wasn't used for killing people.
11011929.Subtitle: If only it wasn't used for killing people.

11011932.ContentEN: Sir, does that mean we're going home soon?
11011932.Subtitle: Sir, does that mean we're going home soon?

11011934.ContentEN: If I make it back alive, I'm going to a fashion boutique to buy all the dresses I've dreamed of.
11011934.Subtitle: If I make it back alive, I'm going to a fashion boutique to buy all the dresses I've dreamed of.

11011935.ContentEN: And it would be nice to have a pair of pretty stockings, too.
11011935.Subtitle: And it would be nice to have a pair of pretty stockings, too.

11011936.ContentEN: The trouble is, though, we can't open the door to the central control room from the outside...
11011936.Subtitle: The trouble is, though, we can't open the door to the central control room from the outside...

11011937.ContentEN: That's why you're adjusting this cannon now...
11011937.Subtitle: That's why you're adjusting this cannon now...

11011938.ContentEN: Exactly. But the power to the entire fortress has been cut off, we need to get this thing there first.
11011938.Subtitle: Exactly. But the power to the entire fortress has been cut off, we need to get this thing there first.

11011939.ContentEN: Sir, we've found some Phoxichor Canisters at a nearby warehouse, and got them connected to the remaining Phoxynamo Wheels as you instructed.
11011939.Subtitle: Sir, we've found some Phoxichor Canisters at a nearby warehouse, and got them connected to the remaining Phoxynamo Wheels as you instructed.

11011940.ContentEN: Excellent. That should be enough to move this cannon near the central control room.
11011940.Subtitle: Excellent. That should be enough to move this cannon near the central control room.

11012001.ContentEN: Well done. Now let's move the cannon to an optimal spot to bombard the central control room.
11012001.Subtitle: Well done. Now let's move the cannon to an optimal spot to bombard the central control room.

11012002.ContentEN: Thanks to the help of these two refugees.
11012002.Subtitle: Thanks to the help of these two refugees.

11012003.ContentEN: Keep the cannon from the Filthoids.
11012003.Subtitle: Keep the cannon from the Filthoids.

11012004.ContentEN: Let's find an optimal spot to bombard the barrier of the central area. Stay vigilant and protect the turret from the Filthoids.
11012004.Subtitle: Let's find an optimal spot to bombard the barrier of the central area. Stay vigilant and protect the turret from the Filthoids.

11012101.ContentEN: We have a clear view from here. This is our stop.
11012101.Subtitle: We have a clear view from here. This is our stop.

11012102.ContentEN: Next, we'll use the Phoxichor cannon to blow apart the barrier ahead.
11012102.Subtitle: Next, we'll use the Phoxichor cannon to blow apart the barrier ahead.

11012103.ContentEN: Some Filthoids picked up the scent. Just fire away.
11012103.Subtitle: Some Filthoids picked up the scent. Just fire away.

11012105.ContentEN: Took a Phoxichor cannon shot with barely a dent. Those guys at the Aeolipile have some real skills...
11012105.Subtitle: Took a Phoxichor cannon shot with barely a dent. Those guys at the Aeolipile have some real skills...

11012106.ContentEN: Don't stop, keep firing! Use the high explosive shells!
11012106.Subtitle: Don't stop, keep firing! Use the high explosive shells!

11012107.ContentEN: Even if we fail to tear down the barrier, continious fire can force the enemies from the inside to open the gate themselves.
11012107.Subtitle: Even if we fail to tear down the barrier, continious fire can force the enemies from the inside to open the gate themselves.

11012108.ContentEN: Someone's running out from the side gate — it's the Forsakens!
11012108.Subtitle: Someone's running out from the side gate — it's the Forsakens!

11012109.ContentEN: That should do it. Let's go check it out.
11012109.Subtitle: That should do it. Let's go check it out.

11012110.ContentEN: Hey, quit fooling around. Get over here!
11012110.Subtitle: Hey, quit fooling around. Get over here!

11012201.ContentEN: They've actually opened the gate from the inside...
11012201.Subtitle: They've actually opened the gate from the inside...

11012202.ContentEN: The blast impact was far stronger inside. They would've perished had they not opened it.
11012202.Subtitle: The blast impact was far stronger inside. They would've perished had they not opened it.

11012203.ContentEN: Captain {nickname2} and I are taking the lead. Everyone else, fall in behind us!
11012203.Subtitle: Captain  and I are taking the lead. Everyone else, fall in behind us!

11012303.ContentEN: Easy, sir. I'm just doing some preparation—
11012303.Subtitle: Easy, sir. I'm just doing some preparation—

11012401.ContentEN: You crazy girl! What are you laughing at? Is this how you repay the Captain's kindness? Don't you feel guilty at all?
11012401.Subtitle: You crazy girl! What are you laughing at? Is this how you repay the Captain's kindness? Don't you feel guilty at all?

11012402.ContentEN: Guilty...? Ha, have you had too many alchemical concoctions from your Academy that damaged your brain?
11012402.Subtitle: Guilty...? Ha, have you had too many alchemical concoctions from your Academy that damaged your brain?

11012403.ContentEN: Oh wait, I do feel guilty about one thing — to manipulate that stupid captain of yours, I lied about The Forsakens and blamed them for what the Empire did to us. I'm so sorry to The Forsakens!
11012403.Subtitle: Oh wait, I do feel guilty about one thing — to manipulate that stupid captain of yours, I lied about The Forsakens and blamed them for what the Empire did to us. I'm so sorry to The Forsakens!

11012405.ContentEN: Oh, look what the cat dragged in. Hello, dear sir.
11012405.Subtitle: Oh, look what the cat dragged in. Hello, dear sir.

11012407.ContentEN: So what are you doing here? Come to show off the benevolence of a Hyperborean officer? Or perhaps you pity this poor girl who's been led \"astray,\" trying to save me from my \"sins\"?
11012407.Subtitle: So what are you doing here? Come to show off the benevolence of a Hyperborean officer? Or perhaps you pity this poor girl who's been led \"astray,\" trying to save me from my \"sins\"?

11012408.ContentEN: Oh, I get it! You want to join The Forsakens, right? Need a reference?
11012408.Subtitle: Oh, I get it! You want to join The Forsakens, right? Need a reference?

11012409.ContentEN: Hey — you guys hear that? Your captain wants to join The Forsakens!
11012409.Subtitle: Hey — you guys hear that? Your captain wants to join The Forsakens!

11012410.ContentEN: Save it. No one would give you any attention.
11012410.Subtitle: Save it. No one would give you any attention.

11012411.ContentEN: Oh, no. This is so sad. Boohoo whoo.
11012411.Subtitle: Oh, no. This is so sad. Boohoo whoo.

11012412.ContentEN: Yeah, I'm interested. Who's your contact?
11012412.Subtitle: Yeah, I'm interested. Who's your contact?

11012413.ContentEN: Oh honey, you really suck at this. Save it — you won't get anything from me. Lowlives who betray their comrades and sell intel to their enemy only exist in your beloved Legion.
11012413.Subtitle: Oh honey, you really suck at this. Save it — you won't get anything from me. Lowlives who betray their comrades and sell intel to their enemy only exist in your beloved Legion.

11012414.ContentEN: You had many chances for an ambush. Why played the long game?
11012414.Subtitle: You had many chances for an ambush. Why played the long game?

11012415.ContentEN: Because you're always so on guard. I couldn't find a chance, even while we were alone. I had to bide my time patiently. Even offered you help a couple of times to lower your guard.
11012415.Subtitle: Because you're always so on guard. I couldn't find a chance, even while we were alone. I had to bide my time patiently. Even offered you help a couple of times to lower your guard.

11012416.ContentEN: And it's more fun this way! Betrayal by a trusted friend is far more memorable than a stab from a stranger, isn't it?
11012416.Subtitle: And it's more fun this way! Betrayal by a trusted friend is far more memorable than a stab from a stranger, isn't it?

11012417.ContentEN: (Give her a punch to shut her up)
11012417.Subtitle: (Give her a punch to shut her up)

11012418.ContentEN: Oww, it hurts! Someone do something about this! An armed soldier's hitting a helpless young girl!
11012418.Subtitle: Oww, it hurts! Someone do something about this! An armed soldier's hitting a helpless young girl!

11012420.ContentEN: Aww, you look like an angry bull. I'm so sorry, sir! I forgot you like it better when I talk like this.
11012420.Subtitle: Aww, you look like an angry bull. I'm so sorry, sir! I forgot you like it better when I talk like this.

11012421.ContentEN: ...Cut the act, and answer my question.
11012421.Subtitle: ...Cut the act, and answer my question.

11012422.ContentEN: Sure! Ask away. I'll answer whenever I feel like it.
11012422.Subtitle: Sure! Ask away. I'll answer whenever I feel like it.
