11012423.ContentEN: I deserve to know why you stabbed us in the back after I helped you. Is it out of plain hatred for the Hyperborean Legion, or an assassination attempt targeting me specifically?
11012423.Subtitle: I deserve to know why you stabbed us in the back after I helped you. Is it out of plain hatred for the Hyperborean Legion, or an assassination attempt targeting me specifically?

11012424.ContentEN: If this is your question... Sure, I can answer that — given that you've been naive enough to fall for my trick.
11012424.Subtitle: If this is your question... Sure, I can answer that — given that you've been naive enough to fall for my trick.

11012425.ContentEN: The Forsakens simply want all Hyperborean dogs to die here, and preferably at the hands of the killing machines they created — I hope you enjoyed our fiery gift.
11012425.Subtitle: The Forsakens simply want all Hyperborean dogs to die here, and preferably at the hands of the killing machines they created — I hope you enjoyed our fiery gift.

11012426.ContentEN: As for me... Well, I personally came for <H>you</>!
11012426.Subtitle: As for me... Well, I personally came for you!

11012427.ContentEN: I heard that you, the top graduate of the Imperial Military College, who is also known as the \"Pale Reaper,\" were coming to Lonza Fortress. How could I not come have a good look at the Pale Reaper myself?
11012427.Subtitle: I heard that you, the top graduate of the Imperial Military College, who is also known as the \"Pale Reaper,\" were coming to Lonza Fortress. How could I not come have a good look at the Pale Reaper myself?

11012428.ContentEN: You've heard about me? Have we met before?
11012428.Subtitle: You've heard about me? Have we met before?

11012429.ContentEN: Hehe, that's for you to guess.
11012429.Subtitle: Hehe, that's for you to guess.

11012430.ContentEN: My sources said that our great {性别2:Mr|Miss} Pale Reaper only has a few years' worth of memories. You know nothing of your past. You don't even know where you came from.
11012430.Subtitle: My sources said that our great {性别2:Mr|Miss} Pale Reaper only has a few years' worth of memories. You know nothing of your past. You don't even know where you came from.

11012432.ContentEN: Let's play a game then! Now, honey, take a guess — was I your neighbour, an old nemesis—
11012432.Subtitle: Let's play a game then! Now, honey, take a guess — was I your neighbour, an old nemesis—

11012433.ContentEN: Or a complete stranger? Maybe I just hate you for being one of Hyperborea's honorable people, and I simply wish to destroy that which they cherish?
11012433.Subtitle: Or a complete stranger? Maybe I just hate you for being one of Hyperborea's honorable people, and I simply wish to destroy that which they cherish?

11012435.ContentEN: <W>Your head hurts, right? The jabbering of this mad girl is worming through your skull like a leech sucking at your brains.</>
11012435.Subtitle: Your head hurts, right? The jabbering of this mad girl is worming through your skull like a leech sucking at your brains.

11012436.ContentEN: <W>See, you have a sword in your hand. That's right — it's the one you've wielded in countless battles. The hilt still carries your warmth. You're familiar with the slick feeling and the subtle tug of resistance when its blade slices through flesh.</>
11012436.Subtitle: See, you have a sword in your hand. That's right — it's the one you've wielded in countless battles. The hilt still carries your warmth. You're familiar with the slick feeling and the subtle tug of resistance when its blade slices through flesh.

11012437.ContentEN: <W>You can easily slit this creature's throat and make its detestable lips gurgle and whimper in pain.</>
11012437.Subtitle: You can easily slit this creature's throat and make its detestable lips gurgle and whimper in pain.

11012440.ContentEN: (Follow the voice and reach for the sword)
11012440.Subtitle: (Follow the voice and reach for the sword)

11012441.ContentEN: Why suddenly so quiet? You seemed ready to lecture me. Cat got your tongue, honey?
11012441.Subtitle: Why suddenly so quiet? You seemed ready to lecture me. Cat got your tongue, honey?

11012442.ContentEN: <W>I am the origin of your soul, the impulse within the deepest recesses of your mind. Do not refuse me... Listen — I am the one who gave you power and made you invincible in battle.</>
11012442.Subtitle: I am the origin of your soul, the impulse within the deepest recesses of your mind. Do not refuse me... Listen — I am the one who gave you power and made you invincible in battle.

11012443.ContentEN: <W>Unsheathe your sword, the one that bears the killing razor.</>
11012443.Subtitle: Unsheathe your sword, the one that bears the killing razor.

11012445.ContentEN: (Follow the voice and try to draw the sword)
11012445.Subtitle: (Follow the voice and try to draw the sword)

11012446.ContentEN: Go on, make your guess — any guess would do, because I won't tell you the truth anyway!
11012446.Subtitle: Go on, make your guess — any guess would do, because I won't tell you the truth anyway!

11012447.ContentEN: <W>Do not hesitate! Use your sword! It's calling to you! It thirsts for the sweet joy that can only be sated by flesh and blood.</>
11012447.Subtitle: Do not hesitate! Use your sword! It's calling to you! It thirsts for the sweet joy that can only be sated by flesh and blood.

11012448.ContentEN: <W>Quick! Silence this mad lass for good!</>
11012448.Subtitle: Quick! Silence this mad lass for good!

11012450.ContentEN: (Follow the voice and wield the sword)
11012450.Subtitle: (Follow the voice and wield the sword)

11012452.ContentEN: ...Okay, looks like somebody needs anger management here.
11012452.Subtitle: ...Okay, looks like somebody needs anger management here.

11012453.ContentEN: ...Leon, keep a close watch on her. Bring her back in one piece, and make sure she doesn't harm herself. Use Frank as leverage if necessary.
11012453.Subtitle: ...Leon, keep a close watch on her. Bring her back in one piece, and make sure she doesn't harm herself. Use Frank as leverage if necessary.

11012456.ContentEN: Remember what I said back on our way to the turret? \"Your kindness will reap a just reward.\"
11012456.Subtitle: Remember what I said back on our way to the turret? \"Your kindness will reap a just reward.\"

11012457.ContentEN: Lend me your ear. I've got a secret that's just for you. Rest assured, you've just frisked me. I am really out of weapons.
11012457.Subtitle: Lend me your ear. I've got a secret that's just for you. Rest assured, you've just frisked me. I am really out of weapons.

11012458.ContentEN: It may be extremely important to you. You sure you don't want to hear it?
11012458.Subtitle: It may be extremely important to you. You sure you don't want to hear it?

11012461.ContentEN: Hehe, fine. I hope you won't regret your choice.
11012461.Subtitle: Hehe, fine. I hope you won't regret your choice.

11012463.ContentEN: <W>Someone in your Legion wants you dead.</>
11012463.Subtitle: Someone in your Legion wants you dead.

11012465.ContentEN: Secrets are meant to be whispered once. Take care, sir.
11012465.Subtitle: Secrets are meant to be whispered once. Take care, sir.

11012466.ContentEN: You're back, honey. Changed your mind already? Desperate to hear out the secret?
11012466.Subtitle: You're back, honey. Changed your mind already? Desperate to hear out the secret?

11012467.ContentEN: Sorry to disappoint, but I'm no longer in the mood for sharing.
11012467.Subtitle: Sorry to disappoint, but I'm no longer in the mood for sharing.

11012468.ContentEN: I know what you want, honey.
11012468.Subtitle: I know what you want, honey.

11012469.ContentEN: But I'm just a poor little captive now, not in the mood to talk.
11012469.Subtitle: But I'm just a poor little captive now, not in the mood to talk.

11012501.ContentEN: <W>That's right — you've made the right choice. Grip the hilt tightly. Yes, just like that. Now aim at the creature's throat...</>
11012501.Subtitle: That's right — you've made the right choice. Grip the hilt tightly. Yes, just like that. Now aim at the creature's throat...

11012503.Subtitle: Yes, do it. Do not hesitate.

11012506.ContentEN: <W>This one too. The old fool is just dead weight.</>
11012506.Subtitle: This one too. The old fool is just dead weight.

11012509.ContentEN: <W>That's right! Forget about meaningless reason. Just follow my lead...</>
11012509.Subtitle: That's right! Forget about meaningless reason. Just follow my lead...

11012510.ContentEN: Captain! Commander Avar! The Captain's gone mad! Stay away from me! Help! STOP! NOOOO!
11012510.Subtitle: Captain! Commander Avar! The Captain's gone mad! Stay away from me! Help! STOP! NOOOO!

11012602.ContentEN: No, not dead silent. It's just that every noise had coalesced into a warmth flowing down my arms, dripping to the floor.
11012602.Subtitle: No, not dead silent. It's just that every noise had coalesced into a warmth flowing down my arms, dripping to the floor.

11012603.ContentEN: It was the sound of passing time, the roar of life that once was, the heartbeat of an embryo, and an ancient echo sealed deeply within my heart.
11012603.Subtitle: It was the sound of passing time, the roar of life that once was, the heartbeat of an embryo, and an ancient echo sealed deeply within my heart.

11012604.ContentEN: I felt as though I had become one with this primal voice.
11012604.Subtitle: I felt as though I had become one with this primal voice.

11012608.ContentEN: What's gotten into you? You scared me!
11012608.Subtitle: What's gotten into you? You scared me!

11012701.ContentEN: I doubt Fulvis will bring reinforcements anytime soon.
11012701.Subtitle: I doubt Fulvis will bring reinforcements anytime soon.

11012702.ContentEN: The central control room is just ahead. Should we push forward? The Messenger of The Forsakens might be inside...
11012702.Subtitle: The central control room is just ahead. Should we push forward? The Messenger of The Forsakens might be inside...

11012703.ContentEN: I'm not sure how many assassins like her are waiting for us.
11012703.Subtitle: I'm not sure how many assassins like her are waiting for us.

11012704.ContentEN: Yes, death is a real possibility — for you, me, and probably all of us.
11012704.Subtitle: Yes, death is a real possibility — for you, me, and probably all of us.

11012706.ContentEN: Soldiers of the 13th Legion! Before us lies the central control room of Lonza Fortress, the ultimate goal of this mission. This is our chance to claim glory for Hyperborea.
11012706.Subtitle: Soldiers of the 13th Legion! Before us lies the central control room of Lonza Fortress, the ultimate goal of this mission. This is our chance to claim glory for Hyperborea.

11012707.ContentEN: However, I must apologize, as I won't be giving you the lion's share of this victory.
11012707.Subtitle: However, I must apologize, as I won't be giving you the lion's share of this victory.

11012709.ContentEN: With glory comes great danger, and this action is more dangerous than ever.
11012709.Subtitle: With glory comes great danger, and this action is more dangerous than ever.

11012710.ContentEN: You're young, with many years ahead. There will be other opportunities for glory. But today, the old man here will seek one more medal, and he isn't keen on sharing it with any of you.
11012710.Subtitle: You're young, with many years ahead. There will be other opportunities for glory. But today, the old man here will seek one more medal, and he isn't keen on sharing it with any of you.

11012711.ContentEN: Stay at your posts by the turret. If you lose contact with me, continue to shell the control room from a distance and wait for reinforcements. Do not assault it directly.
11012711.Subtitle: Stay at your posts by the turret. If you lose contact with me, continue to shell the control room from a distance and wait for reinforcements. Do not assault it directly.

11012712.ContentEN: Commander Avar, you can't do this alone... I know you didn't mean what you just said.
11012712.Subtitle: Commander Avar, you can't do this alone... I know you didn't mean what you just said.

11012713.ContentEN: What are you talking about? I just simply gave you orders.
11012713.Subtitle: What are you talking about? I just simply gave you orders.

11012715.ContentEN: I understand your concerns, but I've been through a lot things like this. I was once like you, young and tearful, thinking my commanding officer had a death wish.
11012715.Subtitle: I understand your concerns, but I've been through a lot things like this. I was once like you, young and tearful, thinking my commanding officer had a death wish.

11012716.ContentEN: But he always returned safely. So I'm telling you that there's no need to worry. Think of your mother, probably by the fireplace knitting a sweater, waiting for you to come home.
11012716.Subtitle: But he always returned safely. So I'm telling you that there's no need to worry. Think of your mother, probably by the fireplace knitting a sweater, waiting for you to come home.

11012717.ContentEN: Commander Avar, you've always looked out for me, and you just saved my life. Even if my mother were here, she would say, \"Follow your officer, do not fear death. You're a Hyperborean warrior and you're supposed to defend the Empire with your life.\"
11012717.Subtitle: Commander Avar, you've always looked out for me, and you just saved my life. Even if my mother were here, she would say, \"Follow your officer, do not fear death. You're a Hyperborean warrior and you're supposed to defend the Empire with your life.\"

11012718.ContentEN: It's not about fearing death. I just don't want any lives lost in vain.
11012718.Subtitle: It's not about fearing death. I just don't want any lives lost in vain.

11012719.ContentEN: It won't be in vain. Every step we take pushes the frontline forward.
11012719.Subtitle: It won't be in vain. Every step we take pushes the frontline forward.

11012720.ContentEN: And since we don't know what lies before us, it means that survival is also a possibility.
11012720.Subtitle: And since we don't know what lies before us, it means that survival is also a possibility.

11012721.ContentEN: I'm a Griffin and I stand with Captain {nickname2}.
11012721.Subtitle: I'm a Griffin and I stand with Captain .

11012722.ContentEN: Yeah! I heard that loud and clear this time! I stand with Captain {nickname2}!
11012722.Subtitle: Yeah! I heard that loud and clear this time! I stand with Captain !

11012724.ContentEN: ...Well, since we have {nickname2}, maybe {性别2:he|she} does have what it takes to lead us to victory.
11012724.Subtitle: ...Well, since we have , maybe {性别2:he|she} does have what it takes to lead us to victory.

11012725.ContentEN: Alright, prepare yourselves. We set off together.
11012725.Subtitle: Alright, prepare yourselves. We set off together.

11012726.ContentEN: Heh, you've even learned how to take over your commander's speech.
11012726.Subtitle: Heh, you've even learned how to take over your commander's speech.

11012727.ContentEN: Maybe we could wait for a while to gather more intel from this lass first—
11012727.Subtitle: Maybe we could wait for a while to gather more intel from this lass first—

11012728.ContentEN: Oh? Are you going to interrogate me?
11012728.Subtitle: Oh? Are you going to interrogate me?

11012729.ContentEN: No. I've seen how crafty this girl is. Her \"intel\" will only mess with our judgment.
11012729.Subtitle: No. I've seen how crafty this girl is. Her \"intel\" will only mess with our judgment.

11012730.ContentEN: Here's the plan: we split into two groups. {nickname2} and I will scout ahead. The rest prepare and initiate the assault upon our signal. If we call it off, retreat to Turret 4. Leon, you stay back and guard the captives.
11012730.Subtitle: Here's the plan: we split into two groups.  and I will scout ahead. The rest prepare and initiate the assault upon our signal. If we call it off, retreat to Turret 4. Leon, you stay back and guard the captives.

11012732.ContentEN: Let's move, and see what surprises The Forsakens have prepared for us.
11012732.Subtitle: Let's move, and see what surprises The Forsakens have prepared for us.

11012802.ContentEN: Just a scratch; it'll heal soon. That little girl was just bluffing. Even a stray cat would've put up a better fight.
11012802.Subtitle: Just a scratch; it'll heal soon. That little girl was just bluffing. Even a stray cat would've put up a better fight.

11012803.ContentEN: Ugh, where did it go? I thought I had it right here...
11012803.Subtitle: Ugh, where did it go? I thought I had it right here...

11012805.ContentEN: Just a mere photo. Why don't you go interrogate that girl? She seems to be after you.
11012805.Subtitle: Just a mere photo. Why don't you go interrogate that girl? She seems to be after you.

11012806.ContentEN: (A photo? Maybe I should have a look around for it when I can.)
11012806.Subtitle: (A photo? Maybe I should have a look around for it when I can.)

11012808.ContentEN: Hmm? What's that on the floor...?
11012808.Subtitle: Hmm? What's that on the floor...?

11012809.ContentEN: It's a younger Sir Avar with… Daphne?
11012809.Subtitle: It's a younger Sir Avar with… Daphne?

11012810.ContentEN: I should take it back to Sir Avar.
11012810.Subtitle: I should take it back to Sir Avar.

11012812.ContentEN: Oh, you found it! Thanks for bringing it back.
11012812.Subtitle: Oh, you found it! Thanks for bringing it back.

11012814.ContentEN: Oh, ah... She is just my neighbour's little girl. Haha...
11012814.Subtitle: Oh, ah... She is just my neighbour's little girl. Haha...

11012815.ContentEN: ...I suppose it's time for the truth — You're right. Daphne is my daughter.
11012815.Subtitle: ...I suppose it's time for the truth — You're right. Daphne is my daughter.

11012816.ContentEN: This is the last photo we took together before she and her mother left. Daphne took the last name \"Theodore\" from her mother.
11012816.Subtitle: This is the last photo we took together before she and her mother left. Daphne took the last name \"Theodore\" from her mother.

11012817.ContentEN: Don't tell anyone about this. We divorced specifically to keep people from knowing that Daphne is my daughter.
11012817.Subtitle: Don't tell anyone about this. We divorced specifically to keep people from knowing that Daphne is my daughter.

11012818.ContentEN: The chief alchemist thinks very highly of Daphne and believes she has what it takes to become the Empire's top alchemist. He'd sworn off taking more apprentices, but he made an exception for this kid.
11012818.Subtitle: The chief alchemist thinks very highly of Daphne and believes she has what it takes to become the Empire's top alchemist. He'd sworn off taking more apprentices, but he made an exception for this kid.

11012820.ContentEN: She's talented, but it's more than that. The Spathatoi is never short on talent. The chief alchemist said Daphne has a unique gift that sets her apart.
11012820.Subtitle: She's talented, but it's more than that. The Spathatoi is never short on talent. The chief alchemist said Daphne has a unique gift that sets her apart.

11012821.ContentEN: I don't quite understand what he meant by that, but it's clear that Daphne has a promising future. So, we must not let a Charon father stand in her way — at least that's what her mother thought.
11012821.Subtitle: I don't quite understand what he meant by that, but it's clear that Daphne has a promising future. So, we must not let a Charon father stand in her way — at least that's what her mother thought.

11012823.ContentEN: No. She has a heart of gold and adores her old man. How can I tell her?
11012823.Subtitle: No. She has a heart of gold and adores her old man. How can I tell her?

11012824.ContentEN: So, I play the part of a bad father who's done with family life. And when Daphne calls me dad, I tell her, \"Zip it. I'm not your father. Address me as your superior officer.\"
11012824.Subtitle: So, I play the part of a bad father who's done with family life. And when Daphne calls me dad, I tell her, \"Zip it. I'm not your father. Address me as your superior officer.\"

11012825.ContentEN: But Daphne's such a sweet kid. She couldn't bring herself to curse at me, and always ended up blaming herself instead.
11012825.Subtitle: But Daphne's such a sweet kid. She couldn't bring herself to curse at me, and always ended up blaming herself instead.

11012826.ContentEN: Actually, she doesn't like the Academy. Perhaps you and the missus should also take her preferences into consideration.
11012826.Subtitle: Actually, she doesn't like the Academy. Perhaps you and the missus should also take her preferences into consideration.

11012827.ContentEN: I knew about that already. Daphne volunteered to join the Lonza Fortress mission and refused to be dissuaded by her mother. She even submitted her application to Fulvis behind my back. That girl was dead set on quitting the Academy.
11012827.Subtitle: I knew about that already. Daphne volunteered to join the Lonza Fortress mission and refused to be dissuaded by her mother. She even submitted her application to Fulvis behind my back. That girl was dead set on quitting the Academy.

11012828.ContentEN: ...I'll talk to her mother about this when we return.
11012828.Subtitle: ...I'll talk to her mother about this when we return.

11012829.ContentEN: You've made a huge sacrifice... You're a good father.
11012829.Subtitle: You've made a huge sacrifice... You're a good father.

11012830.ContentEN: ...I'd rather her resent me if it spares her any pain.
11012830.Subtitle: ...I'd rather her resent me if it spares her any pain.

11012831.ContentEN: If we make it back, I'll take her to the opera house. When I was just a grunt, I never got the chance to take her to any fancy places. I guess it's time to make it up to her.
11012831.Subtitle: If we make it back, I'll take her to the opera house. When I was just a grunt, I never got the chance to take her to any fancy places. I guess it's time to make it up to her.

11012832.ContentEN: I heard there's a new show in Dismania, coming from the northern province of Cocytus. It's called \"something... in the Snowfield\"... You know what — why don't you come along? I'll buy an extra ticket.
11012832.Subtitle: I heard there's a new show in Dismania, coming from the northern province of Cocytus. It's called \"something... in the Snowfield\"... You know what — why don't you come along? I'll buy an extra ticket.

11012901.ContentEN: These ones are tough to deal with. Be cautious!
11012901.Subtitle: These ones are tough to deal with. Be cautious!

11012903.ContentEN: Wait... The defence system here is off?
11012903.Subtitle: Wait... The defence system here is off?

11012904.ContentEN: The central control room is empty... Has the Messenger left already?
11012904.Subtitle: The central control room is empty... Has the Messenger left already?

11012905.ContentEN: {nickname2}, something's off here. The original blueprints of the fortress show this room should have the strongest defence system, including a self-destruct mechanism.
11012905.Subtitle: , something's off here. The original blueprints of the fortress show this room should have the strongest defence system, including a self-destruct mechanism.

11012906.ContentEN: But they've only locked the door, and there's no sign of any defence systems engaging. What do you make of this?
11012906.Subtitle: But they've only locked the door, and there's no sign of any defence systems engaging. What do you make of this?

11012907.ContentEN: Probably a ruse to lower our guard. There might be other traps.
11012907.Subtitle: Probably a ruse to lower our guard. There might be other traps.

11012908.ContentEN: They probably predicted we would be extra cautious around this place, so they cleverly concealed their real traps.
11012908.Subtitle: They probably predicted we would be extra cautious around this place, so they cleverly concealed their real traps.

11012909.ContentEN: True. The central control room is key to regaining control of the fortress. It doesn't add up that they'd leave it undefended after all the elaborate traps we've encountered.
11012909.Subtitle: True. The central control room is key to regaining control of the fortress. It doesn't add up that they'd leave it undefended after all the elaborate traps we've encountered.

11012910.ContentEN: Maybe we're overthinking it. Perhaps The Forsakens never figured out how to operate the controls in this room.
11012910.Subtitle: Maybe we're overthinking it. Perhaps The Forsakens never figured out how to operate the controls in this room.

11012911.ContentEN: But given the number of traps they've set up along the way, it seems unlikely they'd ignore this crucial area.
11012911.Subtitle: But given the number of traps they've set up along the way, it seems unlikely they'd ignore this crucial area.

11012912.ContentEN: Trap or not, we have our objectives. Proceed with caution and stay mission-focused.
11012912.Subtitle: Trap or not, we have our objectives. Proceed with caution and stay mission-focused.

11012913.ContentEN: I'm about to access the fortress's control panel with my key. If all goes well, that should complete our mission.
11012913.Subtitle: I'm about to access the fortress's control panel with my key. If all goes well, that should complete our mission.

11012914.ContentEN: Understood. I'll take a look around for anything suspicious.
11012914.Subtitle: Understood. I'll take a look around for anything suspicious.

11012915.ContentEN: Be careful, there may be more enemies inside.
11012915.Subtitle: Be careful, there may be more enemies inside.

11013001.ContentEN: \"The 13th Legion will attack in two days. Antonius Fulvis has vowed before Sibylle that if his forces fail to breach the fortress, he would shoot himself with his own gun. Sibylle then assigned him the best troops.\"
11013001.Subtitle: \"The 13th Legion will attack in two days. Antonius Fulvis has vowed before Sibylle that if his forces fail to breach the fortress, he would shoot himself with his own gun. Sibylle then assigned him the best troops.\"

11013002.ContentEN: \"The Legion will do everything they can to take Lonza Fortress back. We should not attempt to defend the Fortress against such odds. Withdraw our forces and ensure the survival of The Forsakens.\"
11013002.Subtitle: \"The Legion will do everything they can to take Lonza Fortress back. We should not attempt to defend the Fortress against such odds. Withdraw our forces and ensure the survival of The Forsakens.\"

11013003.ContentEN: \"Merely retreating would squander a perfect opportunity. We should make the Hyperboreans pay dearly.\"
11013003.Subtitle: \"Merely retreating would squander a perfect opportunity. We should make the Hyperboreans pay dearly.\"

11013004.ContentEN: \"Easy. Leave it to Avar. He'll be commanding two vanguard squads in the operation. Those fools always listen to him.\"
11013004.Subtitle: \"Easy. Leave it to Avar. He'll be commanding two vanguard squads in the operation. Those fools always listen to him.\"

11013005.ContentEN: \"Avar will hold off their assault. Use this time to lay traps and fortify our defences. The fortress will become their graveyard.\"
11013005.Subtitle: \"Avar will hold off their assault. Use this time to lay traps and fortify our defences. The fortress will become their graveyard.\"

11013006.ContentEN: \"We'll soon read this headline in the news—\"
11013006.Subtitle: \"We'll soon read this headline in the news—\"

11013007.ContentEN: \"'During the battle in Lonza Fortress, the 13th Legion valiantly defended the Emperor's lands. The vanguard suffered ninety percent casualties in the fierce conflict...'\"
11013007.Subtitle: \"'During the battle in Lonza Fortress, the 13th Legion valiantly defended the Emperor's lands. The vanguard suffered ninety percent casualties in the fierce conflict...'\"

11013008.ContentEN: \"'Lieutenant Colonel Avar, one of the survivors, mourned the fallen and delivered a eulogy of unmatched honour.'\"
11013008.Subtitle: \"'Lieutenant Colonel Avar, one of the survivors, mourned the fallen and delivered a eulogy of unmatched honour.'\"

11013009.ContentEN: \"Good for Avar! Let's go with this plan then. Shame those dead dogs will receive posthumous honours, though.\"
11013009.Subtitle: \"Good for Avar! Let's go with this plan then. Shame those dead dogs will receive posthumous honours, though.\"

11013101.ContentEN: \"Charons like us can no longer stand Hyperborean tyranny.\"
11013101.Subtitle: \"Charons like us can no longer stand Hyperborean tyranny.\"

11013102.ContentEN: \"I hereby pledge my allegiance to The Forsakens. The Empire must be held accountable for its actions.\"
11013102.Subtitle: \"I hereby pledge my allegiance to The Forsakens. The Empire must be held accountable for its actions.\"

11013202.Content: 我刚刚检修了通往中控室的升降机，发现升降机的零件遭到了破坏，需要备用零件才能启动。

11013203.Content: 阿瓦尔长官受了伤在休息，莱昂在看管那个疯女人。得麻烦你一下，帮我一起找一下备用零件。

11013205.Content: 多谢队长。加上我找到的这些，应该已经够了。

11013206.Content: 请稍等，我去修一下升降机。

11013403.ContentEN: Good afternoon, Lieutenant Colonel Avar Hrodland! Motto 16 of the Hyperborean Legion: When you have the enemy within range, beware that you are also within theirs...
11013403.Subtitle: Good afternoon, Lieutenant Colonel Avar Hrodland! Motto 16 of the Hyperborean Legion: When you have the enemy within range, beware that you are also within theirs...

11013405.ContentEN: Whew, of all the battles I've fought, none has been as nerve-wracking as this! Ha, I thought I might never see Daphne and Claudia again.
11013405.Subtitle: Whew, of all the battles I've fought, none has been as nerve-wracking as this! Ha, I thought I might never see Daphne and Claudia again.

11013406.ContentEN: Strange. I've got the operational clearance… How come it's not working? What about you? Found anything unusual?
11013406.Subtitle: Strange. I've got the operational clearance… How come it's not working? What about you? Found anything unusual?

11013407.ContentEN: Hmm? You look like you've seen a ghost. What's wrong?
11013407.Subtitle: Hmm? You look like you've seen a ghost. What's wrong?

11013409.ContentEN: (The recording, the signed document... and this man in front of me — my mentor on hand-to-hand combat and battle tactics, my superior who always looks out for me...)
11013409.Subtitle: (The recording, the signed document... and this man in front of me — my mentor on hand-to-hand combat and battle tactics, my superior who always looks out for me...)

11013412.ContentEN: I found this voice recorder... and this document.
11013412.Subtitle: I found this voice recorder... and this document.

11013415.ContentEN: What's in your hand? Show me.
11013415.Subtitle: What's in your hand? Show me.

11013417.ContentEN: What is it that you have to keep secret from me? Hand it over.
11013417.Subtitle: What is it that you have to keep secret from me? Hand it over.

11013420.ContentEN: <W>Someone in your Legion wants you dead.</>
11013420.Subtitle: Someone in your Legion wants you dead.

11013422.ContentEN: (The recording, the signed document, Katya's words... and this man in front of me — my mentor on hand-to-hand combat and battle tactics, my superior who always looks out for me...)
11013422.Subtitle: (The recording, the signed document, Katya's words... and this man in front of me — my mentor on hand-to-hand combat and battle tactics, my superior who always looks out for me...)

11013501.ContentEN: We need to have a SERIOUS discussion about this.
11013501.Subtitle: We need to have a SERIOUS discussion about this.

11013602.ContentEN: You fabricated all this \"evidence,\" didn't you? I didn't know you old-line aristocrats would stoop to such nasty tricks.
11013602.Subtitle: You fabricated all this \"evidence,\" didn't you? I didn't know you old-line aristocrats would stoop to such nasty tricks.

11013603.ContentEN: I'm nothing like those stubborn old fools. I'm a pragmatist and would do anything that works.
11013603.Subtitle: I'm nothing like those stubborn old fools. I'm a pragmatist and would do anything that works.

11013604.ContentEN: Isn't this your favourite protege? You did this?
11013604.Subtitle: Isn't this your favourite protege? You did this?

11013605.ContentEN: Heh, I was just setting the stage for a deal with you. I don't think we need a third person for this.
11013605.Subtitle: Heh, I was just setting the stage for a deal with you. I don't think we need a third person for this.

11013607.ContentEN: Off you go, Falsi. It's alright, the entire fortress is in our hands. This old man dares not make a move.
11013607.Subtitle: Off you go, Falsi. It's alright, the entire fortress is in our hands. This old man dares not make a move.

11013608.ContentEN: Yes, sir. I shall wait outside the door.
11013608.Subtitle: Yes, sir. I shall wait outside the door.

11013609.ContentEN: Now, why bother making up all this false evidence? You really think the higher-ups are that stupid?
11013609.Subtitle: Now, why bother making up all this false evidence? You really think the higher-ups are that stupid?

11013610.ContentEN: Of course not. They're actually smart enough to turn a blind eye and play along. Use your head, Avar. Why do you think I dare to make this bold move? It's naturally because someone wants me to.
11013610.Subtitle: Of course not. They're actually smart enough to turn a blind eye and play along. Use your head, Avar. Why do you think I dare to make this bold move? It's naturally because someone wants me to.

11013611.ContentEN: Since you're a goner already, I'll show some mercy so you won't die a fool.
11013611.Subtitle: Since you're a goner already, I'll show some mercy so you won't die a fool.

11013612.ContentEN: When His Majesty was first crowned, Duke Servius was our Imperial Regent. But the Regency strayed from established Hyperborean traditions and grafted too many useless scions onto the great Imperial oak.
11013612.Subtitle: When His Majesty was first crowned, Duke Servius was our Imperial Regent. But the Regency strayed from established Hyperborean traditions and grafted too many useless scions onto the great Imperial oak.

11013613.ContentEN: Those fools allowed Charons into the Military Council and the Legion, and even appointed a few — like you — into high offices. This is ridiculous.
11013613.Subtitle: Those fools allowed Charons into the Military Council and the Legion, and even appointed a few — like you — into high offices. This is ridiculous.

11013614.ContentEN: Though His Majesty is now aware of these mistakes, they continue to plague us. I'm merely helping him prune the oak.
11013614.Subtitle: Though His Majesty is now aware of these mistakes, they continue to plague us. I'm merely helping him prune the oak.

11013615.ContentEN: ...So you went through all the trouble, just because you don't like Charons?
11013615.Subtitle: ...So you went through all the trouble, just because you don't like Charons?

11013616.ContentEN: You should've told me earlier. There's no need for such an elaborate ruse. Just let me off this time, and I'll retire early and stay out of your way forever.
11013616.Subtitle: You should've told me earlier. There's no need for such an elaborate ruse. Just let me off this time, and I'll retire early and stay out of your way forever.

11013617.ContentEN: If you need my loyalty, I can do that too. We can blame {性别2:him|her} for leaking our battle plans. Both of us walk away clean. Hell, we might even get a reward for uncovering a spy. And...
11013617.Subtitle: If you need my loyalty, I can do that too. We can blame {性别2:him|her} for leaking our battle plans. Both of us walk away clean. Hell, we might even get a reward for uncovering a spy. And...

11013618.ContentEN: You'll gain an old dog obedient enough to follow your orders.
11013618.Subtitle: You'll gain an old dog obedient enough to follow your orders.

11013619.ContentEN: Hah, how quaint, Avar — didn't expect you to stoop this low too. But you don't know the half of it, Avar. You're worth far more to us dead than alive.
11013619.Subtitle: Hah, how quaint, Avar — didn't expect you to stoop this low too. But you don't know the half of it, Avar. You're worth far more to us dead than alive.

11013620.ContentEN: Use your head! Imagine the uproar if it came out that a high-ranking Charon officer defected and joined The Forsakens, resulting in the deaths of many of our best young soldiers.
11013620.Subtitle: Use your head! Imagine the uproar if it came out that a high-ranking Charon officer defected and joined The Forsakens, resulting in the deaths of many of our best young soldiers.

11013621.ContentEN: High-ranking Charons are already a thorn in many's flesh. Such a scandal will discredit them. Take our beloved superior — do you know how many people wish to see her crash and burn?
11013621.Subtitle: High-ranking Charons are already a thorn in many's flesh. Such a scandal will discredit them. Take our beloved superior — do you know how many people wish to see her crash and burn?

11013622.ContentEN: You mean Sibylle? You wish her gone... You're after her position and power?
11013622.Subtitle: You mean Sibylle? You wish her gone... You're after her position and power?

11013623.ContentEN: Perhaps. Maybe I want more. But that's no longer your concern.
11013623.Subtitle: Perhaps. Maybe I want more. But that's no longer your concern.

11013625.ContentEN: We should talk about one more thing... About <H>No. 0</>.
11013625.Subtitle: We should talk about one more thing... About No. 0.

11013627.ContentEN: She is the most precious weapon of the 13th Legion. Sibylle controls her now, but to complete the <H>Second Scion Program</>, she still needs the crucial <H>\"Catalyst\"</>...
11013627.Subtitle: She is the most precious weapon of the 13th Legion. Sibylle controls her now, but to complete the Second Scion Program, she still needs the crucial \"Catalyst\"...

11013628.ContentEN: Sibylle has ordered you to find the Catalyst in Flagson. But your search doesn't seem to be enjoying much success.
11013628.Subtitle: Sibylle has ordered you to find the Catalyst in Flagson. But your search doesn't seem to be enjoying much success.

11013630.ContentEN: There are many paths to power, Fulvis. Even if this charade pushes Sibylle off her seat, how can you be sure the Emperor will let you take her place?
11013630.Subtitle: There are many paths to power, Fulvis. Even if this charade pushes Sibylle off her seat, how can you be sure the Emperor will let you take her place?

11013631.ContentEN: You need some kind of unparalleled credit to propel you to the Legion's head.
11013631.Subtitle: You need some kind of unparalleled credit to propel you to the Legion's head.

11013633.ContentEN: The Second Scion Program is too important to the Empire. It's worth far more than a hundred Lonza Fortresses combined. If you find the \"Catalyst,\" which is the final piece of the puzzle, the entire capital will chant your name — Antonius Fulvis.
11013633.Subtitle: The Second Scion Program is too important to the Empire. It's worth far more than a hundred Lonza Fortresses combined. If you find the \"Catalyst,\" which is the final piece of the puzzle, the entire capital will chant your name — Antonius Fulvis.

11013634.ContentEN: It's the unparalleled credit you need. And I, by circumstance and chance, happen to know of its whereabouts. I am willing to concede this to you.
11013634.Subtitle: It's the unparalleled credit you need. And I, by circumstance and chance, happen to know of its whereabouts. I am willing to concede this to you.

11013636.ContentEN: That would be my end of the deal. All I ask in return is for you to spare me and my troops — my daughter is among them, so I have to make sure they're safe.
11013636.Subtitle: That would be my end of the deal. All I ask in return is for you to spare me and my troops — my daughter is among them, so I have to make sure they're safe.

11013637.ContentEN: What a loving father! Alright, tell me where the \"Catalyst\" is, here and now, and don't try to pull any tricks — you don't have leverage.
11013637.Subtitle: What a loving father! Alright, tell me where the \"Catalyst\" is, here and now, and don't try to pull any tricks — you don't have leverage.

11013639.ContentEN: Oh, thanks. As for now, I just need one last thing...
11013639.Subtitle: Oh, thanks. As for now, I just need one last thing...

11013701.ContentEN: Remember, Avar, never trust a pragmatist.
11013701.Subtitle: Remember, Avar, never trust a pragmatist.

11013702.ContentEN: Stay behind, Falsi. Clean up this mess.
11013702.Subtitle: Stay behind, Falsi. Clean up this mess.

11013705.ContentEN: ...A mini recording device...? Why would {性别2:he|she} have this?
11013705.Subtitle: ...A mini recording device...? Why would {性别2:he|she} have this?

11013706.ContentEN: Lieutenant Colonel Avar Hrodland, you have yet to enter any command. Motto 17 of the Hyperborean Legion: Obeying orders and trusting your comrades give you a better chance of survival on the battlefield.
11013706.Subtitle: Lieutenant Colonel Avar Hrodland, you have yet to enter any command. Motto 17 of the Hyperborean Legion: Obeying orders and trusting your comrades give you a better chance of survival on the battlefield.

11013801.ContentEN: <W>...Do not indulge in the eternal void...</>
11013801.Subtitle: ...Do not indulge in the eternal void...

11013803.ContentEN: <W>...Before blood flows like swollen rivers... This is far from over...</>
11013803.Subtitle: ...Before blood flows like swollen rivers... This is far from over...

11014001.ContentEN: (Avar shows no sign of life. There is nothing on him except for a military knife, a tactical flashlight, and a broken radio.)
11014001.Subtitle: (Avar shows no sign of life. There is nothing on him except for a military knife, a tactical flashlight, and a broken radio.)

11014005.ContentEN: Attention to all 13th Legion soldiers in Lonza Fortress. Daphne Theodore, the former Medic of Squad Griffins, is now classified as a Forsakens spy.
11014005.Subtitle: Attention to all 13th Legion soldiers in Lonza Fortress. Daphne Theodore, the former Medic of Squad Griffins, is now classified as a Forsakens spy.

11014006.ContentEN: Daphne Theodore is to be executed upon sight.
11014006.Subtitle: Daphne Theodore is to be executed upon sight.

11014008.ContentEN: (I must... get out of here first!)
11014008.Subtitle: (I must... get out of here first!)

11014101.ContentEN: She's got an accomplice! Kill 'em both!
11014101.Subtitle: She's got an accomplice! Kill 'em both!

11014201.ContentEN: Here, take this painkiller. It should hold you over for a while.
11014201.Subtitle: Here, take this painkiller. It should hold you over for a while.

11014203.ContentEN: To the central control room. My fa... Commander Avar is still in there.
11014203.Subtitle: To the central control room. My fa... Commander Avar is still in there.

11014205.ContentEN: He's d— Sir Avar is no longer with us.
11014205.Subtitle: He's d— Sir Avar is no longer with us.

11014206.ContentEN: ...I have to check on him myself. Maybe he's just heavily wounded... As a medic, I can probably...
11014206.Subtitle: ...I have to check on him myself. Maybe he's just heavily wounded... As a medic, I can probably...

11014207.ContentEN: Get back here. They burned down the entire central control room. Sir Avar's final words were for me to bring you safely out of this place. At least respect the man's dying wish.
11014207.Subtitle: Get back here. They burned down the entire central control room. Sir Avar's final words were for me to bring you safely out of this place. At least respect the man's dying wish.

11014210.ContentEN: Let's get out of here and find somewhere safe.
11014210.Subtitle: Let's get out of here and find somewhere safe.

11014211.ContentEN: There's no turning back now. We have to keep moving.
11014211.Subtitle: There's no turning back now. We have to keep moving.

11014303.ContentEN: The fortress is filled with Fulvis's men. We have to try our luck with the sewer tunnels.
11014303.Subtitle: The fortress is filled with Fulvis's men. We have to try our luck with the sewer tunnels.

11014305.ContentEN: Watch out for the soldiers around here. We may no longer have any allies.
11014305.Subtitle: Watch out for the soldiers around here. We may no longer have any allies.

11014310.ContentEN: Knock them out and use their keys to open the door.
11014310.Subtitle: Knock them out and use their keys to open the door.

11014402.ContentEN: To be honest... My head's spinning. Everything's a mess.
11014402.Subtitle: To be honest... My head's spinning. Everything's a mess.

11014403.ContentEN: Fa... Sir Avar's gone. Those Hyperborean soldiers out there are shooting us on sight. They're calling me a spy. But I... I don't understand any of this...
11014403.Subtitle: Fa... Sir Avar's gone. Those Hyperborean soldiers out there are shooting us on sight. They're calling me a spy. But I... I don't understand any of this...

11014404.ContentEN: Please... I need to know I can trust you... I'll believe whatever you tell me.
11014404.Subtitle: Please... I need to know I can trust you... I'll believe whatever you tell me.

11014405.ContentEN: (Hold her gently and reassure her you can be trusted.)
11014405.Subtitle: (Hold her gently and reassure her you can be trusted.)

11014406.ContentEN: (Tell her she needs to be strong and face reality on her own.)
11014406.Subtitle: (Tell her she needs to be strong and face reality on her own.)

11014408.ContentEN: I... I've pulled myself together now. Sorry, you're so heavily injured, yet I was there acting like a crying baby...
11014408.Subtitle: I... I've pulled myself together now. Sorry, you're so heavily injured, yet I was there acting like a crying baby...

11014409.ContentEN: I still have some of the medication you found. Let me help with your injuries.
11014409.Subtitle: I still have some of the medication you found. Let me help with your injuries.

11014410.ContentEN: Let's rest here until the medicine takes effect... I'll explain everything that happened outside.
11014410.Subtitle: Let's rest here until the medicine takes effect... I'll explain everything that happened outside.

11014412.ContentEN: Yes, ma'am. A female medic named Daphne Theodore. The vanguard squads fought back fiercely, allowing her to escape.
11014412.Subtitle: Yes, ma'am. A female medic named Daphne Theodore. The vanguard squads fought back fiercely, allowing her to escape.

11014413.ContentEN: The Narwhals are entering the fortress. But no one else must know that we cleaned up the vanguards. The situation may turn for the worse if Daphne contacts them for help.
11014413.Subtitle: The Narwhals are entering the fortress. But no one else must know that we cleaned up the vanguards. The situation may turn for the worse if Daphne contacts them for help.

11014414.ContentEN: The situation is delicate. Chief Sibylle is en route to Lonza Fortress after hearing the battle has turned. Luckily, Avar is already out of the picture.
11014414.Subtitle: The situation is delicate. Chief Sibylle is en route to Lonza Fortress after hearing the battle has turned. Luckily, Avar is already out of the picture.

11014415.ContentEN: As for Daphne, what do you want us to do with her...?
11014415.Subtitle: As for Daphne, what do you want us to do with her...?

11014416.ContentEN: Relay Commander Fulvis's order: lock down the fortress, find, and eliminate Daphne Theodore. As for the charges… claim she conspired with The Forsakens, infiltrated the Legion as a spy, and compromised the fortress assault.
11014416.Subtitle: Relay Commander Fulvis's order: lock down the fortress, find, and eliminate Daphne Theodore. As for the charges… claim she conspired with The Forsakens, infiltrated the Legion as a spy, and compromised the fortress assault.

11014419.ContentEN: I checked on our squad mates while making my way to the central control room. Luckily, I avoided all the soldiers.
11014419.Subtitle: I checked on our squad mates while making my way to the central control room. Luckily, I avoided all the soldiers.

11014420.ContentEN: But it was too late for most. They all suffered precise, fatal shots — ironically from our own men rather than the enemies.
11014420.Subtitle: But it was too late for most. They all suffered precise, fatal shots — ironically from our own men rather than the enemies.

11014421.ContentEN: That's all I know... Now, tell me what happened in the central control room.
11014421.Subtitle: That's all I know... Now, tell me what happened in the central control room.

11014422.ContentEN: I'll explain later, now isn't the right time.
11014422.Subtitle: I'll explain later, now isn't the right time.

11014423.ContentEN: But you were right about the situation — every soldier in this fortress is now our enemy. Fulvis has ordered them to eliminate us.
11014423.Subtitle: But you were right about the situation — every soldier in this fortress is now our enemy. Fulvis has ordered them to eliminate us.

11014424.ContentEN: Fulvis... He's the despicable traitor who leaked our plans to The Forsakens. He's the one who decimated our squads.
11014424.Subtitle: Fulvis... He's the despicable traitor who leaked our plans to The Forsakens. He's the one who decimated our squads.

11014426.ContentEN: Thanks to your medicine, I'm feeling much better.
11014426.Subtitle: Thanks to your medicine, I'm feeling much better.

11014427.ContentEN: Fine. You must have your own reasons for withholding the information. But there's one thing I must know—
11014427.Subtitle: Fine. You must have your own reasons for withholding the information. But there's one thing I must know—

11014428.ContentEN: <H>My father</>... Avar... Did he complete his mission?
11014428.Subtitle: My father... Avar... Did he complete his mission?

11014432.ContentEN: Let's go. So long as we're alive, we'll find a chance to make Fulvis pay.
11014432.Subtitle: Let's go. So long as we're alive, we'll find a chance to make Fulvis pay.

11014501.Content: 我来这儿的路上发现这里到处都是海伯利亚的追兵，我们可以试着从下水道离开。

11014502.Content: 那家伙应该是个小军官，它身上应该有通行权限的钥匙卡！

11014601.ContentEN: Daphne Theodore and an unknown accomplice are currently hiding in the sewers near Reservoir 1.
11014601.Subtitle: Daphne Theodore and an unknown accomplice are currently hiding in the sewers near Reservoir 1.

11014602.ContentEN: Initiate the flooding of Reservoir 1 to force them out.
11014602.Subtitle: Initiate the flooding of Reservoir 1 to force them out.

11014603.ContentEN: They found us... We need to get out before this section floods completely!
11014603.Subtitle: They found us... We need to get out before this section floods completely!

11014701.ContentEN: Current water level exceeds safety threshold. Safety gate will remain closed. Reduce water level to reopen.
11014701.Subtitle: Current water level exceeds safety threshold. Safety gate will remain closed. Reduce water level to reopen.

11014702.ContentEN: They're controlling the inlets... But since this is a reservoir, it must also have drainage outlets.
11014702.Subtitle: They're controlling the inlets... But since this is a reservoir, it must also have drainage outlets.

11014802.ContentEN: \"For rapid discharge, activate three reservoir valves simultaneously.\"
11014802.Subtitle: \"For rapid discharge, activate three reservoir valves simultaneously.\"

11014803.ContentEN: They can't be far! Herd the remaining Filthoids into the tunnels!
11014803.Subtitle: They can't be far! Herd the remaining Filthoids into the tunnels!

11014804.ContentEN: Seal all exits. Once they surface, we'll eliminate the traitors.
11014804.Subtitle: Seal all exits. Once they surface, we'll eliminate the traitors.

11014805.ContentEN: Hurry up! We're running out of time!
11014805.Subtitle: Hurry up! We're running out of time!

11015002.Content: 再坚持一下，第二个水阀的位置找到了！

11015003.Content: 最后一个……！关闭最后一个水阀后，再去门那儿试试吧？

11015101.ContentEN: We should be safe for now...
11015101.Subtitle: We should be safe for now...

11015102.ContentEN: The exit should be up ahead, but...
11015102.Subtitle: The exit should be up ahead, but...

11015103.ContentEN: They're definitely waiting to ambush us there.
11015103.Subtitle: They're definitely waiting to ambush us there.

11015104.ContentEN: You're heavily wounded... Is there any chance of us escaping this place...? Even if we make it out, the Legion will hunt us down... We'll be fugitives forever, constantly dodging assassins...
11015104.Subtitle: You're heavily wounded... Is there any chance of us escaping this place...? Even if we make it out, the Legion will hunt us down... We'll be fugitives forever, constantly dodging assassins...

11015105.ContentEN: Maybe we should just live in the sewers forever.
11015105.Subtitle: Maybe we should just live in the sewers forever.

11015106.ContentEN: But this place doesn't have enough food or clothing — Please, let us figure something out!
11015106.Subtitle: But this place doesn't have enough food or clothing — Please, let us figure something out!

11015107.ContentEN: We should just head out and fight to the death.
11015107.Subtitle: We should just head out and fight to the death.

11015108.ContentEN: No... You might be a skilled soldier, but you're heavily wounded. We wouldn't stand a chance...
11015108.Subtitle: No... You might be a skilled soldier, but you're heavily wounded. We wouldn't stand a chance...

11015110.ContentEN: ...Let's take a deep breath. We'll come up with something.
11015110.Subtitle: ...Let's take a deep breath. We'll come up with something.

11015115.ContentEN: They think I died in the central control room and they have no idea who your accomplice is. You are the only target they can identify.
11015115.Subtitle: They think I died in the central control room and they have no idea who your accomplice is. You are the only target they can identify.

11015116.ContentEN: I'll wear your uniform and make a run out there. The medic's uniform is conspicuous enough to draw their attention. You'll make your escape during the chaos.
11015116.Subtitle: I'll wear your uniform and make a run out there. The medic's uniform is conspicuous enough to draw their attention. You'll make your escape during the chaos.

11015117.ContentEN: Are you serious? We're completely different sizes! They'll quickly realise they're chasing the wrong person!
11015117.Subtitle: Are you serious? We're completely different sizes! They'll quickly realise they're chasing the wrong person!

11015118.ContentEN: The longer I can distract them, the better your chances. This is the plan, Daphne. Honour Sir Avar's last wishes.
11015118.Subtitle: The longer I can distract them, the better your chances. This is the plan, Daphne. Honour Sir Avar's last wishes.

11015121.ContentEN: Thank you for respecting my father's wish.
11015121.Subtitle: Thank you for respecting my father's wish.

11015122.ContentEN: But could you at least hear my <H>wishes</>?
11015122.Subtitle: But could you at least hear my wishes?

11015123.ContentEN: Dismania is a rainy place. When I was a little girl, all my friends hated the rain because it would mess with their hair and soil their pretty dresses.
11015123.Subtitle: Dismania is a rainy place. When I was a little girl, all my friends hated the rain because it would mess with their hair and soil their pretty dresses.

11015124.ContentEN: But I didn't hate the rain, because it never reached my shoulders. In my eyes, the rain was just little ripples sprouting around my boots and droplets dripping off the brolly.
11015124.Subtitle: But I didn't hate the rain, because it never reached my shoulders. In my eyes, the rain was just little ripples sprouting around my boots and droplets dripping off the brolly.

11015125.ContentEN: But as I grew older, I realised that rain wasn't that nice. It used to look nice, only because my dad was there to bear it for me.
11015125.Subtitle: But as I grew older, I realised that rain wasn't that nice. It used to look nice, only because my dad was there to bear it for me.

11015126.ContentEN: My dad is such a kind man, and such a stubborn one too. He always put others first. Always.
11015126.Subtitle: My dad is such a kind man, and such a stubborn one too. He always put others first. Always.

11015128.ContentEN: Before I was born, he joined the Legion and fought hard to prove himself worthy of my mom. After I grew up, he left us because he didn't want to \"soil my future.\"
11015128.Subtitle: Before I was born, he joined the Legion and fought hard to prove himself worthy of my mom. After I grew up, he left us because he didn't want to \"soil my future.\"

11015129.ContentEN: ...In public, he'd scowl and forbid me to call him Dad. But deep in the night, he'd drunkenly shout mine and my mother's name, crying — He was always bearing the weight of everything on his own...
11015129.Subtitle: ...In public, he'd scowl and forbid me to call him Dad. But deep in the night, he'd drunkenly shout mine and my mother's name, crying — He was always bearing the weight of everything on his own...

11015130.ContentEN: But he never asked if I wanted any of this... Just like you never asked if I wanted to live knowing you sacrificed yourself for me!
11015130.Subtitle: But he never asked if I wanted any of this... Just like you never asked if I wanted to live knowing you sacrificed yourself for me!

11015131.ContentEN: Neither of you know what I actually wanted... I never wished for a hero who'd shield me from the rain. My wish is that...
11015131.Subtitle: Neither of you know what I actually wanted... I never wished for a hero who'd shield me from the rain. My wish is that...

11015132.ContentEN: If there's only room for one under the brolly, I'll brave the rain with you all.
11015132.Subtitle: If there's only room for one under the brolly, I'll brave the rain with you all.

11015133.ContentEN: I wish that we make it out and live on, <H>together</>.
11015133.Subtitle: I wish that we make it out and live on, together.

11015135.ContentEN: Let's think together… There has to be another way!
11015135.Subtitle: Let's think together… There has to be another way!

11015136.ContentEN: Fulvis wants us silenced. That's our situation. He's labelled us as spies so that our fellow soldiers would kill us for him...
11015136.Subtitle: Fulvis wants us silenced. That's our situation. He's labelled us as spies so that our fellow soldiers would kill us for him...

11015137.ContentEN: We're the only ones left from the Griffins and Snow Wolves. Every soldier here follows Fulvis and his adjutant Falsi... Every soldier in the fortress...
11015137.Subtitle: We're the only ones left from the Griffins and Snow Wolves. Every soldier here follows Fulvis and his adjutant Falsi... Every soldier in the fortress...

11015138.ContentEN: Wait, I have an idea...! Father once said a strategic retreat could be a cover for an advance. Sometimes the greatest risks lead to victory.
11015138.Subtitle: Wait, I have an idea...! Father once said a strategic retreat could be a cover for an advance. Sometimes the greatest risks lead to victory.

11015139.ContentEN: We still have one option... We can turn ourselves in.
11015139.Subtitle: We still have one option... We can turn ourselves in.

11015140.ContentEN: You want to surrender to Fulvis?
11015140.Subtitle: You want to surrender to Fulvis?

11015141.ContentEN: No, not to Fulvis. To <H>someone else</>...
11015141.Subtitle: No, not to Fulvis. To someone else...

11015142.ContentEN: Turn ourselves in... to someone else?
11015142.Subtitle: Turn ourselves in... to someone else?

11015145.ContentEN: Remember what Falsi said in the broadcast?
11015145.Subtitle: Remember what Falsi said in the broadcast?

11015146.ContentEN: Seal all exits. Once they surface, we'll eliminate the traitors.
11015146.Subtitle: Seal all exits. Once they surface, we'll eliminate the traitors.

11015147.ContentEN: Hurry up! We're running out of time!
11015147.Subtitle: Hurry up! We're running out of time!

11015148.ContentEN: Lonza Fortress is currently under Fulvis's full control. We're little more than rats in a cage. Then why is Falsi in such a hurry?
11015148.Subtitle: Lonza Fortress is currently under Fulvis's full control. We're little more than rats in a cage. Then why is Falsi in such a hurry?

11015149.ContentEN: Do you remember what I overheard earlier from one of the soldiers—
11015149.Subtitle: Do you remember what I overheard earlier from one of the soldiers—

11015150.ContentEN: Chief Sibylle is en route to Lonza Fortress after hearing the battle has turned.
11015150.Subtitle: Chief Sibylle is en route to Lonza Fortress after hearing the battle has turned.

11015151.ContentEN: ...So you want to seek protection from Sibylle?
11015151.Subtitle: ...So you want to seek protection from Sibylle?

11015153.ContentEN: But Fulvis has already condemned us and even fabricated evidence... Wait, I get why you want to turn ourselves in.
11015153.Subtitle: But Fulvis has already condemned us and even fabricated evidence... Wait, I get why you want to turn ourselves in.

11015154.ContentEN: Mm-hmm! Chief Sibylle is also a graduate of the Academy. From what I know of her, she wouldn't tolerate betrayal from anyone, not even those she holds dear.
11015154.Subtitle: Mm-hmm! Chief Sibylle is also a graduate of the Academy. From what I know of her, she wouldn't tolerate betrayal from anyone, not even those she holds dear.

11015155.ContentEN: ...Which is also why Sibylle would carefully review any acts of treason. She would not make any hasty decisions to execute the suspects because she'd want to get to the bottom of it.
11015155.Subtitle: ...Which is also why Sibylle would carefully review any acts of treason. She would not make any hasty decisions to execute the suspects because she'd want to get to the bottom of it.

11015156.ContentEN: If we manage to meet her, she's most likely to throw us into the Imperial Prison. The Prison is reputedly so well guarded that even a fly could not escape the place. But it'll also keep out anyone who wishes to silence us.
11015156.Subtitle: If we manage to meet her, she's most likely to throw us into the Imperial Prison. The Prison is reputedly so well guarded that even a fly could not escape the place. But it'll also keep out anyone who wishes to silence us.

11015157.ContentEN: The Imperial Prison will be our safest refuge. We can prove our innocence during interrogations. This is our only chance to survive.
11015157.Subtitle: The Imperial Prison will be our safest refuge. We can prove our innocence during interrogations. This is our only chance to survive.

11015158.ContentEN: Your reputation will suffer though, as you'll be interrogated for espionage... But once we endure the questioning, we will be able to clear our names and bring the real traitors to justice.
11015158.Subtitle: Your reputation will suffer though, as you'll be interrogated for espionage... But once we endure the questioning, we will be able to clear our names and bring the real traitors to justice.

11015159.ContentEN: ...Being questioned for espionage... Any chance that word gets out beyond the Legion? Perhaps the royal family will hear of this?
11015159.Subtitle: ...Being questioned for espionage... Any chance that word gets out beyond the Legion? Perhaps the royal family will hear of this?

11015160.ContentEN: The army has always been the focus of Emperor Julius. Moreover, His Majesty personally founded the 13th Legion. I believe it will reach his ears...
11015160.Subtitle: The army has always been the focus of Emperor Julius. Moreover, His Majesty personally founded the 13th Legion. I believe it will reach his ears...

11015161.ContentEN: Then perhaps... <H>that person</> can help us.
11015161.Subtitle: Then perhaps... that person can help us.

11015162.ContentEN: Alrigh, let's go with your plan and find Sibylle.
11015162.Subtitle: Alrigh, let's go with your plan and find Sibylle.

11015201.ContentEN: And thus, I took her hand and we stepped towards that narrow beam of sunlight piercing through the door's gap.
11015201.Subtitle: And thus, I took her hand and we stepped towards that narrow beam of sunlight piercing through the door's gap.

11015202.ContentEN: It felt as though we were stepping into a shimmering grave of our own making...
11015202.Subtitle: It felt as though we were stepping into a shimmering grave of our own making...

11015203.ContentEN: We expended our last ounces of strength evading our pursuers, in time to meet Chief Sibylle, who had just arrived at the fortress.
11015203.Subtitle: We expended our last ounces of strength evading our pursuers, in time to meet Chief Sibylle, who had just arrived at the fortress.

11015204.ContentEN: And just as Daphne had predicted, we were escorted to this very place.
11015204.Subtitle: And just as Daphne had predicted, we were escorted to this very place.

11015301.ContentEN: What a riveting story, which completely contradicts the testimonies provided by the Narwhals. Since you claim that you and Avar Hrodland are innocent—
11015301.Subtitle: What a riveting story, which completely contradicts the testimonies provided by the Narwhals. Since you claim that you and Avar Hrodland are innocent—

11015302.ContentEN: Let's talk about the evidence then. How come the letter pledging allegiance to The Forsakens not only bears Avar's handwriting, but also shows faint marks aligning perfectly with the worn parts on Avar's glove?
11015302.Subtitle: Let's talk about the evidence then. How come the letter pledging allegiance to The Forsakens not only bears Avar's handwriting, but also shows faint marks aligning perfectly with the worn parts on Avar's glove?

11015303.ContentEN: It was a setup. The real culprit lured Avar into the central control room so that Avar would find the letter and accidentally leave the unique marks of his glove on it when he was holding it. As for the handwriting, it could be faked by others.
11015303.Subtitle: It was a setup. The real culprit lured Avar into the central control room so that Avar would find the letter and accidentally leave the unique marks of his glove on it when he was holding it. As for the handwriting, it could be faked by others.

11015304.ContentEN: The forensic reports on the fallen soldiers indicate numerous wounds inflicted by the fortress's own defense systems, and only Avar Hrodland's name appears in the operation log of the central control room. How do you explain that?
11015304.Subtitle: The forensic reports on the fallen soldiers indicate numerous wounds inflicted by the fortress's own defense systems, and only Avar Hrodland's name appears in the operation log of the central control room. How do you explain that?

11015305.ContentEN: Commander Avar did not use his control to activate the defense systems — instead, he attempted to shut them down.
11015305.Subtitle: Commander Avar did not use his control to activate the defense systems — instead, he attempted to shut them down.

11015306.ContentEN: As for the operation log, any officer with higher clearance than Sir Avar could easily manipulate the records to remove traces of their involvement.
11015306.Subtitle: As for the operation log, any officer with higher clearance than Sir Avar could easily manipulate the records to remove traces of their involvement.

11015307.ContentEN: ...Do you have any idea what you just said?
11015307.Subtitle: ...Do you have any idea what you just said?

11015308.ContentEN: I absolutely do. I'm formally accusing Antonius Fulvis of orchestrating the events at Lonza Fortress.
11015308.Subtitle: I absolutely do. I'm formally accusing Antonius Fulvis of orchestrating the events at Lonza Fortress.

11015309.ContentEN: Then are you aware of the consequences if your accusation against Colonel Fulvis are proven false?
11015309.Subtitle: Then are you aware of the consequences if your accusation against Colonel Fulvis are proven false?

11015310.ContentEN: ...It's ten years in prison, for making false accusations.
11015310.Subtitle: ...It's ten years in prison, for making false accusations.

11015311.ContentEN: Incorrect. You'll be charged with treason, espionage, and making false accusations.
11015311.Subtitle: Incorrect. You'll be charged with treason, espionage, and making false accusations.

11015312.ContentEN: And the highest penalty in the Empire awaits you: being hung upside down with thorny vines and crucified on the Heaventree in the centre of Dismania, until your very last breath is taken.
11015312.Subtitle: And the highest penalty in the Empire awaits you: being hung upside down with thorny vines and crucified on the Heaventree in the centre of Dismania, until your very last breath is taken.

11015313.ContentEN: I'm telling the truth. Since you have chosen to interrogate me and Daphne Theodore separately, you must be aware that our testimonies can perfectly corroborate each other.
11015313.Subtitle: I'm telling the truth. Since you have chosen to interrogate me and Daphne Theodore separately, you must be aware that our testimonies can perfectly corroborate each other.

11015314.ContentEN: Despite suffering grievous wounds, you have endured intense interrogation without changing your testimonies. Admirable, I must say.
11015314.Subtitle: Despite suffering grievous wounds, you have endured intense interrogation without changing your testimonies. Admirable, I must say.

11015315.ContentEN: Push the interrogation to the next level — initiate the \"Inferno.\"
11015315.Subtitle: Push the interrogation to the next level — initiate the \"Inferno.\"

11015316.ContentEN: Yes, ma'am. The hypnotic agent is ready.
11015316.Subtitle: Yes, ma'am. The hypnotic agent is ready.

11015317.ContentEN: Survive this, and I'll consider the veracity of your testimony.
11015317.Subtitle: Survive this, and I'll consider the veracity of your testimony.

11015402.ContentEN: The warden just said... the next-level \"interrogation\"...
11015402.Subtitle: The warden just said... the next-level \"interrogation\"...

11015403.ContentEN: Wait, isn't that Leon… and Marco!?
11015403.Subtitle: Wait, isn't that Leon… and Marco!?

11015405.ContentEN: If you claim to be innocent, prove it to me.
11015405.Subtitle: If you claim to be innocent, prove it to me.

11015502.ContentEN: As you can see, ma'am, all our plans have been leaked...
11015502.Subtitle: As you can see, ma'am, all our plans have been leaked...

11015503.ContentEN: ...Commander Avar participated in the formulation of the vanguard squad's combat plan...
11015503.Subtitle: ...Commander Avar participated in the formulation of the vanguard squad's combat plan...

11015504.ContentEN: ...He's a Charon. He was the one most likely to reveal our plans to The Forsakens...
11015504.Subtitle: ...He's a Charon. He was the one most likely to reveal our plans to The Forsakens...

11015602.ContentEN: ...The Forsakens set traps in every path...
11015602.Subtitle: ...The Forsakens set traps in every path...

11015603.ContentEN: As you can see, ma'am, someone... betrayed us...
11015603.Subtitle: As you can see, ma'am, someone... betrayed us...

11015701.ContentEN: That interrogator mentioned a hypnotic agent...
11015701.Subtitle: That interrogator mentioned a hypnotic agent...

11015702.ContentEN: I'm probably not in a real world. This is a dream...
11015702.Subtitle: I'm probably not in a real world. This is a dream...

11015802.ContentEN: As you can see, ma'am, I am Avar Hrodland, Commander of the vanguard squads in this mission...
11015802.Subtitle: As you can see, ma'am, I am Avar Hrodland, Commander of the vanguard squads in this mission...

11015803.ContentEN: I turned my back on the Hyperborean Empire. I betrayed the 13th Legion... I sold out the Griffins and the Snow Wolves...
11015803.Subtitle: I turned my back on the Hyperborean Empire. I betrayed the 13th Legion... I sold out the Griffins and the Snow Wolves...

11015804.ContentEN: My accomplices include... my daughter Daphne, from my ex-wife Claudia Theodore... and my protege at the Imperial Military College, {nickname2}...
11015804.Subtitle: My accomplices include... my daughter Daphne, from my ex-wife Claudia Theodore... and my protege at the Imperial Military College, ...

11015806.ContentEN: So this is the charge Fulvis had prepared for me.
11015806.Subtitle: So this is the charge Fulvis had prepared for me.

11015901.ContentEN: As you can see, ma'am, I am Daphne Theodore, daughter of Avar Hrodland...
11015901.Subtitle: As you can see, ma'am, I am Daphne Theodore, daughter of Avar Hrodland...

11015902.ContentEN: My father... and {nickname2}... they planned to split the payment for selling intel to The Forsakens...
11015902.Subtitle: My father... and ... they planned to split the payment for selling intel to The Forsakens...

11015903.ContentEN: ...But at the heart of the fortress... They disagreed on the division of the spoils...
11015903.Subtitle: ...But at the heart of the fortress... They disagreed on the division of the spoils...

11015905.ContentEN: He was killed in a ruse woven by {nickname2} ...
11015905.Subtitle: He was killed in a ruse woven by  ...

11015906.ContentEN: {性别2:He|She} then deceived me about how my father died...
11015906.Subtitle: {性别2:He|She} then deceived me about how my father died...

11015907.ContentEN: I've brought the murderer to you, ma'am... I humbly request you to deliver a fair and just verdict...
11015907.Subtitle: I've brought the murderer to you, ma'am... I humbly request you to deliver a fair and just verdict...

11016001.ContentEN: As you can see, ma'am, I am the control panel in the central control room of Lonza Fortress...
11016001.Subtitle: As you can see, ma'am, I am the control panel in the central control room of Lonza Fortress...

11016002.ContentEN: I observed Lieutenant Colonel Avar Hrodland and {nickname2} enter the central control room...
11016002.Subtitle: I observed Lieutenant Colonel Avar Hrodland and  enter the central control room...

11016003.ContentEN: A conflict erupted between them, and weapons were drawn...
11016003.Subtitle: A conflict erupted between them, and weapons were drawn...

11016004.ContentEN: I witnessed the fall of Colonel Avar. {nickname2} left alone shortly after...
11016004.Subtitle: I witnessed the fall of Colonel Avar.  left alone shortly after...

11016005.ContentEN: Motto 18 of the Hyperborean Legion: An unexpectedly easy victory often leads to an impending ambush...
11016005.Subtitle: Motto 18 of the Hyperborean Legion: An unexpectedly easy victory often leads to an impending ambush...

11016006.ContentEN: ...Um, can't believe you have to recite those mottos even in my dreams.
11016006.Subtitle: ...Um, can't believe you have to recite those mottos even in my dreams.

11016101.ContentEN: All verdicts are in the name of justice.
11016101.Subtitle: All verdicts are in the name of justice.

11016102.ContentEN: All questions must be answered absent falsehood. I tolerate no fabrication, alteration, or concealment of the truth.
11016102.Subtitle: All questions must be answered absent falsehood. I tolerate no fabrication, alteration, or concealment of the truth.

11016103.ContentEN: As an Imperial soldier, have you betrayed your Empire by conspiring with The Forsakens?
11016103.Subtitle: As an Imperial soldier, have you betrayed your Empire by conspiring with The Forsakens?

11016104.ContentEN: Should you betray the justice of the Empire, this blade shall claim your deceit.
11016104.Subtitle: Should you betray the justice of the Empire, this blade shall claim your deceit.

11016201.ContentEN: The vanguard squads were obliterated in the battle of Lonza Fortress. Were you the architect of their doom?
11016201.Subtitle: The vanguard squads were obliterated in the battle of Lonza Fortress. Were you the architect of their doom?

11016202.ContentEN: Feel their agony! Betrayal led them to untimely deaths.
11016202.Subtitle: Feel their agony! Betrayal led them to untimely deaths.

11016203.ContentEN: Should you betray the justice of your comrades, these Filthoids' claws shall tear you to pieces!
11016203.Subtitle: Should you betray the justice of your comrades, these Filthoids' claws shall tear you to pieces!

11016204.ContentEN: (They were killed by these monsters... Fulvis... He actually unleashed these monsters upon his own comrades...!)
11016204.Subtitle: (They were killed by these monsters... Fulvis... He actually unleashed these monsters upon his own comrades...!)

11016301.ContentEN: One last question. Are you the cause of Avar Hrodland's demise?
11016301.Subtitle: One last question. Are you the cause of Avar Hrodland's demise?

11016302.ContentEN: Despite his faults, he trusted you. Where were you when he was consumed by flames?
11016302.Subtitle: Despite his faults, he trusted you. Where were you when he was consumed by flames?

11016304.ContentEN: (I must survive... to avenge him... I cannot let this woman kill me...)
11016304.Subtitle: (I must survive... to avenge him... I cannot let this woman kill me...)

11016305.ContentEN: Should you betray the loyalty of friendship, these infernal flames shall burn you to ashes!
11016305.Subtitle: Should you betray the loyalty of friendship, these infernal flames shall burn you to ashes!

11016306.ContentEN: (Justice... justice... That's what she keeps talking about...)
11016306.Subtitle: (Justice... justice... That's what she keeps talking about...)

11016307.ContentEN: (Time to reveal <H>the truth</> of that day...)
11016307.Subtitle: (Time to reveal the truth of that day...)

11016401.ContentEN: Ma'am, to satisfy the justice you seek—
11016401.Subtitle: Ma'am, to satisfy the justice you seek—

11016402.ContentEN: Allow me to tell you the truth... of what unfolded in the central control room that day.
11016402.Subtitle: Allow me to tell you the truth... of what unfolded in the central control room that day.

11016502.ContentEN: ...Why did you wake up? My questioning had just reached a pivotal point!
11016502.Subtitle: ...Why did you wake up? My questioning had just reached a pivotal point!

11016503.ContentEN: It's alright, ma'am. I remember what I told you in my dreams.
11016503.Subtitle: It's alright, ma'am. I remember what I told you in my dreams.

11016504.ContentEN: I'll tell you exactly what happened that day. Once you've heard the truth, I hope the justice within your heart will guide your decision.
11016504.Subtitle: I'll tell you exactly what happened that day. Once you've heard the truth, I hope the justice within your heart will guide your decision.

11016601.ContentEN: We need to have a *serious* discussion about this.
11016601.Subtitle: We need to have a *serious* discussion about this.

11016602.ContentEN: I'll make this short. Later, I'll shoot you with this gun, and you'll have to play dead.
11016602.Subtitle: I'll make this short. Later, I'll shoot you with this gun, and you'll have to play dead.

11016603.ContentEN: To make it convincing enough, the shot will have to hit. It will miss your vitals but will really hurt. You must endure the pain silently.
11016603.Subtitle: To make it convincing enough, the shot will have to hit. It will miss your vitals but will really hurt. You must endure the pain silently.

11016604.ContentEN: What are you going to do?
11016604.Subtitle: What are you going to do?

11016605.ContentEN: We're trapped in here, with all contact to the outside world cut off. Fulvis is already on his way. We are running out of time.
11016605.Subtitle: We're trapped in here, with all contact to the outside world cut off. Fulvis is already on his way. We are running out of time.
